column1: The HEV rays connect to scattered light and water vapor in the air and cause haze. This haze may or may not be discernible – but it’s there and reduces visual acuity. Melaneye lenses counteract that haze and produce greater visual acuity. You’ll see with better definition, and with greater detail and contrast. Images will be crisper and more distinct. And since our lenses are also polarized, they reduce glare as well.

Many of our favorite outdoor activities and sports take place in exactly these conditions – and we need to neutralize these intensified HEV rays and protect our eyes.

column1: There’s a lot more to the performance of SightSaver Sunglasses.
See and hear for yourself what others – just like you – have to say about SightSaver Sunglasses.
• Melaneye protects against damaging and harmful HEV rays.
• Melaneye retards and compensates for natural melanin loss caused by HEV rays.
• Melaneye addresses the issue of melanin loss from overexposure to digital devices with screens (computer screens, tablets, smartphones, gaming devices, etc.).
• Enhanced visual acuity provides better contrast and definition, leading to better performance and greater enjoyment of outdoor sports and activities.
• Prescription lens capability – while preserving melanin benefits and the enhanced protection of a wraparound style design.

column2: >Note the high-quality wraparound frame for greater protected vision – including peripheral vision.

column1: • Our proprietary synthetic melanin – Melaneye – is infused into the lenses.
• Frame color is a stylish gun-metal gray.
• SightSaver Sunglasses also have 100% UVA and UVB protection.
• Frames are made from TR90, a superior material used for many high-end, brand-name, designer sunglasses costing $200-$300 or more.
• Successfully passed an Impact Resistance test and Penetration Resistance test to ANSI Z87.1-2003 standard.
• Smaller, removable inner frame accommodates prescription lenses.  There is no additional cost for this frame and capability.
• Microfiber bag holds your eyewear and can double as a cleaning cloth.
Handsome eyewear case included, with the SightSaver Sunglasses logo.

igg","Our campaign has ended, and we are now part ofIndiegogo's InDemand program -- and still taking orders.You can still choose from the remaining available perks.Thanks for your support!* * * * *Are You Looking for Leading-Edge, State-of-the-Art Protection For Your Precious Eyes? Do You Need Greater Visual Acuity to EnhanceOutdoor Performance and Enjoyment?
Read More to Find Out How

HEV (High Energy Visible) rays are believed to be as damaging to your eyes as the better-known UVA and UVB rays. They’re everywhere, and their effect is cumulative over a lifetime. And due to atmospheric changes, they are getting worse.
HEV rays are known to cause cataracts and macular degeneration (AMD) – but this danger is no longer just age-related.

Children and younger adults are also increasingly susceptible to these harmful rays because of their addiction to digital devices with screens. Computers, tablets, smartphones, and gaming devices make the problem worse and increase the risk!
Everyone’s eyes need protection from the effects of HEV rays.
Natural melanin is the protective pigment found in our skin – and it’s also in our eyes.
In the eyes, it is found behind the retina and is there to protect it.

Unfortunately, 25% of this natural melanin is lost by age 50 – and considerable additional loss occurs by age 65. People with blue eyes  are particularly susceptible to melanin loss, and therefore are at even greater risk.

Yale Medical Research Center and Dr. John Pawelek pioneered the creation of synthetic melanin, which was initially used in cosmetics. Our proprietary, vision-specific version, Melaneye, is infused in the lenses of SightSaver Sunglasses. Melaneye has the same effect as melanin, to effectively compensate for the age-related loss of natural melanin in our eyes. It counteracts HEV rays by filtering them.

Most sunglasses provide protection from harmful UVA and UVB rays, but this isn’t enough. Why would you settle for sunglasses that only do half the job? Only our Melaneye-infused lenses provide protection from 98% of the damaging HEV rays. The HEV rays are filtered, not blocked (like blue blockers), and that way natural color is maintained.

“Wearing lenses with synthetic melanin is a natural means of protecting oneself – it makes up for the loss of retinal melanin that occurs with increasing age – as melanin is the very pigment that nature has chosen to protect us.”
–Jose-Alain Safel, French National Hospital Center for Ophthalmology
SightSaver Sunglasses with Melaneye-Infused Lenses in stylish TR90 Frames

Natural melanin in the eyes improves contrast and definition. As we know, this natural melanin is lost with age – and it can also be compromised due to exposure to screens on modern digital devices. Our proprietary Melaneye restores lost contrast and definition – as well as protecting your eyes.

The HEV rays connect to scattered light and water vapor in the air and cause haze. This haze may or may not be discernible – but it’s there and reduces visual acuity. Melaneye lenses counteract that haze and produce greater visual acuity. You’ll see with better definition, and with greater detail and contrast. Images will be crisper and more distinct. And since our lenses are also polarized, they reduce glare as well.

Outdoor sports and other activities are more fun when you can see more clearly. SightSaver Sunglasses, with their Melaneye-infused lenses, are particularly effective where there’s reflected light from water or snow. These surfaces can often double the damage of harmful HEV rays. Many of our favorite outdoor activities and sports take place in exactly these conditions – and we need to neutralize these intensified HEV rays and protect our eyes.
Important: Hear for yourself what two seasoned sports professionals – from the worlds of snow and water respectively – have to say about the performance of SightSaver Sunglasses.
""Everything will look much clearer. The people who wear them prefer them to anything else.  People who wear them on a regular basis claim to have much better vision.”            – Chris Ryser, DLO
National Sailing Champion Silverhawk (I-100) illustrates the challenges of boating in hazy, water-reflective sunlight conditions.

The SightSaver Sunglasses design is intentionally a curved, wraparound style of frame and lenses. This helps protect your peripheral vision – and keeps out as much unfiltered light as possible. But this wraparound style creates a problem for prescription lens wearers, because prescription lenses need a flatter surface to be effective.
SightSaver Sunglasses solve this problem by placing a smaller removable frame inside the larger primary frame.

By simply taking this smaller frame to a local optometrist, anyone can have personal prescription lenses placed in the smaller frame – and then easily attach them to the inside of the larger frame. This inner frame is included with your pair of SightSavers at no additional cost. When you have your SightSavers with you, you can leave your prescription glasses home – we’ve got you covered!
The small “tongues” on the nose bridge and the insides of the frame fit into the grooves on the larger frame. The smaller frame is easily removed if you don’t need it.

SightSaver Sunglasses give you the best of both worlds. If you need prescription lenses, our sunglasses have a unique way of providing them while preserving the functional and attractive wraparound style of frame. If you don’t need a prescription, you simply don’t use the smaller, removable inside frame.
There’s a lot more to the performance of SightSaver Sunglasses.
See and hear for yourself what others – just like you – have to say about SightSaver Sunglasses.
Melaneye protects against damaging and harmful HEV rays.
Melaneye retards and compensates for natural melanin loss caused by HEV rays.
Melaneye addresses the issue of melanin loss from overexposure to digital devices with screens (computer screens, tablets, smartphones, gaming devices, etc.).
Enhanced visual acuity provides better contrast and definition, leading to better performance and greater enjoyment of outdoor sports and activities.
Prescription lens capability – while preserving melanin benefits and the enhanced protection of a wraparound style design.
Note the high-quality wraparound frame for greater protected vision – including peripheral vision.
Super anti-scratch coating – on both sides.
Our proprietary synthetic melanin – Melaneye – is infused into the lenses.
Open frame provides better, unhindered vision.
Wraparound frame style reduces unfiltered light.
Frame color is a stylish gun-metal gray.
SightSaver Sunglasses also have 100% UVA and UVB protection.
Frames are made from TR90, a superior material used for many high-end, brand-name, designer sunglasses costing $200-$300 or more.
Successfully passed an Impact Resistance test and Penetration Resistance test to ANSI Z87.1-2003 standard.
Smaller, removable inner frame accommodates prescription lenses.  There is no additional cost for this frame and capability.
Microfiber bag holds your eyewear and can double as a cleaning cloth.
Handsome eyewear case included, with the SightSaver Sunglasses logo.

After personally experiencing cataract surgery, I KNOW the importance of protecting my eyes from further vision deterioration. My research and development have led me to the creation of SightSaver Sunglasses with Melaneye.

And this is not just for those with age-related vision challenges – but also for many in the younger generations who interact daily with digital devices with screens that threaten the natural melanin in their eyes. Let’s face it. Our precious eyes are critically important to us – regardless of age!

The money raised from this Indiegogo Campaign will be used to pay product development expenses, fine-tune the product, and of course provide the perks to those of you who support us. And it will provide initial funds to take the product to the next level where it can be made available to a larger audience who can also benefit from better eyesight protection.

I’ve been in the crowdfunding trenches before with two successful campaigns – one of them being a category record-breaker. I know what it takes to make this work – and I will do my part to make this a WIN-WIN experience for everyone.

As a ""perk"" for your support, you can acquire one or more pairs of these SightSaver Sunglasses for a price well below MSRP that will never be lower or repeated anywhere else. When these superior sunglasses become commercially available, their price will be higher – as is appropriate for quality innovative eyewear.

You will be among the first to own these extraordinary “Best in Class” Melaneye-infused sunglasses. When people hear about how special they are, and see how great they look, they will ask, “WHERE did you get these? HOW can I get a pair?” (Here’s a tip. Be careful about lending them out. You may have trouble getting them back!)

Look to the right on this page and see the levels of perks we’re offering. One of these will be right for you. If you’re new to Indiegogo, pledging to our campaign is simple. Just choose the number of pairs of SightSaver Sunglasses you wish to order (multiples earn you a discount) – click on it – and proceed to checkout.
In 2015, we conducted an Indiegogo Campaign for our innovative NightDrive Eyewear.  It is a customized approach to the challenges of night driving. (You can learn more about our Night Drivers here.)
By supporting this SightSaver Sunglasses Campaign today, you can receive both a pair of our

SightSaver Sunglasses AND a pair of our NightDrivers for the great price of $160 – which is a savings of $25 over the regular Campaign pricing of the two together – and well below their combined MSRP of $308. Just choose the “Combo Offer” perk to the right on this page.

Like you, your friends and family are subjected daily to the ravages of HEV rays. Think about getting an extra pair or two for someone special – and help protect their eyes, too. Parents and grandparents are excellent examples of those who can benefit most.
Whether for yourself or for others, you can help ensure the success of this campaign – and that success will help ensure the delivery of SightSaver Sunglasses to you and your loved ones.

Pass this web link  to others. Just like you, they can benefit from owning these innovative, state-of-the-art sunglasses. Share this campaign with others in whatever way works best for you: email, text, or post on Twitter, Facebook, and other social media. Support SightSaver Sunglasses and help this great offer go VIRAL!

Follow our Indiegogo Campaign by going to our Facebook page.  By clicking “like” there – and interacting – you can help spread the word. If you post  our Indiegogo campaign – on your personal Facebook page, this too lets your friends know about these hot new sunglasses. And maybe some of them are  the people who need it most!

This is dead simple. If you go out in the sun, then you should be wearing SightSaver Sunglasses – period! HEV rays are among the most damaging of the sun’s harmful rays – and our Melaneye-infused lenses protect against them and counteract their effects.

We're proud of the appearance of our sunglasses – they are as stylish as they are functional. But the eye-protecting Melaneye-infused into our lenses is the real story here – and is what makes SightSaver Sunglasses important to own and wear.
SightSaver Sunglasses look GREAT, provide superior eye protection, and perform much better than regular sunglasses.

SightSaver Sunglasses are perfect for anyone who takes part in outdoors activities and sports, especially where there is reflected sunlight. And they are for anyone concerned about age-related natural melanin loss, and the vision impairment it can cause. (Your parents and grandparents may be among those most at risk!)
They are also for anyone who spends time looking at digital devices with screens. Are you screen addicted like most people these days?
Let’s face it, that “hit list” includes practically EVERYONE!
Imagine how it will feel to KNOW you are doing your best to protect your precious eyes from the ravages of the sun’s FULL spectrum of harmful rays by owning a pair of SightSaver Sunglasses.

You can continue to leave your eyes unprotected against HEV rays and hope for the best. Or – you can make the decision to improve your eyesight protection and visual acuity by supporting this Indiegogo Campaign, and receive one or more pairs of SightSaver Sunglasses as your perk for doing so.
Bottom line: Why would you settle for sunglasses that only do half the job of protecting your precious eyes instead of doing the complete job you really need?
You can be among a savvy group who have chosen to do something CONCRETE about a REAL PROBLEM – instead of being someone who says they will do it when they “get around to it” – but then never do.
So, I’ll make this easy for you and give you your very own “Round Tuit” – and then you won’t have any excuse for not being among the first to own these important eye-protecting sunglasses.

It doesn’t matter what your age may be. Improved eye protection from the sun’s FULL spectrum of damaging rays can help ANYONE. It can be the margin of safety you need and deserve. You can have that peace of mind with your very own SightSaver Sunglasses.

Choose your perk from the choices to the right and be among the first to experience the full BENEFITS of this unique and innovative approach to better-protected vision. Reserve your SightSaver Sunglasses NOW – and then spread the word to help make sure this Indiegogo Campaign succeeds.
If you have a question – and it was not addressed and covered in our Presentation – be sure to ask by contacting us directly via the Indiegogo personal messaging system.
If you still wish to learn more details about NightDrive Eyewear, you can visit its Indiegogo Campaign Page.
Then come back here, and choose our attractive, discounted “Combo Offer” for a pair of both NightDrivers and SightSavers.

Light and professional grade Matte Box

column6: >VIKKIN MatteBox is the worlds lightest Super-Wide lens compatible and most compact Clip-On Matte Box system for photographers and videographers with possibility to rotate 4x4 inch filters.

column5: >VIKKIN MatteBox has two sets of flags. Larger set is for the best prevention of glare and lens flare. Larger flags can eliminate flare on lenses up to 16mm wide.
column9: >B82 MatteBox weighs only 400g with 3 flags or 250g with a small flag.
column13: >B82 comes bundled with worlds best Firecrest polarizer filter and has 2 or more slots for 4x4 inch resin or glass filters.
column18: >With Full Frame camera and 16mm lenses - NO vignetting!

column6: >IF You need (and you will!) a filter holder what is light and still has all professional features, then VIKKIN B82 can help You make Your own unique visuals, videos or pictures. VIKKIN B82 MatteBox is designed for all that!
column11: >Smaller flags still perform well in blocking out the sun or even backlight, but reduce the weight and size of the rig, making handling easier and enabling use of Gimbals and Steadicams.

column16: >My name is Viktor Koshkin  I have been working as a photographer and a cinematographer in Estonia for 20 years. I have been using filters through all my work. Some things are impossible or way too cumbersome to do in postproduction, so I prefer to get my images to look just the way I want them with only minor tweaks in post-production. I also developed a need for a portable Matte Box.
column20: >The existing Matte Boxes were too heavy and cumbersome for filming handheld cameras and DSLR-s. Also, I wasn't able to use my 4x4"" filters on wide angle lenses. So I decided to develop my own Matte Box system.

column5: >VIKKIN is the brand name, which I have created especially for that. It took me 3 Years to finally get the product ready in it's final form. Now it is finally ready: the VIKKIN B82 MatteBox. It is the MatteBox what
column13: > all my needs. I can use not only ND and CPL filters, but also MIST, SOFT and any other I desire.
column17: >I believe that my MatteBox can prove to be useful to many other likeminded photographers and cinematographers. I think that it will make our work simpler and more satisfying.  I have currently made 8 sets of B82 MatteBox systems. In order to make a first commercial run, I have decided to turn to Indiegogo for help. I need to raise 35 000 EUR to manufacture and deliver 50 sets of VIKKIN MatteBox systems.
column21: >If You would like to buy this product, or would just like to help me get this project off the ground, then  please check out the Perks and support this project!

Yours sincerely

Lighter SilkNet raises the brightness around the shaded parts of the image and lowers contrast considerably. Darker filters don't affect contrast. Colored net filters affect overall Color Gamut, primarily in the shaded areas, adding color tonality.

column1: VIKKIN MatteBox is the worlds lightest Super-Wide lens compatible and most compact Clip-On Matte Box system for photographers and videographers with possibility to rotate 4x4 inch filters.

VIKKIN MatteBox has two sets of flags. Larger set is for the best prevention of glare and lens flare. Larger flags can eliminate flare on lenses up to 16mm wide. B82 MatteBox weighs only 400g with 3 flags or 250g with a small flag. B82 comes bundled with worlds best Firecrest polarizer filter and has 2 or more slots for 4x4 inch resin or glass filters. With Full Frame camera and 16mm lenses - NO vignetting!

IF You need (and you will!) a filter holder what is light and still has all professional features, then VIKKIN B82 can help You make Your own unique visuals, videos or pictures. VIKKIN B82 MatteBox is designed for all that! Smaller flags still perform well in blocking out the sun or even backlight, but reduce the weight and size of the rig, making handling easier and enabling use of Gimbals and Steadicams.

About VIKKIN MatteBox Hello!My name is Viktor Koshkin  I have been working as a photographer and a cinematographer in Estonia for 20 years. I have been using filters through all my work. Some things are impossible or way too cumbersome to do in postproduction, so I prefer to get my images to look just the way I want them with only minor tweaks in post-production. I also developed a need for a portable Matte Box. The existing Matte Boxes were too heavy and cumbersome for filming handheld cameras and DSLR-s. Also, I wasn't able to use my 4x4"" filters on wide angle lenses. So I decided to develop my own Matte Box system.

VIKKIN is the brand name, which I have created especially for that. It took me 3 Years to finally get the product ready in it's final form. Now it is finally ready: the VIKKIN B82 MatteBox. It is the MatteBox what satisfies all my needs. I can use not only ND and CPL filters, but also MIST, SOFT and any other I desire. I believe that my MatteBox can prove to be useful to many other likeminded photographers and cinematographers. I think that it will make our work simpler and more satisfying.  I have currently made 8 sets of B82 MatteBox systems. In order to make a first commercial run, I have decided to turn to Indiegogo for help. I need to raise 35 000 EUR to manufacture and deliver 50 sets of VIKKIN MatteBox systems.If You would like to buy this product, or would just like to help me get this project off the ground, then  please check out the Perks and support this project!Only the sky is the limit!Yours sincerelyViktor Koshkin

Using VIKKIN MatteBoxVIKKIN MatteBox has already been tested and approved by several other photographers and cinematographers. Here's a video of B82 MatteBox in the hands of professional videographer and DOP - Christian Johannes Kask""Vikkin mattebox has everything you can ask for - durable, lightweight and is compatible with wide angle lenses. It is essential for light camera setups - handheld, steadicam and camera stabilizers like Glidecam, Ronin, MoVI where weight is limited. ""
The weight of the B82 together with the sun shading flags is just 400g with 3 flags or 250g with a small flag.

Larger flag set is for the best prevention of glare and lens flare. Smaller flags still perform well in blocking out the sun or other light source, but reduce the weight and size of the rig, improving handling and enabling easy use of Gimbals and Steadicams.
With the two 4x4"" front mounted filters there is no vignetting even at an super-wide focal length of 16 mm on a Full Frame camera (competing products support wide angles only up to 20 mm).

VIKKIN B82 MatteBox is manufactured from hight quality materials. B82 flags are manufactured from strong 7075 T6 grade, anodized, aluminum, what ensures their rigidity. Frame is made using 6000 grade,anodized, aluminum. Small plastic parts are 3D printed using strong Polyamide plastic.
B82 is directly mountable on a lens with Cokin Adapter Rings.
VIKKIN B82 MatteBox is compatible with 4x4'' filters
B82 is also equipped with a mount for a camera support system (15mm rods), which has a sliding function
The B82 flags are coated with an anti reflective flocking ( an option only available on a few high-end products).
The product will be sold together with a special polarizer filter made of Superwhite filter glass manufactured by Schott. The Polarizer is made by Formatt-Hitech and designed for the B82 by VIKKIN.

B82 MatteBox is also compatible with standard screw-in 82mm Ultra-Slim Circular Polarizers. They will not provide performance on par with the designated Formatt-Hittech filter, but can be used with no vignette on lenses up to 24mm and do not interfer with 4x4'' filters.
B82 is meant for lenses with a diameter of up to 82 mm
I personally check and adjust every part in my MatteBox system to ensure high fit and quality.
VIKKIN MatteBox is made by strong hands of Estonian men!
Manufacturing process, budget and progress so far
Prices are dependent on the order quantity, so in order to be able to sell this product at the current prices, I need to order parts for 50 sets.

This campaign has a flexible budget. I have currently built 8 sets of VIKKIN B82 MatteBox. And guarantee that even with incomplete funding I will be able to deliver this product to Every backer. I won't be making any profit in this case, but at least excited backers won't have to be disappointed. Other perks are also simple to make and will be going out as scheduled.

Our partners are ready to manufacture the necessary parts and I plan to ship all the Perks and orders in 3 months after the end of the campaign. Expect to receive Your VIKKIN MatteBox in November 2015! Early Bird supporters will have their order shipped within a week after their contribution. NB Quantity is limited! Smaller Perks will be shipped within 1 month after the end of the campaign.

As for the future plans - this project is scalable. My company and manufacturing partners are ready to produce up to 100 sets of B82 MatteBox systems monthly, in case the Indiegogo campaign proves to be successful. I am looking forward to getting my products out to the sets.
Every contribution goes towards capturing better images. I am forever thankful. Mad respect!
I will e-mail You a collection of sample photos made using the VIKIN B82 MatteBox and combination of following filters: Soft

line offering security, confidence and protection for the ostomate.”
Sebastian Wear was founded in 2011 as an inspiration and in
2014 reborn out of necessity because the market place did not offer  what we
were looking for in sexy, practical, sporty, active undergarments for ostomates.  What is an ostomate?  An ostomate is one of 750,000 people annually
who undergo a colostomy, ileostomy, or urostomy. (According to the American Ostomy Association) Curly Peters, the inspiration behind Sebastian Ostomate Wear by Sebastian Wear became one of those
with a consulting team discussing fashion versus
function of wearing an ostomy bag.  We came to the conclusion that there is a
huge gap between function and fashion  for wearers of ostomy bags.

column2: >How comfortable and secure do you feel in your underwear wearing an ostomy bag?  How leak proof, and secure is it?  Chances are that you really have not found that pair that has it all!  We want to change that!  We're committed to making underwear that’s as comfortable as can be, beautiful to look at, functional for your ostomy and technologically state-of-the-art to prevent leakage and slippage pouch.  So that you can feel good, look great, and have the confidence to live your life like you should.

column1: Protective Pocketing Pouch Technology™(PPPT).  A thin super absorbent pocket, it keeps away moisture and naturally eliminates odors, keeping you feeling clean, confident and dry all day long - without the feeling that you're wearing  a medical underwear or adult diaper.   Wearing Sebastian Wear gives that ""no worries"" confidence style you desire.….  Sebastian Wear takes into account the feelings of the wearer and creates a new
social design with aesthetics in mind.

column3: >We want to keep the conversation going.

column1: Launching Sebastian Wear is just the first step.  Whether or not you're able to support us at this point, join us as we continue to revolutionize what your underwear can do  when wearing an ostomy bag.  We value your input, suggestions and ideas.

After several years of research, development, and testing, we have submitted a patent application and produced prototypes of the designs presented in our video. These are “concept prototypes”. Our next step, is to finalize prototypes that are production-ready, while we simultaneously continue to develop additional styles and variations.  The amount we have chosen as our campaign target is meant to complete this step.  We cannot predict all of the obstacles we may encounter with such a unique structure, materials and uniqueness of our demographic.

Production timing: Delivering on time is always  a concern for us.  We have gone through dozens of prototypes and have our designs, patterns, packaging and fabric ready to go.  We have little experience with crowd funding  and are heading into this campaign aware of the potential set backs that can delay delivery.  We are structuring a strong logistical supply chain.
We will continue to give you updates along the way and as soon as we hit our $45,000 goal we will begin production.

Size Does Matter: Another concern is sizing, especially when it comes to ostomy underwear.  Thankfully, we've worked with the standard sizing chart and are taking into account the type of bag you are utilizing.  We are also available to talk at any time and want to help you find the pair that is right for you.  We are going to give you as much information as possible to help you pick the right pair.
Thank you for your support for Sebastian Wear
and the Sebastianmates...and in return for your support we are donating 5% to Ostomy Research and 5% to the SPCA.
Thank you for making our goals, dreams and hard

My name is Chauncey Dozier, owner and creative director of Mustache Pete Clothing.

All though most people consider me a designer, I see myself as a visionary. After pulling myself through some rough times, I set my sights on creating innovative, artistic clothing, and haven't looked back. While working in management and marketing at the Wagon Boutique in Brooklyn, I  discovered my hidden talent for fashion design. I also learned to ""style"" some music artists which led me to managing them, and led me to now be on the marketing team for UMMGI (Universal Management Marketing Group).

In 2011 my passion for design led me to create my own line. I wanted a new fresh look marked by a special logo, with a business that would make my customers feel taken care of and deliver to them really unique, artistic styles.

When I first started Mustache Pete Clothing, I had special packaging created for my clothes and  accessories. My customers loved it and knew they were getting their money's worth. The packaging not only protected their apparel, but such crafty packaging made customers feel appreciated and kept Mustache Pete's brand in their mind

After some searching, I finally come across MATADOG DESIGNS a company based in Greece to help make my vision  of packaging and production a reality. Most companies in New York City had minimum order requirements I couldn't reach. MATADOG worked with my little to no budget, but their location and shipping time and costs became prohibitive as I needed to expand and create more for my customers.

I started this campaign (Versa Printer/Cutter for Mustache Pete Clothing) in hopes to raise funds to purchase  the ROLAND VERSASTUDIO BN-20 PRINTER/CUTTER.  This great machine will enable me, right in my own studio, to take production of the unique look, premium packaging, tags, gifts, and services my customers love and deserve to new heights.  Over the years I've learned the importance of a satisfied customer. It's what keeps me and many businesses in business and makes what I create meaningful. I appreciate every customer or potential customer I encounter.

The Versa Printer will allow me create more innovative and customized designs and deliver them to my customers in a more time efficient and cost effective way.  This is the first step towards self-sufficiency in producing our own customized in-house line. With your donations we can purchase the Versa and create the unique packaging and other custom items for Mustache Pete and other similar small companies who are in the same position.

TIME IS URGENT as my latest line of clothing is in immediate need of in-house custom production and  exclusive packaging.  Mustache Pete Clothing has teamed up with LUCID to create an inspiring collection for Basketball's  All Star Weekend 2015, with plans to continue to create designs for a new sport each year. We've worked hard and are proud of our Mustache Pete All Star Collection. With the All Star Weekend 2015 upon us, we need to more efficiently produce and deliver orders now and throughout 2015 to our customers. This campaign and the launch of this new line  is so important to us.

We need almost $9000 dollars to purchase this printer. Hoping to acquiring the funds in a few days may seem unrealistic, but we don't believe so. That's why we're here on Indigogo because we believe this is where campaigns are successful and dreams are made real.

If we raise more than our goal we will invest in even more powerful machines that will allow us to produce nearly everything we sell in house, and give us the opportunity to expand to greater and more diverse ventures.

Fashion and apparel is a risky business that requires constant investing. Seasons change and so do trends. So when and if inventory doesn't move as projected, were stuck with inventory and loose funds to produce for seasons to come. This machine will allow us to creatively customize our lines in house and fulfill on orders ourselves as they arrive, reducing the need for risky high volume, high-cost, pre-order outside production.

Your donations mean so much to us. If you can't donate, remember sharing is caring. Spread the word. Share our story. Help us to deliver our creative, artistic and unique vision

Your donations small large or any type of contribution will help and gladly be appreciated.

Kindest regards

column1: The Volvorii Smart Shoe is Independent 3rd Party Dragon Innovation Certified.
In essence it is smart high heel shoe whose colors and design patterns can be controlled via a smartphone app to match outfits, among its other hidden sensorific capabilities to be unlocked.

To be Dragon Innovation Certified the Volvorii functional prototype was put through a battery of tests and physical examinations by the engineers and analysts at Dragon Innovation in Boston, MA, USA to make sure it works. For a glimpse of what those extensive tests entailed please see the official Volvorii Dragon Innovation Certificate here:

This did not happen overnight. For the past several months we've been working with Dragon Innovation through the certification process since they specialize in successfully bringing hardware products to market. Some of their customers include Pebble, Coin, FormLabs, Makerbot, LIFX, Sifteo, MOD-t, etc. So you may have seen their name on other crowdfunding campaigns.  Thus our quality of work is in the same league and had to pass the exact same high standards as the other successfully delivered crowdfunded projects listed above.
We understood that we are not a well known global brand with bottomless R&
column2: D pockets that one would typically expect to pull off this kind of bleeding edge work. Nor are we based in Silicon Valley. So we had to put the Volvorii functional prototypes through even more rigorous tests than others. Mostly because the Volvorii was designed to compete for the Louis Vuitton Prize.

column1: Step into the future today with the Int'l Award Nominated Volvorii.

The Volvorii is streamlined, has an embedded flexible electronic paper display, a Bluetooth LE module with battery wireless charging, elegantly positioned fastener accessory anchors both on the front and back of the shoe.
Style, comfort and convenience are at its epicenter.

The Volvorii’s clean, elegant, sturdy design brings gravitas, respect and formality in an unmistakable way. Whether you are a CEO at the apex of your industry or a prospective intern who got it as a graduation present going for your first interview in the corporate world, the Volvorii will carry you with grace.
Yes ladies, you can have your cake and eat it too!

You love the way your completely white Volvorii perfectly completed your work ensemble today but of course you can't wear the same outfit tomorrow. What's a girl to do ? No problem. Click the smartphone app button to change the shoes' flexible display and instantly change your completely white Volvorii to white with a dash of dark. The devil does not wear that shoe anymore, she now wears something with real 21st Century magic in it.
Going on a special date and want that more fashionable look. Simply click your smartphone app to change what is displayed on the flexible screen to show design patterns with a flare.
With the front fastener anchor you can customize your unique look by attaching detachable accessories to your smart shoe to match that ""oh so impossible but unique"" outfit that you love so much!

We plan to set up an online platform for users to buy a variety of accessories or request for those they want. While interested designers can make show stopping accessories for the Volvorii and list them on the platform.

With the front and back fastener anchors you can customize your unique total ensemble look to your heart’s content. You want diamond studs fasteners to bling your Volvoriis? Or your initials on a plate? Or golden chain with sparkles for the party? Or jewelry gems for the ultimate glamor Volvorii runway look? …Your imagination is the limit.

With the back fastener anchors you can attach a variety of detachable ankle straps that not only add a touch of more design elegance but also provide that added comfort advantage. Just the thing for when walking in your heels for long is called for.
No more guessing what is the right holidays gift for that special woman in your life.

a) A holidays gift she can customize in unlimited ways to fit her very unique personality/mood/atmosphere/etc or all those other reasons that even super computers have not yet figured out, let alone you, is a gift you can't go wrong with.
b) Simply put, here is a gift she will rave about and more importantly the guy who got it for her. And you know what that does to the Brownie Points Bank!
c) If feeling like totally impressing, the whole nine yards? Then pre-order the Developers Kit Perk, bond as you build a whole line of Smart Shoes together while making future plans.
The Volvorii smart shoe concept, to a notable extent, was inspired by the work at MIT’s Smart Customization Research Group <
column2: http://scg.mit.edu/ >
column3: . However, we are not in any way affiliated with the university or the Smart Customization Research Group.

column1: But we applied our own take on the similar theories and also read some of the best written words on the subject of smart customization including the following titles:
1-Infinite Possibility: Creating Customer Value on the Digital Frontier
2-Handbook of Research in Mass Customization and Personalization

In the Volvorii smart shoe we hope to bring you a shoe that has unprecedented levels of being simultaneously versatile and elegant. It is our true hope that from this work and with your support the future of smart fashion has just crossed a threshold. And you got to cross it first.

The comparison table below shows how the Volvorii stacks up against other well known customizable shoes. The goal is not to disparage anyone but merely to illustrate the value proposition we will provide to you our valuable backers.

We started from scratch, designed then built something many considered impossible up until we gave them live hands-on demos of our Innovation Award Nominated fully functional prototypes. Our goal all along was to bring this futuristic experience into the everyday life in a seamless way that brings out the fashionista and artista in all. The added advantage of easy customization to carter for each individual’s own tastes and occasion was paramount.

We deliberately did not overwhelm the Volvorii with mountains of tech. Instead we focused on just the essence of what we thought truly matters to enduring style and fashion in our fast changing world.
Now we need your support to reach the next level we cannot on our own without your help. The money we raise during our pre-orders campaign will allow us to pay for the FCC &
column3: mass manufacturing, refining the iOS and Android App, roll out an efficient online platform for users to purchase and sell smart shoe design patterns and accessories.

column1: In a way we just might be on the verge of creating a new micro industry for the world, but it is clear we cannot do it alone. Even simply spreading the word will be of tremendous help to making this a reality.
After your purchase, make sure you share your unique referral link with your friends and family. If 5 of your referrals purchase through your unique referral link, you get your Volvorii for free!
You will find your referral link upon completing your purchase. For any questions about the referral program please email jane@ishuu.com.
Wallen Mphepö | CEO

Wallen’s professional and academic background in Electronic Information Display technologies is covered in a dizzying array of ground breaking display technologies that have been featured in everything from The Wall Street Journal, to The Economist, to TechCrunch, to The New Scientist, to Popular Science, to IEEE/OSA Magazines &
column2: Journals and everything in between. He is also a reviewer for several IEEE and Optical Society of America’s Scientific and Technology Journals that touch on all facets of advanced &
column3: novel electronic information display technologies. For a peek at a sample of some of his work please  see: <a rel=""noopener nofollow"" style=""font-family: 'Benton Sans', Helvetica, sans-serif
>Mark Willner – UC Berkeley, MBA

column1: Having founded and ran several Technology companies in the past, Mark brings a real seasoned veteran's insight into how to run a multifaceted tech and fashion project such as ours. With the ability to see the grand vision and the know-how to have it executed on the day to day, his expertise holds the key to making the project delivery a success.

column3: >George Melnik – Kent State Univ, PhD

column4: >For the ground breaking technology platforms that have an electronic information display dimension to not just work but sing in synchrony, a steady hand at the tech helm is necessary. George is a rare find for our team. He is the kind of technology expert who brings in vast experience in CTO, R&amp
column5: D, Tech Advisory positions he has held in the past to bear on the project.

column1: Dan Tian | Bluetooth SW/HW Expert &
column2:
Founder of JUMA  

To say Dan is a Bluetooth expert might be a gross understatement. This unassuming guy, for a long while, was the only Chinese member on the international Bluetooth technology standards and direction steering committee. He has been working hands on with Bluetooth since 1999. He is deeply involved in the whole Bluetooth industry, including chipsets, standards, stack, software, embedded and system applications. JUMA offers Complete Bluetooth Smart Development framework, High Quality Bluetooth Manufacturing Supply Chain and Expert Bluetooth Smart consulting solutions for efficient product delivery.

column1: Jusheng Ren | Hardware Extraordinaire

When it absolutely has to be customized, miniaturized, fine tuned and soldered by hand - all in record time and still come out looking and working like it got the advanced robotic accuracy treatment, Jusheng is your man. Juice as we prefer to refer him as, is the guy behind the complete transformation of the three storey building of electronics boards in our very first prototype to a coin sized board that packs everything including Bluetooth smart, wireless battery charging and a completely new Display Driver Controller circuit that he built from scratch. If that is not an art form then we don’t know what is.

column3:
Shoe Critic

With a Masters Degree from Belgium in EU-China Business plus hands on experience working for a Dutch Business Development Consulting Firm, Jane knows how to transcend boundaries and get the message across. As a perennial high heel wearer herself, she insisted on making sure the Volvorii is something she would enjoy wearing everyday herself.

column1: Josh Fairbain, Morpho MFG | Shoe Manufacturing Partner

Josh Fairbain and his company Morpho MFG have been helping hardware makers for years. They are probably one of the most unsung heroes behind the scenes. They have made some of the most iconic and successful hardware crowdfunding projects not only get delivered, but delivered on time. We are glad to have them as our partner in this endeavor to bring about one of the most beautiful wearable fashion products we hope to share with the world. http://morphomfg.com/
Justin Wang – Founder | Beijing Maker Space |

column4: >Mega MengMeng – Tsinghua University |

column1: July 2009 – Idea takes form, but Wallen is still in grad school studying Display Technologies. Fashion Wearables’ potential still haven’t quite fully sunk into the mass consciousness. Result? Adviser is not impressed. Idea gets shelved.
January 2013- Arduino tinkering on the smart shoe begins
July 2013-Roadkill prototype version successfully tested and it performs with curated, though embarrassing, video to prove it.

November 2013- Iterated prototype. Results are much better and video recorded for proof. Less embarrassing so video clip is shared with friends to get much needed feedback. Personal trusted adviser and friend Dr. Pedzi, MIT views clip and verdict is “Idea has legs”

November 2013 – Met Dan Tian at Beijing Maker Space. The combined hands on expertise prove now it was time. Industrial grade prototype development begins in earnest. The rest of team slowly begin to fall into place.
January 2014 – Display driver control and Bluetooth LE electronic circuits merging and miniaturization to fit inside the sole of the shoe.
July 2014- Commercial grade prototype with custom miniaturized display driver control, BLE, battery wireless charging system.
September 2014 – Commercial grade prototype testing and refining for footwear mechanics.
January 2015 – Fully functional prototype becomes Dragon Innovation Certified
April 2015 – Final product design and engineering refinements
June 2015 – First batch of mass produced version of Volvorii undergoes extensive quality control.

While we have done all the home work and due diligence we possibly could, in advance, to make sure the engineering designs and mass manufacturing plans are sound we still understand that there are still risks. Some risks we can imagine and try to prepare for in advance while others we cannot foresee.
There are risks that our factories might need more time to manufacture, for that we have put a few contingencies in place.

There are risks that while we still refine the Volvorii, it might take longer to fix the Android App bugs we currently have.  For this we plan to also use some of the campaign funds to hire more software developers to make sure everything will work perfectly within our delivery time frame.
There are risks that we or the engineers and analysts at Dragon Innovation might not have foreseen despite having put our best foot forward during the six point check.

In essence what we would like to convey to our backers is that : While we have done all that we could think of to anticipate even natural disasters so as to make the execution of this project as sound as it could be, there are still risks. This is because there are always  challenges when manufacturing physical
products as we go through the FCC &amp
column2: CE certification processes, finish setting up the

column1: production lines as well as lining up the logistics to get the Volvorii safely in your hands.
If any unexpected issue does come up, we have resolved to dig in and do everything in order to make sure we will be as
close to our target delivery time frame as possible. And more importantly that we will deliver to you a high quality product.
We appreciate all your various forms of support, and we are very excited to have
you join us in this mission to usher in a new era of wearable displays.

Charging Time: 2 hours to fully charge from zero
Battery Life: Fully charged battery will last 2months-6months depending on usage
Do you really have a working prototype, why did I not see the full video?

Yes we do have fully functional prototypes that have been independently verified by Dragon Innovation in Boston, USA. We cannot show you the full videos of them here. This is because they were built for The Louis Vuitton Prize so they contain that global brand's trade marked logos and design patterns. We have not yet received written permission to show them on Indiegogo. However, some of the early prototypes' videos that are available for reference only can be found on our website.

Should I wash the Volvorii by dipping it in water?
flexible electronic paper display embedded in the leather. It is sealed to
prevent moisture from getting inside and damaging it. Even though it is sealed you still should not put water on the Volvorii.
Can I kick rocks with the Volvorii?
flexible electronic paper display that could be damaged by excessive force.
flexible electronic paper display surface and surrounding area and wipe off the
dirt on the rest of the shoe normally.

apps will be placed on our website as well as in the App store once our work on refining it is completed before the shipping date.
Do I have to install any software on my Volvorii ?
all the software it needs pre-installed you just need to download the app
onto your phone and start controlling the colors and design patterns of your Volvorii.

accessories on the future platform that we are still working on once it is completed.
What colors do you offer and is it possible to increase the different number of design patterns that can be displayed each separate time by a single Volvorii.
Volvorii in White and also in Black. Please see campaign photos for reference as well as the gallery link.

Yes we can increase the number of different design patterns that can be separately displayed. If there is enough demand for this feature we will add more design pattern looks each Volvorii can display as a Stretch Goal.

Does Volvorii collect my personal private data
No, we do not collect any of
your personal private data. Our goal is not tracking you or anything about
you. We just want you to enjoy looking good.

However, the Developer Kit Perk which we are considering adding as a Stretch Goal can be customized and enable various sensors to be added if you so choose. This is because the electronics board of the Volvorii has 4 free GPIOs to hack if one is so inclined.

current definitions the Volvorii is a wearable mobile display, another
variation of Google Glass that just takes a different form factor. With well
designed wearable displays the potential for an unknown talent to create a viral

there is potential to upset the balance. Just as the MP3 did to the music

Or your initials on a plate? Or golden chain with sparkles for the party? Or jewelry gems for the ultimate glamor Volvorii runway look? …Your imagination is the limit.

With the back fastener anchors you can attach a variety of detachable ankle straps that not only add a touch of more design elegance but also provide that added comfort advantage. Just the thing for when walking in your heels for long is called for.
No more guessing what is the right holidays gift for that special woman in your life.

a) A holidays gift she can customize in unlimited ways to fit her very unique personality/mood/atmosphere/etc or all those other reasons that even super computers have not yet figured out, let alone you, is a gift you can't go wrong with.
b) Simply put, here is a gift she will rave about and more importantly the guy who got it for her. And you know what that does to the Brownie Points Bank!
c) If feeling like totally impressing, the whole nine yards? Then pre-order the Developers Kit Perk, bond as you build a whole line of Smart Shoes together while making future plans.

The Volvorii smart shoe concept, to a notable extent, was inspired by the work at MIT’s Smart Customization Research Group < http://scg.mit.edu/ >. However, we are not in any way affiliated with the university or the Smart Customization Research Group.
But we applied our own take on the similar theories and also read some of the best written words on the subject of smart customization including the following titles:
1-Infinite Possibility: Creating Customer Value on the Digital Frontier
2-Handbook of Research in Mass Customization and Personalization

In the Volvorii smart shoe we hope to bring you a shoe that has unprecedented levels of being simultaneously versatile and elegant. It is our true hope that from this work and with your support the future of smart fashion has just crossed a threshold. And you got to cross it first.

The comparison table below shows how the Volvorii stacks up against other well known customizable shoes. The goal is not to disparage anyone but merely to illustrate the value proposition we will provide to you our valuable backers.

We started from scratch, designed then built something many considered impossible up until we gave them live hands-on demos of our Innovation Award Nominated fully functional prototypes. Our goal all along was to bring this futuristic experience into the everyday life in a seamless way that brings out the fashionista and artista in all. The added advantage of easy customization to carter for each individual’s own tastes and occasion was paramount.

We deliberately did not overwhelm the Volvorii with mountains of tech. Instead we focused on just the essence of what we thought truly matters to enduring style and fashion in our fast changing world.

Now we need your support to reach the next level we cannot on our own without your help. The money we raise during our pre-orders campaign will allow us to pay for the FCC & CE testing, tooling & mass manufacturing, refining the iOS and Android App, roll out an efficient online platform for users to purchase and sell smart shoe design patterns and accessories.

In a way we just might be on the verge of creating a new micro industry for the world, but it is clear we cannot do it alone. Even simply spreading the word will be of tremendous help to making this a reality.
After your purchase, make sure you share your unique referral link with your friends and family. If 5 of your referrals purchase through your unique referral link, you get your Volvorii for free!
You will find your referral link upon completing your purchase. For any questions about the referral program please email jane@ishuu.com.

Wallen’s professional and academic background in Electronic Information Display technologies is covered in a dizzying array of ground breaking display technologies that have been featured in everything from The Wall Street Journal, to The Economist, to TechCrunch, to The New Scientist, to Popular Science, to IEEE/OSA Magazines & Journals and everything in between. He is also a reviewer for several IEEE and Optical Society of America’s Scientific and Technology Journals that touch on all facets of advanced & novel electronic information display technologies. For a peek at a sample of some of his work please  see:    http://about.me/wallen
Mark Willner – UC Berkeley, MBA |  Post-Financing COO

Having founded and ran several Technology companies in the past, Mark brings a real seasoned veteran's insight into how to run a multifaceted tech and fashion project such as ours. With the ability to see the grand vision and the know-how to have it executed on the day to day, his expertise holds the key to making the project delivery a success.
George Melnik – Kent State Univ, PhD | Post-Financing CTO

For the ground breaking technology platforms that have an electronic information display dimension to not just work but sing in synchrony, a steady hand at the tech helm is necessary. George is a rare find for our team. He is the kind of technology expert who brings in vast experience in CTO, R&D, Tech Advisory positions he has held in the past to bear on the project.

Dan Tian | Bluetooth SW/HW Expert & Founder of JUMA  To say Dan is a Bluetooth expert might be a gross understatement. This unassuming guy, for a long while, was the only Chinese member on the international Bluetooth technology standards and direction steering committee. He has been working hands on with Bluetooth since 1999. He is deeply involved in the whole Bluetooth industry, including chipsets, standards, stack, software, embedded and system applications. JUMA offers Complete Bluetooth Smart Development framework, High Quality Bluetooth Manufacturing Supply Chain and Expert Bluetooth Smart consulting solutions for efficient product delivery.

When it absolutely has to be customized, miniaturized, fine tuned and soldered by hand - all in record time and still come out looking and working like it got the advanced robotic accuracy treatment, Jusheng is your man. Juice as we prefer to refer him as, is the guy behind the complete transformation of the three storey building of electronics boards in our very first prototype to a coin sized board that packs everything including Bluetooth smart, wireless battery charging and a completely new Display Driver Controller circuit that he built from scratch. If that is not an art form then we don’t know what is.

Jane Yang | Marketing & Shoe Critic With a Masters Degree from Belgium in EU-China Business plus hands on experience working for a Dutch Business Development Consulting Firm, Jane knows how to transcend boundaries and get the message across. As a perennial high heel wearer herself, she insisted on making sure the Volvorii is something she would enjoy wearing everyday herself.
Josh Fairbain, Morpho MFG | Shoe Manufacturing Partner

Josh Fairbain and his company Morpho MFG have been helping hardware makers for years. They are probably one of the most unsung heroes behind the scenes. They have made some of the most iconic and successful hardware crowdfunding projects not only get delivered, but delivered on time. We are glad to have them as our partner in this endeavor to bring about one of the most beautiful wearable fashion products we hope to share with the world. http://morphomfg.com/
Pedzi M. – MIT, Engineering PhD & Havard
Justin Wang – Founder | Beijing Maker Space |
Mega MengMeng – Tsinghua University | Fashion Design

July 2009 – Idea takes form, but Wallen is still in grad school studying Display Technologies. Fashion Wearables’ potential still haven’t quite fully sunk into the mass consciousness. Result? Adviser is not impressed. Idea gets shelved.
January 2013- Arduino tinkering on the smart shoe begins
July 2013-Roadkill prototype version successfully tested and it performs with curated, though embarrassing, video to prove it.

November 2013- Iterated prototype. Results are much better and video recorded for proof. Less embarrassing so video clip is shared with friends to get much needed feedback. Personal trusted adviser and friend Dr. Pedzi, MIT views clip and verdict is “Idea has legs”

November 2013 – Met Dan Tian at Beijing Maker Space. The combined hands on expertise prove now it was time. Industrial grade prototype development begins in earnest. The rest of team slowly begin to fall into place.
January 2014 – Display driver control and Bluetooth LE electronic circuits merging and miniaturization to fit inside the sole of the shoe.
July 2014- Commercial grade prototype with custom miniaturized display driver control, BLE, battery wireless charging system.
September 2014 – Commercial grade prototype testing and refining for footwear mechanics.
January 2015 – Fully functional prototype becomes Dragon Innovation Certified
February 2015 – Crowdfunding preparation and continue refinements
April 2015 – Final product design and engineering refinements
June 2015 – First batch of mass produced version of Volvorii undergoes extensive quality control.

While we have done all the home work and due diligence we possibly could, in advance, to make sure the engineering designs and mass manufacturing plans are sound we still understand that there are still risks. Some risks we can imagine and try to prepare for in advance while others we cannot foresee.
There are risks that our factories might need more time to manufacture, for that we have put a few contingencies in place.

There are risks that while we still refine the Volvorii, it might take longer to fix the Android App bugs we currently have.  For this we plan to also use some of the campaign funds to hire more software developers to make sure everything will work perfectly within our delivery time frame.
There are risks that we or the engineers and analysts at Dragon Innovation might not have foreseen despite having put our best foot forward during the six point check.

In essence what we would like to convey to our backers is that : While we have done all that we could think of to anticipate even natural disasters so as to make the execution of this project as sound as it could be, there are still risks. This is because there are always  challenges when manufacturing physical
products as we go through the FCC & CE certification processes, finish setting up the
production lines as well as lining up the logistics to get the Volvorii safely in your hands.
If any unexpected issue does come up, we have resolved to dig in and do everything in order to make sure we will be as
close to our target delivery time frame as possible. And more importantly that we will deliver to you a high quality product.
We appreciate all your various forms of support, and we are very excited to have
you join us in this mission to usher in a new era of wearable displays.
Please contact jane@ishuu.com with any questions whose answers you cannot find below.

Yes we do have fully functional prototypes that have been independently verified by Dragon Innovation in Boston, USA. We cannot show you the full videos of them here. We have not yet received written permission to show them on Indiegogo. However, some of the early prototypes' videos that are available for reference only can be found on our website.

flexible electronic paper display embedded in the leather. It is sealed to

column1: We all have a mini in our life who would totally rock some of our cool new clothing!
Help us fund the production of our jackets and shirts and we, in turn, will be donating a percentage of the contributions to Free Arts!

A major component of our vision is to be able to make a positive impact in our community. We have partnered with Free Arts and will be contributing a percentage of every sale directly to support their work with over 22,000 disadvantaged and homeless youth in LA every year.

We have a great relationship with our manufacturing partner, whose facility is just a few minutes drive from our office. We have complete confidence in our ability to deliver high-quality, local, and ethically produced jackets. Because of our knowledge and familiarity with production, we are able to streamline our turn around times to about half of what they would normally be so we can have jackets ready to ship in July!

We are a British Colombian family living in the U.K.  We have lived and travelled extensively in Colombia and  always admired the incredible crafts of Colombia's indigenous communities.
Having had the privilege of spending time with indigenous artisans, we have also learnt the many challenges they face in selling their work.

Through colonization and years of internal conflict Colombia's indigenous communities have been disproportionately affected. This has led to much insecurity and displacement and as a result, they have had little opportunity to sell their crafts internationally.

In 2017, whilst spending time with the Arhuaco people high in the mountains of the Sierra Nevada de Santa Marta, we began to explore how we could work together to bring these crafts and their stories to wider audiences, and support these artisans to build healthier and more stable incomes.
From there, our work has extended to three more artisan groups and our commitment has grown to build WATI collective into a platform for indigenous Colombian craft and heritage to be celebrated.

Seeing the increased interest in Colombian crafts globally, along with the growing movement of sustainable and ethical  businesses and organizations working with artisans, we're confident we can do this successfully.

Our vision for the future is that WATI collective becomes more than an outlet for crafts. Together with our artisans, we want to co-create a national network of support, volunteer opportunities, craft and textile trips and to support them in the development of their own community projects.
To effectively grow our business and support our artisans long-term we need further investment over the next year.

We want to upgrade our online platforms to reach a wider network and improve the production of our artisans, with the aim of creating a continual line of production, so we can significantly improve artisans economic opportunities, and share their incredible stories and heritage with the world.
Our campaign goal is to reach £10,000 in 30 days.

Our motivation for this project is in the strength, diversity and incredible traditions of the artisan  groups we work with, and in their practical needs to make a  living for themselves and their families.
• Creating fair and sustainable income for artisans.
• Celebrating heritage and tradition of indigenous communities.
• Cultivating connection to our things and the people who make them.
• Creative and innovative ways of working with social impact.
• Valuing the process - raising awareness of the slow nature of handmade techniques.
We have an amazing collection of crafts and wares from 4 different indigenous artisan groups all available as rewards when you support our campaign.
* If you would like to donate any amount without a perk please use the BACK IT button at the top of this page.

column1: *Please note - all our Werregue baskets are entirely unique and we cannot guarantee you the ones you see here. We have lots of variations and you will be able to select your colour and design preferences when the campaign has ended and we are ready to post to you. The magic of these baskets is no two are the same!
We are a British Colombian family living in the U.K.  We have lived and travelled extensively in Colombia and  always admired the incredible crafts of Colombia's indigenous communities.
Having had the privilege of spending time with indigenous artisans, we have also learnt the many challenges they face in selling their work.

Through colonization and years of internal conflict Colombia's indigenous communities have been disproportionately affected. This has led to much insecurity and displacement and as a result, they have had little opportunity to sell their crafts internationally.

In 2017, whilst spending time with the Arhuaco people high in the mountains of the Sierra Nevada de Santa Marta, we began to explore how we could work together to bring these crafts and their stories to wider audiences, and support these artisans to build healthier and more stable incomes.
From there, our work has extended to three more artisan groups and our commitment has grown to build WATI collective into a platform for indigenous Colombian craft and heritage to be celebrated.

Seeing the increased interest in Colombian crafts globally, along with the growing movement of sustainable and ethical  businesses and organizations working with artisans, we're confident we can do this successfully.

Our vision for the future is that WATI collective becomes more than an outlet for crafts. Together with our artisans, we want to co-create a national network of support, volunteer opportunities, craft and textile trips and to support them in the development of their own community projects.
To effectively grow our business and support our artisans long-term we need further investment over the next year.

We want to upgrade our online platforms to reach a wider network and improve the production of our artisans, with the aim of creating a continual line of production, so we can significantly improve artisans economic opportunities, and share their incredible stories and heritage with the world.
Our campaign goal is to reach £10,000 in 30 days.

Our motivation for this project is in the strength, diversity and incredible traditions of the artisan  groups we work with, and in their practical needs to make a  living for themselves and their families.
Creating fair and sustainable income for artisans.
Celebrating heritage and tradition of indigenous communities.
Cultivating connection to our things and the people who make them.
Creative and innovative ways of working with social impact.
Valuing the process - raising awareness of the slow nature of handmade techniques.
We have an amazing collection of crafts and wares from 4 different indigenous artisan groups all available as rewards when you support our campaign.
* If you would like to donate any amount without a perk please use the BACK IT button at the top of this page.

Lingerie should make all women everywhere feel empowered and confident. It’s time we created lingerie that resonates in the language and with the cultural cues that connect with brown skin women. 

 

Have you ever gone to buy something in a 'nude' tone - only to realise their version of nude is completely different to your own?
How many times are we, as brown skin women ignored from mainstream fashion?

We want to bring freedom to brown skin women to wear what they want, whenever they want. In the lingerie industry, nine major players manage more than 400 lingerie brands around the globe and yet there is still a ""one nude fits everybody"" mindset. There are only a few new comers entirely dedicated to brown skin women. Which is why, now is our chance to enter the market. We want to bring to light just how very beautiful and diverse our brown skin women are, and offer you the opportunity to celebrate your brilliance.

Having the right lingerie and hosiery helps you choose your perfect outfit for the day, which in turn helps you to start the day confidently and positively. We think freedom and confidence are beautiful presents and everyone deserves to feel that way.

 

We have had international success with our tights and knee highs range. But now our customers, women like you and me, have asked for more! We want to be able to wear sheer and white tops without our bras showing. We want to be professional in the work environment and glamorous on the streets, that is why we are launching our brand new lingerie range. 

 

The women we interviewed for our new range expressed the need to have sexy underwear that also fit well. So besides having our four nude shades that perfectly match brown skin tones, we paid attention to the shape of the lingerie. We took the time necessary to design our bras and panties with brown skin women's sexy silhouettes in mind.

A bra is one of the most complex garments to create but we have worked hard and have eagerly taken up this new and exciting challenge. We found our manufacturer and honed in our designs to give women what they asked for.

 

 

Our bras come in two different designs: V Wire (bralette style) or Regular Underwire

 

 

Our panties also come in two different designs. You can choose either high waist panties or thongs.

Our lingerie will be available in the following sizes:

 

 

 

 

We have had success internationally both with press and stockists for our hosiery and we are busy maintaining and making new relationships for our lingerie range too. We currently have interest from shops in Paris and London. How amazing is that, and all because they share the same vision, they all believe nude comes in many shades.

 

Other than lingerie, we also have tote bags, African pendants and our tights

 

Our curvy range will cover the following sizes:

As well as funding the production of our lingerie, we will give 10% of our funding to charity partner in DRC.

Our chosen charity is BEBUC. This educational charity in Democratic Republic of Congo provides scholarships for children at primary, secondary and tertiary levels of education.

(Short fun fact: ""Venn"" is ""friend"" in Norwegian, Venntage is a combination of Venn and Vintage :))

There are many arenas for
second-hand shopping and social networking, but no one that have taken
advantage of the great potential that lies in combining and conceptualizing
Second-hand fun, trendy</u> <u>and a “must have”</u> amongst the population
Norway had the highest personal consumption than other European countries per
inhabitant (SSB 2013). Venntage have personal economic benefits as the users can
save money by sharing their wardrobe.
percent of all global greenhouse gas emissions come from the textile industry. Venntage
can contribute to cut emissions from the textile sector.
Norwegian second hand webpages and shops such as Finn.no,
Fretex and Uff are good venues for buying, sell, give away used clothes, but our
user testing says several hesitate to buy used clothes from strangers. Venntage
makes it easy, intuitive and safe as we use the digital social
media arena, where you can share clothes and tips either with your
closest friends or with a wider network, based on user needs.
“It is not what you wear, but how you wear it” is a well-known phrase<b><i>. Clothes
and fashion are timeless, especially if it is sustainable. There are social
pressure, especially amongst younger girls in having the most expensive

designer apparel, which we hope Venntage will contribute to decrease.

Hello Indegogo!

 We are the company Smart Security, creators of xtorch,  the smart backpack that can save lives, revolutionizing driving light vehicles through the city.
Xtorch was born because we live firsthand the risks of
bicycle driving at night, which has led us to develop this innovative project
keeping in mind the comfort, ease of use and innovation, which took us to
discover a new material never used before that resists rain, direct fire and
friction equivalent to 130 km on the pavement, extreme resistance! Xtorch gives
you complete 360 ​​degree visibility and visual range of more than 500 meters
away. You also have the possibility to signal neighboring vehicles with
steering and brake lights thanks to its precise adjustable brake control
Xtorch is filled with all kinds of sensors! This intelligent
case can alert your family and emergency services in case of accident, turn all
their emergency lights -to make visible if you separate yourself from your
bicycle- and alert a caregiver if he approaches any Smartphone to read your
medical record, making it more efficient and prompt the medical attention.
Xtorch has been tested by cyclists, motorcyclists, skaters

column2:
>
About the Founder 

I am probably going to confuse you, but I recently graduated from the Culinary Institute of America in New York. Don't get me wrong, I LOVE everything having to do with food, but I can't ignore my passion for non profit organizations.

column1: When I was 3 years old, I was diagnosed with Neuroblastoma (adrenal cancer) and going through that battle and being able to talk about it today motivates me to no end to help those children that are diagnosed with cancer every day.
I am the oldest sibling of 3 and proud to be from Baltimore, MD. Through BLEND I want to be able to make a difference in the lives of children having to spend days and weeks in the hospital.

column2:
>What you will get! 

Did you do a great thing today and donate to an amazing cause? Heres our thank you! 

  • I am looking for $8,500 to be able to really launch this organization the right way, and not have to lower the quality or quantity of BLEND Bracelets produced because of financing reasons. 
  • Make a donation and become a part of the BLEND team and be updated when BLEND does something great!
  • Most of the funds will be directed back into the organization to be able to purchase enough materials to produce the BLEND Bracelets to ship out to customers, but the funds will also be used towards creating a bigger/better/badder website :)

>Our Cause 

BLEND is dedicated to being a symbol of strength and support for the 43 children a day who are diagnosed with cancer. Like all those children, and their families, our beads are unique and strong which have an aesthetic that appeals to everyone around the country! BLEND will make semi-annual donations to different pediatric cancer centers around the country. 

  • Our donations aren't being thrown into the usual cloud of donations that is put towards research, which is still an amazing and necessary cause to fund. BLEND donates directly to the children in the hospital who are fighting the fight of their life. 
  • I have founded another fundraiser in the Baltimore area and to date have brought in over 1,100 brand new toys and $28,000 which all went to buying the children toys, books, games, dvd's, etc... 
  • All of us have someone we know that has had to go through the battle of cancer, lets help those that are going through that right now.

>Other ways to help! 

Share us on social media! We are on Facebook/Twitter/Instagram! 

  • Facebook.com/BLENDBracelets
