Locus Pocus featured in VentureBeat!
column6:
schema=youtu"" width=""580"">

The Locus Pocus Bond - A Full-Function $10 Tracker
column7:
>Help us build the $10 Locus Pocus Bond. The Bond is a 47mm / side triangle with a hole for a key ring. The tracker is an incredibly thin 6.7mm. It uses a CR2016 battery, which is user-replaceable, and contains a beeper for easy finding from a nearby phone. And if you have your Bond but not your phone, press the button on the Bond and it will find your phone for you.


The Bluetooth tracker industry is broken

The current industry model of selling hardware and providing the software for free puts upward pressure on the price of trackers and divides the lost and found communities. By generating revenue through effective crowdsourcing of the lost and found, we can afford to sell an equivalent tracker significantly closer to cost, all while providing a better level of service through a larger crowdsourcing community.

Recovering a lost item rarely happens

If you buy a proprietary Bluetooth tracker, the deck is stacked against you.

Most tracker manufacturers provide their own apps for tracking only their hardware, so only a small share of the whole community is being crowdsourced by each app.

Trackers are expensive

Most trackers today cost at least $25 each, with some, like Tile, even requiring a yearly replacement. 

Success is failure

If, against all odds, a proprietary tracker manufacturer eventally achives enough adoption and community participation to provide a reasonably effective crowdsource GPS, you, and everyone else, are now locked in to using only their tracker.

The solution

Track any tracker you own using the Locus Pocus app. If you want to save a lot of money on your next tracker, buy a Bond. Add your Fitbits, too.*

Locus Pocus (the app)

This summer Thinking Source released an iOS app and cloud service called Locus Pocus, which provides crowdsource GPS for the most popular trackers. No hardware lock-in. Not now, not ever. The Android app is in progress, with a two month estimate to completion.

Locus Pocus provides a Finder's Fee when a user finds a lost item and its location is delivered to the device owner. This payment is financed by charging the device owner a small fee to unlock the location. If this project is successful, anyone with a registered Bond will receive all future location updates for all of their registered devices for free.

The Bond (the tracker)

It’s not enough to just track all these different trackers and Fitbits.* To really get this community growing, we need to provide a reasonably priced tracker, as close to cost as can be managed. From conversations with suppliers, we believe we can do this for $10 a unit, and at larger volumes, possibly quite a bit less.

Help us produce the $10 Locus Pocus Bond.

column1: The first 200 contributors get to choose the next Bond color!

Risks and challenges

We have received and thoroughly tested the prototype Bond from our supplier including integration with the Locus Pocus app. We have successfully negotiated a supplier price which will allow us to sell each Bond for only $10 / unit.

The greatest risks are around delivery dates and long-term product quality. 

We've been told four weeks before the first batch would be complete, and the test samples have been sent promptly, with timely and clear communication. 

The samples appear comparable in quality to the mainstream trackers on the market today. 

Our supplier is large and reputable, and the base parts of the tracker are industry standard (e.g., a TI bluetooth module). The larger the order we can place, the higher priority service we will get.

The more we can order at once, the better the margin, which means we can invest more to promote and grow your new lost and found community.


*Tile, TrackR, XY, Chipolo, PebbleBee and Fitbit are all trademarks of their respective owners.  Locus Pocus is not sponsored or endorsed by or affiliated with any of these brands.

column2:
>

Hi, we're makers of 100% vegan &
column3:
sustainable sneakers that are inspired by the Mediterranean.

Are you a game changer who believes in sustainable fashion? We’re proud to be eco-friendly, vegan and offer you an eco-friendly alternative to your everyday sneaker — with our eco-friendly materials, glue-free shoemaking process
column4:
we not only offer you an eco-friendly sneaker but also a cruelty-free shoe that respects animals and the environment. 

First, we select PETA-approved vegan and all-natural materials, including breathable eco-cotton upper material and durable natural rubber for the soles. These conscious choices not only save animals’ lives but also help reduce our environmental impact.

Then, every pair of shoes is handmade by artisans in ethical workshops in Spain, minimizing the environmental impacts and harsh labor practices that plague mass production in the footwear industry.

The result is a versatile canvas sneaker you can feel good about wearing.

But we don’t stop there — we’ve teamed up with Reforestation Projects so that with every pair sold we plant two (2) trees around the world, restoring healthy forests and employing local villagers with fair wages. 

By supporting our campaign, you make a choice for the kind of world you want to live in — and the kind of world you want to create for future generations.
column5:
>

The St. Tropez is a versatile sneaker that delivers everyday comfort and style — perfect for travel, work, and play.

column6:
>

It is estimated that over 1 billion animals are slaughtered every year to support the leather and meat industry. While most leather is made from cowhide, it can also come from horses, lambs, cats, and dogs. Before the cattle are killed in slaughterhouses, their short lifespans are often spent in a state of stress, penned up with hundreds of other cows without room to graze.

Our shoes are Vegan approved, so you can feel confident that you’re supporting a worthy cause with every step you take.
column8:
>

Natural rubber is durable, flexible, and naturally antibacterial. Synthetic rubber is cheaper than natural rubber, but it’s derived from an oil byproduct and contains various chemicals which are known to cause asthma, cancer, liver damage, and other life-threatening illnesses. The St. Tropez natural rubber soles and midsoles provide a higher quality, longer lasting fit, without the array of harmful chemicals found in synthetic rubber.

Cotton is a soft, breathable, and resilient fabric: it won’t trap heat or odors like oil-based fabrics. The St. Tropez canvas sneaker features textured cotton upper and a gabardine cotton inner lining, for breathable wear every day.

 

Our unique vulcanized shoemaking process creates a lasting bond between the canvas upper &
column9: rubber sole through heat. This process makes for a longer lasting bond between the sole and the shoe upper, it also adds flexibility to the shoe. Unlike cold cement shoemaking processes, the vulcanization process is glue-free, which in turn makes for a healthier shoe, for workers, for the planet and for you! Win, Win, and Win!
column10:
>

 

Eco-Friendly Mission: We Plant 2 Trees for Every Pair Sold

As planet lovers and #gamechangers who believe in a better world, we also believe in protecting the environment.

Like you, we want to do our part to help reverse the alarming rate of carbon emissions in the atmosphere and the disastrous impacts of climate change that threaten all life on this planet.

This is why we’ve partnered with Reforestation Projects, that hire villagers to replant native tree species in their local areas that have been deforested, such as Ethiopia, Madagascar, and Haiti.

When you buy a pair of our shoes, we plant two trees through Reforestation Projects.

Our shoes create big steps for positive change across the globe. Do good for people, for the environment, and for animals, all while looking good.
column11: >GET READY TO BE A #CHANGEMAKER
column13: '>We’ve been passionate for years in designing a timeless collection of sneakers and making a sustainable eco-friendly brand— we can’t wait to offer an alternative option to sneaker lovers around the world. From our plant-a-tree partners to our artisans, we are so grateful and excited that we are now ready to bring this wonderful planet-friendly product to you!
column15: >YOUR CONTRIBUTION COUNTS
column17: '>We believe that by being the change, we can make the change the planet needs. It’s up to all of us to make tomorrow kinder. With your contribution, whether big or small, will make an impact for a more sustainable planet and help us bring to market the most eco-friendly Vegan canvas sneaker alternative.
column19: '>Your contribution supports the launch of our all-natural and planet friendly — available in 4 colors. Pick your favorite today!

","Hi, we're makers of 100% vegan & sustainable sneakers that are inspired by the Mediterranean.Are you a game changer who believes in sustainable fashion? We’re proud to be eco-friendly, vegan and offer you an eco-friendly alternative to your everyday sneaker — with our eco-friendly materials, glue-free shoemaking process
column24: we not only offer you an eco-friendly sneaker but also a cruelty-free shoe that respects animals and the environment. First, we select PETA-approved vegan and all-natural materials, including breathable eco-cotton upper material and durable natural rubber for the soles. These conscious choices not only save animals’ lives but also help reduce our environmental impact.Then, every pair of shoes is handmade by artisans in ethical workshops in Spain, minimizing the environmental impacts and harsh labor practices that plague mass production in the footwear industry.The result is a versatile canvas sneaker you can feel good about wearing.But we don’t stop there — we’ve teamed up with Reforestation Projects so that with every pair sold we plant two (2) trees around the world, restoring healthy forests and employing local villagers with fair wages. By supporting our campaign, you make a choice for the kind of world you want to live in — and the kind of world you want to create for future generations. The St. Tropez is a versatile sneaker that delivers everyday comfort and style — perfect for travel, work, and play.

column1: Two Trees Planted with Every Purchase #begreen

It is estimated that over 1 billion animals are slaughtered every year to support the leather and meat industry. While most leather is made from cowhide, it can also come from horses, lambs, cats, and dogs. Before the cattle are killed in slaughterhouses, their short lifespans are often spent in a state of stress, penned up with hundreds of other cows without room to graze.Our shoes are Vegan approved, so you can feel confident that you’re supporting a worthy cause with every step you take.Natural rubber is durable, flexible, and naturally antibacterial. Synthetic rubber is cheaper than natural rubber, but it’s derived from an oil byproduct and contains various chemicals which are known to cause asthma, cancer, liver damage, and other life-threatening illnesses. The St. Tropez natural rubber soles and midsoles provide a higher quality, longer lasting fit, without the array of harmful chemicals found in synthetic rubber.Cotton is a soft, breathable, and resilient fabric: it won’t trap heat or odors like oil-based fabrics. The St. Tropez canvas sneaker features textured cotton upper and a gabardine cotton inner lining, for breathable wear every day. Our unique vulcanized shoemaking process creates a lasting bond between the canvas upper & rubber sole through heat. This process makes for a longer lasting bond between the sole and the shoe upper, it also adds flexibility to the shoe. Unlike cold cement shoemaking processes, the vulcanization process is glue-free, which in turn makes for a healthier shoe, for workers, for the planet and for you! Win, Win, and Win!   Eco-Friendly Mission: We Plant 2 Trees for Every Pair SoldAs planet lovers and #gamechangers who believe in a better world, we also believe in protecting the environment.Like you, we want to do our part to help reverse the alarming rate of carbon emissions in the atmosphere and the disastrous impacts of climate change that threaten all life on this planet.This is why we’ve partnered with Reforestation Projects, that hire villagers to replant native tree species in their local areas that have been deforested, such as Ethiopia, Madagascar, and Haiti.When you buy a pair of our shoes, we plant two trees through Reforestation Projects.Our shoes create big steps for positive change across the globe. Do good for people, for the environment, and for animals, all while looking good. GET READY TO BE A #CHANGEMAKERWe’ve been passionate for years in designing a timeless collection of sneakers and making a sustainable eco-friendly brand— we can’t wait to offer an alternative option to sneaker lovers around the world. From our plant-a-tree partners to our artisans, we are so grateful and excited that we are now ready to bring this wonderful planet-friendly product to you!  YOUR CONTRIBUTION COUNTSWe believe that by being the change, we can make the change the planet needs. It’s up to all of us to make tomorrow kinder. With your contribution, whether big or small, will make an impact for a more sustainable planet and help us bring to market the most eco-friendly Vegan canvas sneaker alternative.Your contribution supports the launch of our all-natural and planet friendly — available in 4 colors. Pick your favorite today!",10.0,0,"1 Campaign

column3: (among other fashion pieces for men) the Saber-T-shirt. The Saber-T-shirt is exclusively designed to improve upon the commonly known t-shirt while introducing versatility and functionality without compromising style or good taste.

column1: We have done years of research on three continents and discovered that men utterly love this beautiful piece of fashion innovation. Once you've experienced a Saber T-shirt, you will be transformed into the better you.  We are launching this campaign, to get your unbiased opinion while seeking your help to bring this fantastic piece of men's garment to the forefront! Your generous contribution will help us to get this base product to market so that it will be readily available to all of you in the know. Don't miss a chance to be a part of this new trend in men's fashion. Join us now!
1. Get your first Saber-T-shirt for $65.00 and receive 40% off the next shirt.
2. Get three shirts and receive 20% off your total sale.
3. Get four shirts and receive one for free.
4. Invite a friend to get two shirts and receive 20% off your next purchase.

The Saber-T-shirt also comes with embroidered logo and symbols such as zodiac and or the celestial planes. You can choose a symbol of your liking. If you pre-order three shirts, you get one shirt with a logo and your colour choice. Colours come in white, blue, pink and black
column2: also receive a free A Man Dressed Magazine, a great way to know us better.

column1: With each purchase you make, you'll enable the production of exceptional quality and one of the most innovative men's garment in the fashion industry.
We are here now, on the Indiegogo platform, seeking your help in raising some of the funds need to start the first run production and distribution. Our funding goal through this campaign is $33,000.

If by chance, we were not able to meet our funding goal, it would only take longer to produce, but we will not give up. Balances from this campaign will go to advertising, quality control and production. A portion of the proceeds has also been pledged to a make it right charity.

In return for your support, you get the opportunity to be a part of this great inspiration with the potential to become a worldwide brand. And as our way of saying thank-you, we have also come up with some excellent rewards and incentives

The designs in the ""The Creative Collection"" (the first collection released by The Silence Co) are inspired by the creative process which every artist, creator, innovator, or entrepreneur navigates through.

The 1st design, ""Silence"", features a sound-wave design that flatlines, representing the purposeful use of silence in the creative process. Silencing the distractions and noises that constantly fight for our attention allows us to rest, reset, and hear our own voice so we can create something that is uniquely us.

The 2nd design, ""Vision"", features the eye design, representing the creative vision we get which pushes us toward our goal. This is often the most exciting step in the creative process. Vision is what sets our goal and it is what inspires us to push forward til the end.

The 3rd design, ""Focus"", features the crosshair design, representing the steady focus needed to see your vision through to til it is complete. This is often the most difficult step in the creative process, where the artist, creator, innovator, or entrepreneur experiences the thrills of progress and the frustration of failures, but with Focus, in the end they see the rewards of hard work, and feel pride in what they've accomplished

The 4th design, ""Legacy"", features the coat of arms design which holds all previous symbols from the collection, with an additional symbol made up of two arrows intersecting through a circle. This symbol represents the people our finished product touches. In that moment we all share something in common even though our lives take us all in different directions.
The Silence Co is a clothing and lifestyle brand dedicated to celebrating artists and creatives everywhere.
Our goal is to give a sense of unity to artists and creators.
The first way we will do that is through making cool and unique clothing that gives people a sense of pride and belonging.

I had a dream to create a clothing brand for several years and this year I decided it was time to bring it to life. Because we are representing artists I wanted the products to be handmade. Over the past few months we have researched the art of screen printing. We bought multiple screens, emulsions, inks, squeegees, reclaiming chemicals and tools, a screen printing press, and a curing unit. We have run tests to get the results and quality we are looking for and now we are ready to share this with YOU!

We are asking for you to support The Silence Co by sharing this campaign and purchasing anything from a sticker to our ""Creative Collection Plus"" package, which includes all 5 shirts and more! Each shirt order will come with a photo of your shirt(s) being hand printed as well as a bumper sticker to show your support everywhere you go!

We would love it if we reached our full goal, or even beyond! But if for any reason we don't, any funds that are raised will still get what you what you ordered all the same, and help The Silence Co become a reality.

We have already personally invested in the startup of this brand, because we believe in it! By becoming our first supporters, you will help us be able to keep investing in and expanding the brand. We have spent many days and nights pouring into designing, redesigning, researching, and learning a new art because we believe this brand will be something great!
PLEASE SHARE this campaign and spread the word about The Silence Co!

Stay home. Snuggle up. Support the fight.

BIG LOViE is creating a cozy, cuddly way to support the COVID crisis fight.

As the makers of soft, snuggly products infused with compassion and kindness, we’re producing a special-edition blanket and hat with 25% of proceeds going to fight the Coronavirus pandemic. This is a perfect way to bring you and those you love warmth and comfort during these unusual times—and beyond. BIG LOViE ‘We Are One’ blankets and hats make meaningful gifts for family, friends, far-flung relatives and hardworking people in your community who deserve heartfelt thanks.

At our essence, we are one. Unity matters, now more than ever, in our neighborhoods, our nation and our world. That’s the beautiful message that will appear in light, airy feather threads across the blanket:
WE ARE ONE. Earth. People. Love.

BIG LOViE blankets are famous for their softness and their unique positive messaging, conveying warm and encouraging sentiments. Sewn on the side on our Ultrasuede label we've added a message that pulls the mission behind this campaign together:
Stronger Together. Completely Connected. Kindness Within.

Wrap Up and Support the Cause.

We’re aiming to do two things:
• Raise money to fund medical supplies, deploy emergency staffing to U.S. public health agencies, provide support to vulnerable communities and much more.
• Create and deliver blankets and hats that spread comfort, togetherness, connection and unity.

Our goal is to raise $20,000 to fund the production and delivery of the blanket and to donate 25% to the CDC Foundation’s All of Us Combat Coronavirus Campaign. But even if we don’t reach the full goal, we will fulfill all perks and donate 25% to the CDC's campaign, supporting public health measures to help stop the spread of the Coronavirus.

 

Two great ways to get cozy.

'WE ARE ONE' BLANKET

Made of the same incredibly soft micro-chenille and feather yarn that made the BIG LOViE Dream Collection blankets famous, the ‘We Are One’ blankets are big and beautiful! At 48” X 72”, the ‘We Are One’ blanket will wrap around you like a sweet, soft bear hug.

'WE ARE ONE' COTTON BEANIE HAT

Deliciously soft and wonderfully wearable, the BIG LOViE ‘We Are One’ beanie hats are made of 100% ribbed cotton. Choose from three colors: ivory, black or heather gray.

Why is this project important?

We are running this campaign now because the fight is now. The need for help is now. But we want to sustain that unifying message to the world long after this crisis ends.  

We’ve heard it said that crises can bring people together, and COVID certainly has. Like you, we’re so inspired to see people doing their part in staying safe while helping others. It has been an incredible display of compassion and kindness. With this campaign, we hope to start a movement that will continue this feeling of togetherness and unity. We can’t wait to finalize creating the ‘We Are One’ blankets and beanie hats—and then watch how they are purchased and shared to spread the BIG LOViE love.

 

Together, we’ve got this.

The ‘We Are One’ blanket is a new design of a BIG LOViE customer favorite: the Dream Collection blanket.  

We’ve already started the process and are creating samples of the new design. We're moving straight into production once colors are approved so we can get your blankets to you as soon as possible. Here is a summary of the timeline:
• Indiegogo campaign and ‘We Are One’ blanket and beanie hat production: April thru June 2020

column2:
> 

Say hello to BIG LOViE.

BIG LOViE launched in 2019 to bring soft, luxurious blankets featuring positive and uplifting messaging to the world. BIG LOViE products are available at biglovie.com and select boutiques. Our blankets have been such a hit, we’re rapidly expanding our product line to include hats, scarves, hoodies and other lovable items that make people feel cozy, happy and loved.

Rosie DeSimone and Sheba Fideler are long time friends and co-founders of BIG LOViE.

Giving back is always part of our mission. In addition to our Share the Love program, which gives blankets to children in need, BIG LOViE regularly supports charitable organizations and their fundraising efforts.
column3:
> 

Visit our MEDIA page.
column4:
> 

Get to know us on SOCIAL MEDIA @mybiglovie.

column2:
>

 

We can’t do this without you. This is a project from people, for people, and about people. 

BIG LOViE is all about bringing you products that make you feel good and help you make others feel good, too.

With our WE ARE ONE campaign, you can proudly be part of the effort to bring this message to life. Tell the world you believe WE ARE ONE, in today’s crisis and tomorrow.

Thank you for your time and thank you to our BIG LOViE tribe for your constant encouragement and support.

Hey, everyone — help us make some noise! Please use your social media to share this campaign!

Love and snuggles, 

Rosie + Sheba, Cofounders, BIG LOViE

• GOTO is an intuitive gps navigation system designed for motorcyles.
• Display clearly the most relevant informations, readable in a fraction of second.
• Sunlight readable Oled display (20x brighter than LCD display)

Turn by turn function 

Goto display the best way to your destination from your current gps location.

A quick look on Goto will show you the most relevant information instantly.


How it works 

Simply open our application on your smartphone
or tablet, enter your destination then the application communicate

automatically with the device via bluetooth.

Gotobikers can easily configure speed limit warning and update poi database.


Goto app for Android

The Goto application is compatible with sygic map(licence) and osmand map(free) running on Android.

Maps are precharged and doesn't need external connection.

Goto is exclusively compatible with Android, we will propose an ios version for our next campaign.
column3:
/>


Voice control

Want to change your destination or find the

column1: nearest POI from your location? Simply talk to the microphone installed in your helmet then GOTO
will show you the way (Perk no.5).
column2:
/>


100% Customizable

  • Case are available in various colors: Natural grey, dark grey, blue, red, purple, chrom and gold plated.

column1:
All motorbikes compatible

Goto can be installed on any kind of motorcycles even quad scooters and cars.



How to install Goto

GOTO is compatible with all motorcycles. It only take few minutes to install.

To power the module two wires have to be connected to the batterie.

For the gear indicator one wire to the rpm sensor and one wire to the speed tacho. 


Main specs
• 65K colors Oled display, contrast 2000:1 view angle 160°

Display clearly the most relevant informations, readable in a fraction of second.
Sunlight readable Oled display (20x brighter than LCD display)

Turn by turn function Goto display the best way to your destination from your current gps location.A quick look on Goto will show you the most relevant information instantly.How it works Simply open our application on your smartphone
or tablet, enter your destination then the application communicate
automatically with the device via bluetooth.Gotobikers can easily configure speed limit warning and update poi database.Goto app for Android

The Goto application is compatible with sygic map(licence) and osmand map(free) running on Android.Maps are precharged and doesn't need external connection. Goto is exclusively compatible with Android, we will propose an ios version for our next campaign.   Voice controlWant to change your destination or find the
nearest POI from your location? Simply talk to the microphone installed in your helmet then GOTO
will show you the way (Perk no.5).100% Customizable Case are available in various colors: Natural grey, dark grey, blue, red, purple, chrom and gold plated.
All motorbikes compatibleGoto can be installed on any kind of motorcycles even quad scooters and cars.How to install Goto

GOTO is compatible with all motorcycles. It only take few minutes to install.To power the module two wires have to be connected to the batterie.For the gear indicator one wire to the rpm sensor and one wire to the speed tacho.  Main specs
65K colors Oled display, contrast 2000:1 view angle 160°

Actuellement étudiante en première année DUT GEA, je dois avec mon groupe faire un projet tutoré avec nos propres moyens. Ce projet que nous avons choisi est un défilé de mode à Paris, dans la capitale même de la mode. Nous avons pour but de verser les fonds, obtenus lors de cette manifestation, à l’association française pour le développement des approches spécialisées des troubles du comportement alimentaire afin de participer à l’orientation des malades vers des professionnels et des centres de prise en charge des troubles du comportement alimentaire. Nos objectifs sont :
que des photos d’hommes ou de femmes « idéales » qui inspirent
du « parfait » pour les créateurs. En effet, ces derniers cherchent
de plus en plus, au fil du temps, la maigreur chez les mannequins. La société s’inspire
alors de cet ""idéalisme"" particulièrement développé en France du fait que la capitale de la
mode soit Paris. Cette société n’intègre pas dans le monde de la mode toutes les
personnes ayant un peu de formes et les rejette. La plupart de ces personnes
perdent alors confiance en elles. Notre objectif est donc de prouver qu'une taille mannequin n'apporte ni la beauté ni l'estime de soi, bien au contraire.

Le monde a évolué, on veut donc prouver avec l'organisation de notre défilé qu’il n’existe

de participer à un défilé en tant que mannequin retraçant la réalité de notre monde actuel.

column2: >Nous avons ainsi besoin d'un financement dans le but de réserver une salle sur Paris dans laquelle se déroulera le défilé. Cet argent permettra également aux jeunes stylistes d'acheter le matériel nécessaire afin de fabriquer les vêtements et accessoires des mannequins. Nous vous remercions d'avance de l'intérêt porté à notre projet et nous espérons que vous nous aiderez à le réaliser. Nous vous remercions d'en faire part à vos proches ou à vos connaissances.

Ruby Sampson offers silk-lined head wraps for women who struggle with moisture retention and breakage. Ruby Sampson was founded by Ashley Powdar in 2012 and officially incorporated in February 2016! Named in honor of Ashley's grandmother, Ruby Sampson is designed for the woman with big ideas and a busy lifestyle.

Do you wonder why curly hair is drier and more fragile than most hair textures? Well, the natural oils of your scalp, which provide nutrients and seal in moisture, take a long time to navigate the curls from root to tip. The natural oil's extra travel time translates into dry ends that succumb to the wear and tear of your everyday routine.

column4: >Ruby Sampson lines all products with silk to reduce hair manipulation that leads to breakage. The silk lining promotes healthy hair growth as the smooth emulsion of the fabric does not snag on your fragile curls nor does it absorb the hair's water. Most importantly, the silk lined head wraps make your hair care regimen more manageable and efficient as this protective styling option requires minimal maintenance.

column1: 2016 is our year and you will help make it unforgettable. We've been invited to New Orleans Natural Hair Care Expo and Essence Festival Pop Up Mall! Please help us streamline our production to launch our Summer Line.

The great news is our head wraps have been selling out and we've been invited to several high profile shows during festival season. The bad news is we lack the capital and resources to purchase items in bulk for production. Our goal is to raise $5,000 for the production of our Summer line. The Summer line will also launch the Ruby Sampson e-commerce store as well as premier at New Orleans Natural Hair Expo, and Essence Festival Pop Up Mall. Funds raised here will be allocated to the cost of material and labor, any additional funds will cover travel expenses.

column2: >Order 100 yards of silk de chine lining to qualify for wholesale rates.

column1:
• Order 4 sets of 25 yards each of print to qualify for wholesale rates.
  • Hire factory or local seamstresses to help produce 100 units.
• Allocate remainder of investment to cover travel, advertising, and shipping expenses.

column2: >$100: Travel neck pillow and pillow case set

column1: Between 1998 and 2015, black female owned businesses skyrocketed by 322%.

Contribute to the Golden Age of female entrepreneurship. Did you know that female entrepreneurs are more likely to invest in education, family, and community? ""In emerging markets, women reinvest 90% of their earnings in their families and communities—which means that investing in women is an investment in our collective future.""--Candida Brush, Forbes

Our vision is to disrupt poverty through the creation a social enterprise that reintegrates traditionally marginalized individuals into society. Our focus is our community, and we believe in local grassroots efforts for a collectively profitable future. Every Monday night, Ashley volunteers as a co-teacher at the Academy of Hope Adult Literacy Charter School. She co-teaches basic literacy skills to individuals with a 4 grade reading level or below. ""Studies show that children of parents who have not completed high school are much more likely to drop out of high school themselves. As parents increase their literacy, they are much more likely to become involved in their children’s education and are better equipped to provide financial stability for their families.""--Academy of Hope

We are lucky to have a seat at the table of one of the most innovative adult programs in the District. Our goal is to understand the design of successful adult programs through application. We plan to leverage and replicate a similar design for employee training, engagement, retention, and development. 10% of proceeds will be donated to the Academy of Hope Adult Literacy Charter School.

Of course any journey worth taking has risks and challenges. We value transparency to foster your trust and confidence. We source our fabrics from all corners of the world to ensure the individuality of each design. At our last event, we featured fabrics from Florianopolis, Brazil and we sold out in 2 hours! Unfortunately, we have been unable to restock that item since the event. Each time we source a great, one of a kind fabric, we risk the ability to restock given the item's availability. You can help us overcome this obstacle with raising enough capital to buy the unique fabric in bulk at the point of purchase. Don't worry, we spend smartly! We do not purchase material in bulk without first testing a sample's performance on the market.
column2: >Our greatest challenges thus far have been supply management and streamlined production. To minimize cost of production and reduce an order's turn around time, we need to be able to buy fabric in bulk. While it varies by supplier, our approved suppliers have an order minimum of 15 yards. Ruby Sampson head wraps require two fabrics per scarf: the print fabric and the silk lining. Therefore, our prices fall on the premium end of the retail spectrum. We will never purchase sub-par material that under delivers on our promise of a healthy protective styling option and that compromises the integrity of our product. The ability to place bulk orders of materials drives down cost of production and reduces turnaround times. This means the product is in your hands faster with a reasonable price point!

column1:
• Risks: fabric availability and restock predictability
  • Challenges: supply management
• Solutions: purchase materials in bulk to qualify for wholesale rates and stock sufficient inventory (5-10 items per style)
Thank you in advance for your support!

column2:

WordUp!® is a company started by two working moms and a high schooler, who want to create a Wave of Optimism all over the world! Company Cofounders, Maggie Jackman-Pryor and Michele Strobeck had the idea to create some products for their kids and others to help combat all the negative news, messages, and images clouding the media.

column1: Since its inception the company has been using inspiring words on products including clothing, headbands, books, posters, magnets, and more. The Inspired Imprints™ Flip Flop Collection was dreamt up by then 15 year-old company cofounder Hope Pryor.  While sitting on the beach with her family, Hope was writing her name in the sand. Looking up at her mom, Maggie, she said “wouldn’t it be cool to have flip flops that left behind positive words as you walk all over the beach?"" At that moment, the idea for the Inspired Imprints™ Collection was born, Hope officially joined the company's team, and Maggie and Michele were on a mission to bring them to life.
column7:
>Together We Can
Do Better, Feel Better, Be Better™!

column10: >WordUP!® is a small company with a big mission: To inspire individuals to see the best in themselves and the world around them.  Every purchase from WordUP!® and the Inspired Imprints™ Flip Flop Collection goes to encouraging others EXPLORE! BELIEVE!

column1:
Optimism to people who need it most!

Hope's idea for Inspired Imprints™ was simply to make people smile by seeing positive words imprinted in the sand. But it turns out there is a lot of science to prove there is something more powerful to this idea!
yourself with inspiring or motivating words can have a tremendous psychological
effect on a person.  Happy and hopeful people are more likely to share

that inspiration with others. By surrounding as many people as we can with small doses of positive and inspiring words, we think we can make a difference. Our goal is to touch the lives of not only the people who wear our flip flops, but the thousands of people who will see the inspiring word trails left behind in the sand.  Like a pebble being dropped into
water, we want Inspired Imprints<sup>TM</sup> to have a ripple effect and
create a huge Wave of Optimism!

column3: >After spending more than a year researching product designs and developing relationships with potential manufacturers, WordUP!® has been able to create a fashion forward flip flop that our customers swear are the most comfortable flip flops they have ever worn!

column1: Imprints™ Flip Flops are made from the highest quality materials and are sewn, embroidered
and assembled by hand to make them the most comfortable, durable flip flops

column3: >We need your support of our campaign to bring Inspired Imprints™ to the market and set up distribution channels here in the USA and Canada. Our $33,000 funding goal will be used to place our first large scale production order with our manufacturer. If we reach our initial funding goal of $33,000 we will be able to bring another DREAM! to reality. Our current manufacturer is not able to produce our Inspired Imprints™ Flip Flops in Children's sizes. Going beyond our $33,000 goal will allow us to invest in setting up the children's line as well! Can you imagine a little one toddling across the beach leaving a trail of JOY! in the sand? We can, and we hope you'll help us make that a reality!

Currently we have women's whole sizes 6-11 available in LAUGH!, LOVE!, HOPE!, BELIEVE! and DREAM!  We can't wait to see if our supporters will help us unlock children's and men's sizes too!

column4: >...and Jack, Luke, Griffin, and Grant, and all the other kids out there who inspired us to do this.

column1: And now we’re asking you to become a part of our WordUP!® family and help Spread the Wave of Optimism! We know that you want to INSPIRE! your kids and their friends...INSPIRE! your family and neighbors...INSPIRE! your community...just as much as we did.
Maggie Jackman-Pryor is a mom to three children, Hope (16),
Jack (14), and Luke (10,) and understands how critical it is to keep kids
inspired. Maggie graduated from Syracuse University with a degree in
Communications and Marketing and owns a flooring store in Cobleskill. In addition to operating her other business, Maggie
stays busy working on her MBA through Sage Colleges, and also as a volunteer to
and Inspired Imprints<sup>TM</sup> are her passion and her DREAM! is to see
inspiring words on beaches across the country this summer.
Hope Pryor is a junior at Cobleskill-Richmondville Central
School where she is a high honor roll student with the GOAL! of going to medical
school after graduation. Hope is active on the National Honor Society, Spanish
Honor Society, organizes the Schoharie County Prom Project and plays on the varsity
Michele Strobeck is mom of two boys, Griffin (7) and Grant
(4), and she, along with her husband Matt, recently found out their family will
be welcoming a new baby girl to their family this fall. Michele has a degree from SUNY Cobleskill in Agricultural

Business with a concentration in marketing and attended Cornell University’s Master's degree program for teaching secondary agricultural education. Michele’s background in marketing and education fuels her
desire to  grow the educational component and outreach mission of WordUP!® and SHARE! the powerful message of positivity and optimism with the

WordUP!® is committed to pay-it-forward! We will always donate 10% of our profits to organizations who SHARE! our vision of a more optimistic world!

column3: >""These flip flops are terrific!! The excitement and fun they generate, as well as being soooooo comfortable, makes them doubly worth the purchase!"" ~Susan Helme (Cobleskill Native),
column7:

""You just never know when someone needs a little hope or a boost of positivity in their day. I hope my trail of positive words reaches someone when they need it most.""
~Cassandra Putnam, St. Petersburg, Florida

column1: ""My niece and I wore our Inspired Imprints on Malibu Beach last weekend. I can't tell you how much I loved seeing the reaction of other beach goers as they wondered where the trail of words was coming from! We had so many people coming up to us asking where they could get a pair. I just bought 3 more so all of my nieces can join in the fun!"" ~Dana Swan, Simi Valley, California
""I love these flip flops, and I love the story behind them even more. Thanks for helping to bring a bit more optimism to the world!"" ~Amy McCann, Cobleskill, New York

Company Cofounders, Maggie Jackman-Pryor and Michele Strobeck had the idea to create some products for their kids and others to help combat all the negative news, messages, and images clouding the media.

Since its inception the company has been using inspiring words on products including clothing, headbands, books, posters, magnets, and more. The Inspired Imprints™ Flip Flop Collection was dreamt up by then 15 year-old company cofounder Hope Pryor.  While sitting on the beach with her family, Hope was writing her name in the sand. Looking up at her mom, Maggie, she said “wouldn’t it be cool to have flip flops that left behind positive words as you walk all over the beach?"" At that moment, the idea for the Inspired Imprints™ Collection was born, Hope officially joined the company's team, and Maggie and Michele were on a mission to bring them to life.  Together We Can Do Better, Feel Better, Be Better™!

WordUP!® is a small company with a big mission: To inspire individuals to see the best in themselves and the world around them.  Every purchase from WordUP!® and the Inspired Imprints™ Flip Flop Collection goes to encouraging others EXPLORE! BELIEVE!
HOPE! and DREAM! We pay-it-forward by dedicating 10% of our profits to supporting clubs and organizations that share our desire to Spread the Wave of

Optimism to people who need it most!Hope's idea for Inspired Imprints™ was simply to make people smile by seeing positive words imprinted in the sand. But it turns out there is a lot of science to prove there is something more powerful to this idea!
yourself with inspiring or motivating words can have a tremendous psychological
effect on a person.  Happy and hopeful people are more likely to share

that inspiration with others. By surrounding as many people as we can with small doses of positive and inspiring words, we think we can make a difference. Our goal is to touch the lives of not only the people who wear our flip flops, but the thousands of people who will see the inspiring word trails left behind in the sand.  Like a pebble being dropped into
water, we want Inspired ImprintsTM to have a ripple effect and
create a huge Wave of Optimism!
Making a DREAM! come to life!

After spending more than a year researching product designs and developing relationships with potential manufacturers, WordUP!® has been able to create a fashion forward flip flop that our customers swear are the most comfortable flip flops they have ever worn!
Imprints™ Flip Flops are made from the highest quality materials and are sewn, embroidered
and assembled by hand to make them the most comfortable, durable flip flops

We need your support of our campaign to bring Inspired Imprints™ to the market and set up distribution channels here in the USA and Canada. Our $33,000 funding goal will be used to place our first large scale production order with our manufacturer. If we reach our initial funding goal of $33,000 we will be able to bring another DREAM! to reality. Our current manufacturer is not able to produce our Inspired Imprints™ Flip Flops in Children's sizes. Going beyond our $33,000 goal will allow us to invest in setting up the children's line as well! Can you imagine a little one toddling across the beach leaving a trail of JOY! in the sand? We can, and we hope you'll help us make that a reality!
How will I choose my word, sizes, colors?

At the end of the campaign we will send you a link to a page with a form to fill out where you can chose you word/color and indicate your size. Currently we have women's whole sizes 6-11 available in LAUGH!, LOVE!, HOPE!, BELIEVE! and DREAM!  We can't wait to see if our supporters will help us unlock children's and men's sizes too!
Ours is a story of HOPE!
...and Jack, Luke, Griffin, and Grant, and all the other kids out there who inspired us to do this.

And now we’re asking you to become a part of our WordUP!® family and help Spread the Wave of Optimism! We know that you want to INSPIRE! your kids and their friends...INSPIRE! your family and neighbors...INSPIRE! your community...just as much as we did.

desire to  grow the educational component and outreach mission of WordUP!® and SHARE! the powerful message of positivity and optimism with the

WordUP!® is committed to pay-it-forward! We will always donate 10% of our profits to organizations who SHARE! our vision of a more optimistic world! Currently we have two upcoming outreach events schedule with:
Marathon for a Better Life - ""The Cancer Walk"" Saturday, June 4, 2016 - Cobleskill, NYhttp://marathonforabetterlife.org/index.html
Girls on the Run of Central New YorkSunday, June 5, 2016 - Cooperstown, NYhttp://www.girlsontheruncny.org/
Interested in Partnering with WordUP!® as a Featured Benefit Organization?Click Here to Find Out More

These flip flops are terrific!! The excitement and fun they generate, as well as being soooooo comfortable, makes them doubly worth the purchase!"" ~Susan Helme (Cobleskill Native),Cape Cod, Massachusetts""You just never know when someone needs a little hope or a boost of positivity in their day. I hope my trail of positive words reaches someone when they need it most."" ~Cassandra Putnam, St. Petersburg, Florida

My niece and I wore our Inspired Imprints on Malibu Beach last weekend. I can't tell you how much I loved seeing the reaction of other beach goers as they wondered where the trail of words was coming from! We had so many people coming up to us asking where they could get a pair. I just bought 3 more so all of my nieces can join in the fun!"" ~Dana Swan, Simi Valley, California
I love these flip flops, and I love the story behind them even more. Thanks for helping to bring a bit more optimism to the world!"" ~Amy McCann, Cobleskill, New York

!!UPDATED!! PLEASE CONTACT US OR CHECK YOUR EMAIL IF YOU HAVE MADE CONTRIBUTIONS BEFORE MAY 13.
It is a suction placemat and bowl set for smart and strong babies.

If you have babies, you know how messy they can get when they start learning to feed themselves. Although it is joyful to watch them eat but, be honest, no one likes the clean up afterwards. Baby's mealtime can be a messy, frustrating and at times, dangerous experience (especially when hot foods are involved).
I have tried out almost all suction bowls that are currently
on the market but none of them worked. Either they worked only for a few meals or
they could easily be lifted off after a few seconds. My little guy simply popping
the bowl off and sending all the food flying across the room.

This is why we have designed an extra-extra-extra strong suction placemat with a detachable bowl which is unlike any other currently on the market and is able to withstand the strength of even the strongest and most determined babies or toddlers.
column2:
>Our motto is simple: less mess + less cleaning = happy mom!

Based on our recent poll, we would like to introduce the following sets for backers to choose from! You can also mix and match to customize your set if you have multiple ones.

Set #1: Mint bowl with light blue placemat

column1:
How It Works and What Are the Benefits

As parents ourselves, we know that not only you want a mess-free meal for your little one, but you also want a safe one. You’ll be happy to know that our suction placemat is made of 100% FDA approved food grade silicone and the bowl is BPA, PVC, phthalate and lead-free. They are dishwasher and microwave safe and fits most high chair trays.
Below demonstrates how it works. There is a lever to lock the suction and there are quick snap and release buttons for easy assembly and removal.

Since the bowl can be detached from the placemat, you can store your child’s leftover food in the refrigerator. The bowl also comes with a lid to prevent moms from making a mess when she brings out the food.

Strong Suction Mechanism to Keep Bowl in Place

The silicone placemat still stays in place even when you peel it up.
You can use the set to lift up a heavy tray, shake it and it still doesn't leave the tray.
Because babies start learning to feed themselves on highchairs, we designed our product to fit most highchair trays. It is small and compact, but it is very strong.
Inner Lip to Help Babies Scooping Up Food
With the inner lip, the bowl will guide food back to the spoon and make scooping up food easier for babies.
The bowl and mat set doesn't leave the tray even strong babies want it to.
Why Averley Bowl and Mat Set is the only Feeding Bowl You Need?

column2: >Advanced suction-lock suctions placemat and bowl firmly to flat surfaces

column1: <li>Materials are safe for kids (BPA, PVC, phthalate &amp
• Lid seals food for storing in fridge and on-the-go
• Bowl can be used as a regular bowl without the placemat
We will send an email to you near the end of the campaign (around early June) and you will be able to choose your favorite color there.
Our team has spent lots of time in developing this product,
making sure it has strong suction and cannot be easily lifted up by strong babies. We have planned out the types of
resources and man hours we are going to need to fulfill all the pledges we
receive. However, we all know there will be bumps and unforeseen obstacles that
could arise along the way. But we will be transparent to our backers and keep
you informed along the way. Thank you so much for your support.
<div>Your support is essential to us. The fund collected will be used for the final steps, i.e. order tooling and begin the mass production run. The first Averley Suction Bowl &amp
column2: Mat set will ship to backers in around October 2016. Should there be any changes, we will keep all of our customers informed. We need your support to take the message to the world that we can make babies and toddlers create less mess during mealtime. Please help making this happen by backing this project and help spreading the word by sharing our page.

column3: >Please share with your families and friends who have babies. I am sure they will like it!

Finally, time telling and gazing at digitized information on a display
screen can be one of the most exciting experiences. We have been watching
electronic screens for 70 years now. We want people to be so excited about this
technology that they can't wait to lift up their arms and use this device to
watch images or possibly messages floating in mid-air or rotating around on a
long screen as long as the their watches strap that wraps around their
My name is Jay Pirincci and I have a great idea. The story of my
product is about light, space and design using existing technology but in
a more creative manner. This wearable device called M.D. Motivational
Device, a watch/ electronic device  makes efficient use of ALL of its
surrounding space - gathering and displaying digitized information in the most
unique manner in mid-air or as a moving image rotating on a long screen that is
part of the watches strap -but also a device that has side cases on the
strap for carrying basic essential necessities, cosmetics, perfume or tools in a beautifully
designed stylish package. Fun, fashionable and functional.
We have three designs for our Sm-Art Watches that will make telling time,
reading messages and looking at images the most fabulous experience ever.
1-Holographic- display time in mid-air. Developments in light and
photonics technology allow for methods of displaying information in
mid-air that  has never been used on a watch.
2-Sm-Art Strap- the long strap of the watch is also part of the display
screen. Larger flexible display screens can be developed or merged
together onto the straps of these watches allowing for a much larger
screen and much more information to be displayed.
3-Smart Purse or Wallet- A Multi-functional Watch with cosmetic and perfume
cases. More useful space and creative areas for containing and carrying the
owners necessities all enhanced by a more stylish design. The main case
will have a compartment for perfume /cologne with a spray. The side cases are
for carrying mascara, rouge, lip gloss, mini-file etc.  This design with
side cases can be used with the holographic design as well.
Additionally the background for each digital display on the screen will have
our own work of art to show off as the background or backdrop for any
display information instead of a simple dark grey screen.
Here are the electronic  features that will be provided by all
Time , date, alarm, Temp, heart rate sensor, bluetooth embedded, touch
screen, text, messaging, internet connectible, Wi-Fi capability, wireless
Here is the cosmetic tools that will be provided by the Smart Purse-
1<sup>st</sup> case- cosmetics - mascara, -rouge, lip gloss or
2nd side case- cream, coins ,mini-comb, file,  pen or just a carrying case

for other items.                                                                                                                                                        It simplifies those huge cluttered, disorderly
purses into an organized, attractive and  compact wearable device that is
just the right size with only the basic necessities a woman (or man-wallet) requires or
wants. But also something they would be proud to wear and showoff. Elegant,
compact, functional and beautiful. That’s smart.
Chip technology today has all the electronic capability for providing all
the capacity and information we intend to offer to the potential buyers of our
Two prototypes of the Smart Multi-functional design have already been
manufactured where the final specifications and designs are near completion. We
are experienced professionals having the facilities and contacts for
This product will give them the ability to access information and tools they
need when they  want but with  much more fun .
I have an architectural degree and a science degree and I have been
designing and developing real estate as well as products for many years. I
have the knowledge and the business contacts to develop all these products as
This product is only one many Motivational Devices and products our
company M.D. Motivational Enterprises LLC is planning on producing.

If we don’t reach our desired goal, we will still continue developing either

column2: >Classy Looking Nerf Herder is a unique fashion line that mashes up 1940s and 50s vintage styles with your favorite nerdy fandoms. Each design is modeled after real vintage styles, making you the classiest nerd to explore the 'verse!

column1: As an active participant in the nerd world/convention circuit (as a fan and a cosplayer), I noticed something was missing -- there was a severe lack of high-quality nerdy themed options for women. All I saw were t-shirts, pajamas, and corsets. But not much in between. I conceived of Classy Looking Nerf Herder to fill that void (that's what she said).
I pattern, create, and sew every design. Oh, and did I mention?
Indiegogo's gallery page is not mobile-friendly. If you are using your phone, go to this gallery page to view all the designs.
Your contribution gives me the funds to jump-start my business to bring it to Etsy and the convention world. In return you get a few perks:
Classy Looking Nerf Herder - A personal thank you email for joining the Classy Looking Nerf Herder family and all the nerd love in the 'verse for your contribution.
Classy Writing Post Carder - A 4""x6"" postcard print of your choice of dress renderings.
Classy Looking Wall Dressing - A 11""x17"" poster print of your choice of dress renderings.

I Shoot First - A digital custom headshot drawing emailed to you. You send me a picture, I send you back a drawing. $30 per face. Add $10 for a 8""x10"" poster print to be mailed. Here's a little example:
Nerf Herder Neckties - A tie or bowtie with your choice of available nerdy-themed fabrics. Like these:
Just a Crop Top - A crop top in your choice of available fabrics. Non-character themed.
Just a Skirt - A circle skirt or pencil skirt in your choice of available styles and fabric. Every skirt comes with pockets. Non-character themed.
Just a Dress - A dress in your choice of available styles and fabric. Non-character themed.
Types of fabrics available for tops, skirts, and dresses: solid colors, polka dot, stripes, or floral in all variety of colors.
Over 40 designs available! Check out the gallery page to see them all. Every dress and skirt comes with pockets and a center-back zipper!

Character list: Darth Vader, Luke Skywalker, Obi Wan Kenobi, Leia Organa, Han Solo, Rey, Fourth Doctor, Ninth Doctor, Tenth Doctor, Eleventh Doctor, Twelfth Doctor, River Song, TARDIS, Black Widow, Captain America, Captain Marvel, Deadpool, Hawkeye, Hulk, Iron Man, Loki, Thor, Wonder Woman, Batman, Superman, Green Arrow, Black Canary, Joker, Harley Quinn, Gryffindor, Slytherin, Ravenclaw, Hufflepuff, Star Trek: TOS (red, blue &
column3: yellow), Sailor Moon, Sailor Mercury, Sailor Venus, Sailor Mars, and Sailor Jupiter.

column1: Skirt variations: circle, pencil, or wrap dress
Bodice variations: v-neck, scoop neck, halter top, sweetheart, boatneck, crop top, or crew neck (Peter Pan collar).

The sizing is simple. Your size equals the inches measurement of the smallest part of your waist (in inches). If your bust or hips are larger, select the size with that measurement. Circle skirt style are open and can fit any size hip. We can easily customize your dress size for an extra $25 if you need a nip or a tuck here or there.

Holiday Ordering

This campaign ends after the holidays, but if you want to give your perk as a gift this month, you still can! With every dress selection, you will get an emailed PDF of your design choice. All you have to do is print it out and fold it into a greeting card. FTW.

Shipping

We'll begin shipping your perks 6-8 weeks from the
end of the campaign (USPS Priority). You will get a survey at the end of the campaign to confirm your perk
I will donate 10% of all funds raised to Kiva to help other women expand their own businesses.
Kiva is a non-profit organization with a mission to connect people
through lending to alleviate poverty. Kiva connects  individuals with a

worldwide network of microfinance institutions and people seeking small low-interest loans. You can loan as little as $25 to help create opportunity through low-interest loans around the world. For more information, visit kiva.org.

10% of the funds raised in this campaign will go towards women who want to expand their business through sewing and creating items for purchase, just like me. When those funds are repaid, I will reloan the money back into Kiva's microloan system, again and again and again and again and again and again...
The more you contribute and help me to raise funds, the more I give in return! I have so many more designs tucked away that I will release to upon reaching these mini and extended goals.
$6,000 - Release Lord of the Rings inspired line
$7,500 - Release Back to the Future inspired line

Lynne Marie Martens -- costumer designer, cosplayer, writer, and fashion designer. Classy Looking Nerf Herder is the realization of so many of my passions and skills. I have been sewing for over twenty years (thanks Mom!). I love the power of storytelling clothing design and character development. Fashion history has captivated me for about as long as I can remember.  Once I started Comic-Con type of events and saw all the vendors and fan art, I realized that I could combine all of my talents and interests into a viable business, providing an untapped resource of classy nerdy fashion for women! I have an MFA in Costume Design Design from the California Institute of the Arts and continue to design for theatre, film, and web media world in LA. My favorite fandoms are Doctor Who, Star Wars, Orphan Black, Marvel, Harry Potter, Disney, and of course the world that started it all: the Whedonverse.

PLEASE SHARE!!!

I can't do this alone! Share this link with your friends: http://igg.me/at/classylookingnerfherder

to go directly to this page.
You can follow me on Instagram @classylookingnerfherder for latest info, lots of images, updates, maybe some giveaways??? I'll be making more and more samples throughout the campaign so you can see all the pretty things. Please feel free to contact me with ANY questions you might have.

Thank you so much for your contribution! Live long and dress classy.

Special Thanks to...

Models: Christie Harms, Shawnee Witt, Elisa Richter
Photographer: Shoob Photo South
My friends and family for supporting me and providing feedback in this most excellent endeavor. And for putting up with my social absence in the last few weeks while getting this together. Specifically Angi, Ellie, Matthew, Theodora, Kathy, Erin, Terry, Diana, Laurie, Shawnee, Marie, Anna, Athena, Justin, Dear, and Ruth. 
Thank you!!!

Classy Looking Wall Dressing - A 11""x17"" poster print of your choice of dress renderings.

I Shoot First - A digital custom headshot drawing emailed to you. You send me a picture, I send you back a drawing. $30 per face. Add $10 for a 8""x10"" poster print to be mailed. Here's a little example:
Nerf Herder Neckties - A tie or bowtie with your choice of available nerdy-themed fabrics. Like these:
Just a Crop Top - A crop top in your choice of available fabrics. Non-character themed.
Just a Skirt - A circle skirt or pencil skirt in your choice of available styles and fabric. Every skirt comes with pockets. Non-character themed.
Just a Dress - A dress in your choice of available styles and fabric. Non-character themed.
Types of fabrics available for tops, skirts, and dresses: solid colors, polka dot, stripes, or floral in all variety of colors.
Over 40 designs available! Check out the gallery page to see them all. Every dress and skirt comes with pockets and a center-back zipper!

Character list: Darth Vader, Luke Skywalker, Obi Wan Kenobi, Leia Organa, Han Solo, Rey, Fourth Doctor, Ninth Doctor, Tenth Doctor, Eleventh Doctor, Twelfth Doctor, River Song, TARDIS, Black Widow, Captain America, Captain Marvel, Deadpool, Hawkeye, Hulk, Iron Man, Loki, Thor, Wonder Woman, Batman, Superman, Green Arrow, Black Canary, Joker, Harley Quinn, Gryffindor, Slytherin, Ravenclaw, Hufflepuff, Star Trek: TOS (red, blue & yellow), Star Trek: TNG (red, blue & yellow), Sailor Moon, Sailor Mercury, Sailor Venus, Sailor Mars, and Sailor Jupiter.
Skirt variations: circle, pencil, or wrap dress
Bodice variations: v-neck, scoop neck, halter top, sweetheart, boatneck, crop top, or crew neck (Peter Pan collar).

The sizing is simple. Your size equals the inches measurement of the smallest part of your waist (in inches). If your bust or hips are larger, select the size with that measurement. Circle skirt style are open and can fit any size hip. We can easily customize your dress size for an extra $25 if you need a nip or a tuck here or there. Holiday Ordering

This campaign ends after the holidays, but if you want to give your perk as a gift this month, you still can! With every dress selection, you will get an emailed PDF of your design choice. All you have to do is print it out and fold it into a greeting card. FTW.
ShippingWe'll begin shipping your perks 6-8 weeks from the
end of the campaign (USPS Priority). You will get a survey at the end of the campaign to confirm your perk
I will donate 10% of all funds raised to Kiva to help other women expand their own businesses.
Kiva is a non-profit organization with a mission to connect people
through lending to alleviate poverty. Kiva connects  individuals with a

worldwide network of microfinance institutions and people seeking small low-interest loans. You can loan as little as $25 to help create opportunity through low-interest loans around the world. For more information, visit kiva.org.

10% of the funds raised in this campaign will go towards women who want to expand their business through sewing and creating items for purchase, just like me. When those funds are repaid, I will reloan the money back into Kiva's microloan system, again and again and again and again and again and again...
The more you contribute and help me to raise funds, the more I give in return! I have so many more designs tucked away that I will release to upon reaching these mini and extended goals.
$6,000 - Release Lord of the Rings inspired line
$7,500 - Release Back to the Future inspired line

Lynne Marie Martens -- costumer designer, cosplayer, writer, and fashion designer. Classy Looking Nerf Herder is the realization of so many of my passions and skills. I have been sewing for over twenty years (thanks Mom!). I love the power of storytelling clothing design and character development. Fashion history has captivated me for about as long as I can remember.  Once I started Comic-Con type of events and saw all the vendors and fan art, I realized that I could combine all of my talents and interests into a viable business, providing an untapped resource of classy nerdy fashion for women! I have an MFA in Costume Design Design from the California Institute of the Arts and continue to design for theatre, film, and web media world in LA. My favorite fandoms are Doctor Who, Star Wars, Orphan Black, Marvel, Harry Potter, Disney, and of course the world that started it all: the Whedonverse.PLEASE SHARE!!!I can't do this alone! Share this link with your friends: http://igg.me/at/classylookingnerfherder

to go directly to this page. You can follow me on Instagram @classylookingnerfherder for latest info, lots of images, updates, maybe some giveaways??? I'll be making more and more samples throughout the campaign so you can see all the pretty things. Please feel free to contact me with ANY questions you might have.Thank you so much for your contribution! Live long and dress classy.Special Thanks to...Models: Christie Harms, Shawnee Witt, Elisa RichterPhotographer: Shoob Photo SouthMy friends and family for supporting me and providing feedback in this most excellent endeavor. And for putting up with my social absence in the last few weeks while getting this together. Specifically Angi, Ellie, Matthew, Theodora, Kathy, Erin, Terry, Diana, Laurie, Shawnee, Marie, Anna, Athena, Justin, Dear, and Ruth.  Thank you!!!",11.0,0,"1 Campaign

column3:
>Our Story

Marie + Annette is a contemporary women’s clothing line created by my sister Krystal and I(Christina) in 2014. The line is a combination of our personal styles translated into collections that are sophisticated, trendy yet sexy.

The concept behind the brand is to create special occasion pieces that could outfit the woman with the full social calendar.  Our Goal is to be a destination where women can find high fashion and high quality pieces at accessible price points. 

Our designs are dynamic, trendy and sexy.  We like to take risks, always pushing the limits taking our pieces to the next level. The Marie + Annette women chooses us because she is looking for that one of the kind high fashion look that she can't find anywhere else.
column4: >Who is the Marie + Annette Women:
column5:
>

Socialite -She has a full social calendar so she likes to have many outfit options to take through her many events.

 Professional- She works hard and is very driven in her career so she likes to treat her self every now and then.

 Jet Setter- She loves to travel and has seen the world so she has developed an appreciation for the finer things in life.  

Fashionista- She is very well versed in fashion and she knows what she likes and what looks good on her.
column6:
>THE PROCESS

When designing we like to take risks pushing our pieces to the next level. We  put a lot of detail into making our designs unique. We focus on creating new and exciting silhouettes and constructions that we feel emphasizes a women’s best features on her body.

We take great detail in the  fabric, trim and fit of our designs. We shop some of the top fabric and trim stores in NYC.  

When creating our pieces, we work with some of the top pattern makers and seamstresses in the industry. We want to ensure that people associate great designs, great fit and high quality when thinking of Marie + Annette.
column7:
>CURRENT STATE

Within the last 2 years  we have started to build some momentum. Our online sales have picked up and our overall brand recognition has increased.  This small increase in business can be attributed a few celebrities sightings in our clothing. Celebrities such as Fantasia, Keke Palmer, Adrienne Bailon,  Draya Michele Laura Govan, Miss USA 2016-Deshauna Barber and Miss Universe 2016-Pia Alonzo Wurtzbach all have been photographed wearing our pieces to high profile events.
column8: >
column9:
>    

 

Although business has begun to pick up, we know in order to make  this business successful we are going to have to take things to the next level.
column10:
>OUR GOAL

Our ultimate goal in running this campaign is to obtain the necessary resources to help in our efforts to obtain retail placement for the Marie + Annette clothing line. 

 Our customers and potential customers have been constantly reaching out to us asking where they can find our items in their area. Although we have an online site, we believe we are not maximizing our full business potential. Our customers need to see our quality and  try on our pieces for fit.   We understand that this is a necessary part of earning our customers trust and ultimately their brand loyalty.  

In order for us to begin approaching retailers we believe it is necessary that do the following things to help execute or goals:

1) To put together a spring 17 presentation during Fall Fashion Week. We are planning to do a huge launch of our spring 17 line. We are coming out with what we feel will be our best work yet. We are also adding in some new exciting categories that we think will definitely get people excited. We plan to invite retail buyers, media, stylists and fashion influencers(bloggers) to the event to create some buzz around the brand but also engage the buyers to help get placement.  

2) Take our collection on the Road! We want to also make our first ever debut at a fashion apparel trade show. Buyers from all over the country come to  trade shows to shop for their stores so it is the perfect way to come face to face with boutiques from other states that we may not usually get to see. Not only that, when buyers see us at  trade shows they will know we are a serious brand. Our goal here is to generate our first retail sale.
column12:
>HOW YOU CAN HELP

Although doing a presentation and attending a trade show seems pretty simple it can be very expensive.  This is why we need your help!  We are hoping to raise $20,000 to execute our goals. Below is a breakdown of what your expenses will cover. 

 Goal 1. Fashion Week Presentation expenses:

column2:
>Challenges

In today's fashion world,  there are very few African American brands that are recognized as prominent figures within the industry. Those of us  who do get to a point of recognition are usually pigeonholed into the urban or street wear  brand buckets. This can sometimes be hindering for up and coming contemporary brands like us who target a much broader market  and who are striving to have a presence in contemporary retail outlets. 

 As two African American women, our goal  in  this industry is to not only create a successful brand for women of all races but to work to break down these barriers and bring visibility and recognition to the African American fashion community.
column4: >In exchange for your generous support we are offering the following perks!
column5:
>Reward 1. M.A.N.Y Thank You -$20

We appreciate your support. With your pledge of $20 you will receive a hand written Thank You note from Marie + Annette.
column6:
>Reward 2. M.A.N.Y -Supporter $45

We appreciate your support. With your Pledge  of $45 you will receive a Marie + Annette Slogan T-shirt.
column9:
>Reward 3. M.A.N.Y- Super Supporter- $100

We appreciate your Support. With your Pledge of $100 you will receive a Marie + Annette E-Gift Card for $125 to be used on towards any purchase on www.marieannettenyc.com.
column11:
>​

We appreciate your support. With your pledge of $200 you will get the the choice to receive one of Marie + Annette's BEST SELLING  dresses: The ""Laura"" Wave Neckline Dress or the ""Kendra"" Silk Draped Back Dress. A Value of $275+
column14:
> 

We appreciate your support. With your pledge of $250 you will get the choice to receive one of our fabulous dresses: The ""Draya"" Draped Fringe Dress or The ""Jessica"" Trumpet Hem Wave Dress. Value of $350
column16:
>

We appreciate your Support. With your pledge of $300 you will have the choice to receive one of  our customer favorites: The ""Penelope"" Feather Hem Dress in Pink or The ""Melanie"" Fringe Halter Dress. Value of $400
column17: > Reward 7. M.A.N.Y Platinum Supporter- $350
column20:
> 

We appreciate your support with your pledge you will have the choice to receive one of our most coveted pieces: The ""Sophie' Ruffle Fringe Dress or The ""Morgan"" Structured Jumpsuit. Value of $450.
column21:
> Reward 8. M.A.N.Y Ultimate  Experience- $1,500

With your donation of $1,500  you will get the ulimate M.A.N.Y reward! You will have the  opportunity to recieve one Marie + Annette piece from the selections above and the  opportunity  to collborate with us in creating your very own Marie + Annette dress. Once created you will also have the opportunity to be featured in our next campaign wearing your design.
column24: >Thank you for your support!
column25:
>To Learn More About Marie + Annette Visit our website: www.marieannettenyc.com
