Who am I?

My name is Joseph Vincent Anthony Bennett. I am 21 years old. I was born in Killeen Texas and raised in Northern Virginia. I am Black and Native American. I am a psychology major at my local community college and an entrepreneur.

 

What are we?

Dari Inc. is a fashion and lifestyle online business that sells popular retail products from countries like Russia, Spain, China, Australia, Mexico, and America. We carry men's and women's clothing, accessories, jewelry, home décor items, and sportswear + equipment. We also sell anything that has been made or designed by local artist founded all across the world.

How do we make a difference? 

Our business soul objective is to ultimately make more successful people in life and slowly erase poverty in our way. We believe any artist that has a passion for doing art, making clothes, designing or creating furniture, and a long list of other stuff should have an opportunity to have their own online business. This artist also deserves the chance to be known for what they create. 
 

How do we differentiate from other businesses?

Our company differentiates from other websites because we sell products from multiple countries and artist work of all sorts that came from all over the world. By establishing this, it allows us to offer our customers a unique opportunity to enhance their look and lifestyle by what they wear and surround their self around.  

 

 

What is our purpose? 

The purpose of our business is to support talented artists who are struggling to make a name for themselves by providing them a visible platform to market and sell their goods alongside other trendy items. Our company firmly believes fashion itself is being destroyed by brand name businesses for the middle-class consumer. Not enough artist who has the skills to innovate the fashion world aren't offered enough opportunities to do so. Our goal is to give these artists that chance
column2:
that desired opportunity. 

 

How do we support the artist?

 Our company provides everything that an artist possibly needs for them to create what they sale. We have features that our business offers to the artist who lacks the income to purchase material by supplying them with our extensive collection of material to create and design with. We also have a service for any artist who would like an online store of their own. With Dari Inc., we don’t just help our artist build an e-commerce website and wish them the best of luck. We will give them a CSV File of the emails of all the customers who has bought their product on our platform, so they will have a loyal audience to advertise to. We also give them a shout out on our website and inform customers if they want to purchase Strictly from the designer, then they can. With each product that they have on our website, in the description tab, we show any social media accounts they provide and website if they own one. 
 

 

What features do we have for the artist?

 Dari Inc offers these artists a deal where they can make whatever they want, and the only time the artist would have to pay for the material is when they make a sale on it. Furthermore, we also handle the shipping and handling for them if they use our materials. Some materials that we provide to our artist are: Caps, Socks,  Tank tops, T-shirts, V-necks, Regular hoodies, Zipped Hoodies, Sweaters, Leggings, Dresses, Skirts, and Kids Apparel. Coffee Mugs, Travel Mugs, Canvases, Posters, Wall decals, Pillow Covers, and Stickers. Hightop shoes, Low-top shoes, and Slip-on’s shoes.  Pouches, Regular tote bags, Small/large leather tote bags,  Shoulder bags, and Saddle bags. Gold, silver, and steel to make their jewelry.  Slim and tough phone cases for iPhone &
column3:
Samsung, and much more. 

 

 How does the artist get paid?

 The artist has a choice to ""claim it"" or ""store it."" If the artist claims it, then that means we pay them royalty off of their product we sold. We either write them a check or transfer the money through PayPal. If the artist chooses to store it, it means that they would like an online store of their own. With the money that they would get for royalty, they use it for the fees and creation for their online store. When an artist merchandise makes 500-1000 sells on our site, Dari Inc. deems it as ""product in demand"" and start with the creation process of their website if they choose to store their payments. An artist need to save a minimum of $5,000 USD for we initiate the creation process so they may have a decent start-up launch. 

 

 

 What features do we have on our website?
column4:
>[Feature One] 


Lack of an in-store experience is one of the prime reasons for lower online jewelry buying. Customers still prefer trying a piece of jewelry, being able to consult with sellers, and getting feedback on how jewelry looks on them before they make a purchase. Dari Inc. offers an innovative way of creating the same experience in their online store. We have a feature that allows you to try on any jewelry on our online store virtually. By allowing the customer to experience one of the same feelings they get by shopping in an off-line store, it increases conversion rate by 60%. 

_____________________________________________________________________________
column5:
>[Feature Two] 


Dari Inc. offers a points-based loyalty program for their customers to use that gives them unprecedented chances to get free items from our store. When we reward our customers, they are much more likely to return and make repeat purchases. Over 10,000 merchants are boosting their revenue and having repeat purchases with loyalty reward programs. These merchants see a 15% increase year-over-year in revenue and a 20% growth in repeat purchases. 

_____________________________________________________________________________
column6:
>[Feature Three] 


Dari Inc. has an affiliate program that anyone is welcome to join. With our affiliate program, you can view our affiliate performance rank with Top Performers, keep track of recent updates via Latest Activity feed, and explore the location of top referral link visits with Clicks by Map. Affiliates are provided with their personal dashboards. There they can access their unique link, update details, run reports and grab creatives to assist with marketing efforts. 


 

_____________________________________________________________________________
column7:
>[Feature Four] 


Dari Inc. lets you visually compare the size and fit of an item you are looking to buy with the best fitting item you already own and have purchased on our website. Based on item measurements, we create unique silhouettes of millions of items in different sizes. My site lets you visually overlay the silhouettes to create an accurate and personal representation of the fit, without including a shopper's body measurements or other personal information. We also allow buyers to create a digital wardrobe where they can store online purchases and easily input items bought offline. 

_____________________________________________________________________________
column8:
> [Feature Five] 


Just like we make deals with vendors, Dari Inc. allow customers to make deals with us. With our Timed Overlay Feature (For Mobile only),  A small overlay header is shown to customers who are on the product page for a few seconds and haven’t made their mind up about the purchase. The overlay offers the customer to make a price offer of their choosing. With our Exit Offer Feature (For Desktop only), Our cursor motion engine senses the cursor movement of your customers and activates a popup when they are about to leave the product page. Just like the Timed Overlay Feature, it offers customers to choose how much they would buy the item for. We then approve or disapprove their offer. These features help us maximize sales and optimize our margins. It is better to have a customer to name their price than having no customer at all.
column9:
>

_____________________________________________________________________________

Do we deserve it?

As a highly motivated individual, I am dedicated to making this work, and I'm passionate about it. Over the past three months, I've done 600+ hours of research, which consisted of reading several books, 78 articles on Shopify, and listening to 7 podcasts about online marketing, financing, and advertising. Despite my hard work, I've hit a snag in my progress: I lack the capital required to operate a successful startup launch.

 

Why Pledge?

I need a minimum of $50,000 USD to hire necessary personnel such as: bloggers, advertisers, affiliates, a photographer, customer service representatives, website coders, an accountant, and a lawyer to create contracts for future employees. In addition to filling those positions, there will also be several other expenses including (but not limited to): financing platforms, marketing software, sales channel fees, and e-commerce apps and tools cost. In other words, I need a team to help me through the initial launch.
column12:
> 
We are not your typical e-commerce business that offers you a typical online shopping experience. Customers deserve the unique fashion
column13: we deliver that. Artist deserves better opportunities
column14: we offer that. We all deserve more successful people in our world
column15: we can potentially give that. Dari Inc. will become the next Amazon but specially made for millennials. We don’t sell products
column16:
we sell an experience. 
 
Join The Movement | Support The Cause 

 

 

Thank you for taking the time to read this, I appreciate you guys for supporting my cause. Please stay updated with new developments and take a look at my website. All links can be found below.

Welcome all to Dari Inc! We don't sell brands
column17:
we sell fashion.

Thank you

column1: Hi, hello, hey there! Let me begin by saying Thank You for checking out my campaign, you're fantastic!
If you haven't heard yet, I want to become a LuLaRoe consultant.

I love how LuLaRoe makes me feel and it's the type of clothing I've been searching for my entire life: comfortable, colorful and a little wild. The joy I feel when I pull my leggings on and hop into a dress is an experience I want every person to also have when they put on an outfit because it's clothing and we spend our lives in them.

Great question! LuLaRoe is a young company created by a fantastic woman that wanted to be able to spend time with her children while also making money and living life in stylish comfort. They make clothing that is stylish, comfortable and unique. Each colorful pattern printed is limited, meaning only a select number of clothing pieces will be made from each print. So while you may be wearing the same style of dress, skirt or shirt as many other people, it's very unlikely you'll have the same prints.
Ok, Ok, that's great. So why do you want to sell LuLaRoe?

I want people to love wearing the clothing they live their lives in. And I want people to feel just as comfortable, beautiful and confident as I do when I put on my LuLaRoe. I think that I can bring this to people by becoming a consultant, but I cannot attain this goal alone, so I'm asking for your help. I'm not asking for something in return for nothing, though. You will notice in the Perks that there is a little something for just about everyone, whether you're looking for LuLaRoe clothing, artwork, a personalized drawing or a little bit of everything (my personal favorite).

Another reason I want to sell LuLaRoe is because I believe it will be a job I can maintain while my life changes. In the next few years, I want to move to the other side of the country and hopefully start a family. My current job is something I love doing, but unfortunately I cannot take that same job cross country with me. LuLaRoe is a flexible business that I can manage from anywhere and that's exactly what I need.

Please consider choosing a Perk and helping me become a LuLaRoe consultant. By backing this campaign, however big or small your contribution, you will be helping me to not only achieve my goal, but you'll be aiding me in bringing confidence, comfort and joy to other people.

You'll have noticed I'm asking for $7,500 which is definitely not a small amount of money, that's for sure, which is why I need the help of many. A big chunk of that money, about $5,500 to be specific, goes toward my LuLaRoe initial inventory of clothing. That inventory will be my consultant bread and butter, full of so many fantastic patterns and colors, you just cannot even begin to imagine all the variety!

The rest of that money is for my other consulting needs, such as storage bins, clothing racks, mannequin, branding, etc. Any and all money made with this campaign is going into the supplies and inventory I need to run this business. Anything extra will go toward more LuLaRoe styles and leggings. So all the money made is going directly into bringing more fantastic clothes to lovely people in my area.
The Impact LuLaRoe has had on Me

As a curvy girl, I have always viewed clothing as something that could be an expression of myself, but it also always felt limiting and sometimes uncomfortable. Shopping was a gamble: either I would find clothing that fit perfectly, but was relatively simple or boring, or I would find pieces which were colorful and full of wild patterns, but were either too tight in certain spots or completely unflattering. Then I found LuLaRoe and it felt like I stumbled into the sisterhood's pants and my clothing dreams came true.

I have tried every style that LuLaRoe offers and in each style, I fit in different sizes. As a large and curvy woman, weighing in around 250 lbs, I expect to only be able to squeeze these lumps into 2XLs or larger. Then I stumbled into LuLaRoe. In some styles, I can wear anything from a size medium up to a 3XL. Do you know how refreshing and empowering it is to feel like a normal sized person and not feel shamed by a label? Because it's really fantastic. Fan. Tas. Tic.

And it's not just the clothing that's all encompassing. Just about every person that I've met through the magic that is LuLaRoe has been uplifting, friendly and more than happy to help. LuLaRoe brings together and unites women in such a great way. Every body loves seeing what outfits everyone else it putting together, how they're combining patterns and making a statement. Looking for a specific print or style? Just ask people in the LuLaRoe community and you'll find a sea of voices, volunteering to help.
This community warms my soul and I want to continue to propagate the magic of LuLaRoe by being part of the consultant family.

My biggest challenge is raising the money. Financially speaking, I make just enough money to skate by, pay monthly student loan payments, and fill my gas tank, while throwing what pennies I have left into my savings account. Whatever money you can donate to help me start as a LuLaRoe consultant will help! Even if I do not raise the set goal amount, I will still become a consultant, it will just take a little longer.
Starting this campaign is a risk, but I'm ready for a new adventure and I can only see this campaign as a stepping stone that'll help me to achieve my goals

As a person with limited means, I completely understand if you can't spare any funds at the time. You know what you can do, though? I'd really appreciate if you could help me spread the word and tell your friends and family about my campaign. Share my campaign on social media, tell your work friends about it, etc. Every little bit helps.
Thank you again for reading through my campaign! <
Hi, hello, hey there! Let me begin by saying Thank You for checking out my campaign, you're fantastic!
If you haven't heard yet, I want to become a LuLaRoe consultant.

I love how LuLaRoe makes me feel and it's the type of clothing I've been searching for my entire life: comfortable, colorful and a little wild. The joy I feel when I pull my leggings on and hop into a dress is an experience I want every person to also have when they put on an outfit because it's clothing and we spend our lives in them.

Great question! LuLaRoe is a young company created by a fantastic woman that wanted to be able to spend time with her children while also making money and living life in stylish comfort. They make clothing that is stylish, comfortable and unique. Each colorful pattern printed is limited, meaning only a select number of clothing pieces will be made from each print. So while you may be wearing the same style of dress, skirt or shirt as many other people, it's very unlikely you'll have the same prints.
Ok, Ok, that's great. So why do you want to sell LuLaRoe?

I want people to love wearing the clothing they live their lives in. And I want people to feel just as comfortable, beautiful and confident as I do when I put on my LuLaRoe. I think that I can bring this to people by becoming a consultant, but I cannot attain this goal alone, so I'm asking for your help. I'm not asking for something in return for nothing, though. You will notice in the Perks that there is a little something for just about everyone, whether you're looking for LuLaRoe clothing, artwork, a personalized drawing or a little bit of everything (my personal favorite).

Another reason I want to sell LuLaRoe is because I believe it will be a job I can maintain while my life changes. In the next few years, I want to move to the other side of the country and hopefully start a family. My current job is something I love doing, but unfortunately I cannot take that same job cross country with me. LuLaRoe is a flexible business that I can manage from anywhere and that's exactly what I need.

Please consider choosing a Perk and helping me become a LuLaRoe consultant. By backing this campaign, however big or small your contribution, you will be helping me to not only achieve my goal, but you'll be aiding me in bringing confidence, comfort and joy to other people.
What We Need & What You Get
Alright, let's break down the details:

You'll have noticed I'm asking for $7,500 which is definitely not a small amount of money, that's for sure, which is why I need the help of many. A big chunk of that money, about $5,500 to be specific, goes toward my LuLaRoe initial inventory of clothing. That inventory will be my consultant bread and butter, full of so many fantastic patterns and colors, you just cannot even begin to imagine all the variety!

The rest of that money is for my other consulting needs, such as storage bins, clothing racks, mannequin, branding, etc. Any and all money made with this campaign is going into the supplies and inventory I need to run this business. Anything extra will go toward more LuLaRoe styles and leggings. So all the money made is going directly into bringing more fantastic clothes to lovely people in my area.
The Impact LuLaRoe has had on Me

As a curvy girl, I have always viewed clothing as something that could be an expression of myself, but it also always felt limiting and sometimes uncomfortable. Shopping was a gamble: either I would find clothing that fit perfectly, but was relatively simple or boring, or I would find pieces which were colorful and full of wild patterns, but were either too tight in certain spots or completely unflattering. Then I found LuLaRoe and it felt like I stumbled into the sisterhood's pants and my clothing dreams came true.

I have tried every style that LuLaRoe offers and in each style, I fit in different sizes. As a large and curvy woman, weighing in around 250 lbs, I expect to only be able to squeeze these lumps into 2XLs or larger. Then I stumbled into LuLaRoe. In some styles, I can wear anything from a size medium up to a 3XL. Do you know how refreshing and empowering it is to feel like a normal sized person and not feel shamed by a label? Because it's really fantastic. Fan. Tas. Tic.

And it's not just the clothing that's all encompassing. Just about every person that I've met through the magic that is LuLaRoe has been uplifting, friendly and more than happy to help. LuLaRoe brings together and unites women in such a great way. Every body loves seeing what outfits everyone else it putting together, how they're combining patterns and making a statement. Looking for a specific print or style? Just ask people in the LuLaRoe community and you'll find a sea of voices, volunteering to help.
This community warms my soul and I want to continue to propagate the magic of LuLaRoe by being part of the consultant family.

My biggest challenge is raising the money. Financially speaking, I make just enough money to skate by, pay monthly student loan payments, and fill my gas tank, while throwing what pennies I have left into my savings account. Whatever money you can donate to help me start as a LuLaRoe consultant will help! Even if I do not raise the set goal amount, I will still become a consultant, it will just take a little longer.
Starting this campaign is a risk, but I'm ready for a new adventure and I can only see this campaign as a stepping stone that'll help me to achieve my goals

1. Excellent vegetable-tanned leather. We use top-quality, full-grain, 3-oz buffalo leather. Eco-friendly vegetable tanning technology preserves traces of the animal’s life, such as patina and scars, giving the material its special properties.
column2: >2. Hand-made quality. We don’t just process the leather ourselves
column3: we hand-sew it, too, using a reliable double stitch.
column4:
>*The only process that we entrust to a machine is laser engraving and cutting. This allows us to maximize the quality of our products.

3. Natural materials. We process the leather with oils, dyes and waxes that we make ourselves. At the final stage, we coat the leather in Eco-Flo finish from the USA. For stitching, we use waxed ramie (nettle) thread.

4. Uniqueness. Texture, dyeing, stitching – all this can vary slightly from one wallet to another, making each accessory truly unique. But, if you want to personalize your item, we will engrave it with your name or any other wording you like!

5. Brutal men’s design We like our leather goods to combine everyday convenience with a brutal look. We hope you like the way our products are designed.

 

We spent over six months working on our first collection. We have made the definitive prototypes of our products, and now we are ready to start production. To launch it, we need to rent and fit out a workshop (we’ve been working in a home set-up until now). We need about $4,000 to achieve this. We will be grateful to you for any contribution you can make to our business, and we will make every effort to please you!

To everyone who will support us on Indiegogo, we offer a discount of 20-30% and free engraving of your name on the product.

Our wallets are designed for US dollars by default. If you use the Euro or another currency, please state this when you order. We will change the dimensions of the product especially for you.

 

Stylish, practical men’s clutch. Compartments for bills, four cards, passport, and cellphone, plus a coin pocket. Press-stud fastening.

  • Dimensions when closed: 180 x 102 mm (7” x 4”)

For this product is available free engraving with your name or (other text up to 20 characters)

 

Stylish passport cover with four credit card slots. Designed for easy removal and replacement of passport without creasing or other damage.

Fits a passport measuring 125 x 88 mm (4.9” x 3.46”), += 2mm approx, by default. If the size of your passport is different, please state this when ordering!

For this product is available free engraving with your name or (other text up to 20 characters).

 

Classic men’s bifold wallet. Bill compartment and four convenient credit card slots.

By default, the wallet is designed for US dollars. If you use any other currency, please state this when ordering!

For this product is available free engraving with your name or (other text up to 20 characters).

 

Original vintage-style men’s wallet with fastening strap. Bill compartment and three credit card slots.

The wallet is designed for US dollars by default. If you use any other currency, please state this when ordering!

For this product is available free engraving with your name or (other text up to 20 characters)

 

A convenient and minimalist card holder with six compartments for cards.

For this product is available free engraving with your name or (other text up to 20 characters)

 

A small cardholder with an extra pocket for cash notes. Allows you to store up to five cards.

For this product only engraving of initials is available (2-3 characters)

 

Choose between two color options for leather and thread.

Leather color options:

column1:
Important! As we dye our leather by hand, texture and shade may vary slightly from that shown in photos.

    We will be happy to consider your suggestions for the color of our products.

    We are prepared to produce our wallets in any new color if it is suggested by a large number of people and if the reproducing the color is technically feasible. But the project needs to raise over $4,000 first.

    We will send out a survey at the end of the campaign for you to designate your leather and thread color choice as well as text for engraving.

     

    We know how to work with leather, and we are ready to start fulfilling orders! Our prototypes are ready, and we have made arrangements with a leather supplier, so we can start production in as little as two week after raising the necessary funds – that is how long we will need to sign the rental agreement and carry out the initial fit-out of the workshop.

    We plan to make and ship approximately 120-150 goods per month. That is the number of orders we can fulfill while maintaining the high quality of our product. However, if we get a great many orders (over 300), we will raise our productivity by hiring and training new people.

    Orders will be dispatched by first-class mail (with tracking number). Delivery to Europe and North America normally takes 10-16 days. We guarantee prompt dispatch of goods, but delivery times are, unfortunately, not under our control.  

    If you need to receive your item urgently, please tell us. We will ship your order via a courier service. But the courier service will be at your expense.

    Additional customs duties may be charged in your country. In that event, you will have to pay them yourself. Please be prepared for this eventuality.

     

    NATURAL MATERIALS. In our country, unfortunately, the eco-friendly style is not yet all that popular. But we believe that eco-friendliness is the way to go, and we are striving to make our production as safe as possible for nature and for people.

    100% VEGETABLE-TANNED LEATHER. We have selected top-quality 3-oz buffalo leather as our main material. What distinguishes vegetable-tanned leather from ordinary natural (chrome-tanned) leather is that only natural ingredients, like oak bark, mimosa etc., are used in processing it. The main advantages of this kind of leather are its total eco-friendliness and the luxurious look achieved through the unique ageing effect that brings out an attractive patina and patches of wear. This kind of technology has its drawbacks too, of course: processing with plant ingredients takes longer, so the material costs more. But the high quality and durability of the product fully makes up for this.

    NATURAL OILS, DYES AND WAXES. We use natural oils, dyes and wax that we make ourselves to color and process the leather. To protect the leather from environmental effects, we apply a special finish from US manufacturer Eco-Flo. Unfortunately, we cannot supply information about the composition of this product as it is a trade secret of the manufacturer.

    HANDCRAFTAT most every stage of production is carried out by hand by our craftspeople. We start by choosing the best pieces of hide on the roll, then cutting them out and sending them for laser cutting and engraving. Next, we impregnate the hide with oils and waxes, and leave it to dry for 1-2 days. Then, we dye it, work the edges and treat the leather in finisher. In the final stage, we hand-sew the parts together with a straight double stitch.

     

    This is our first Indiegogo project, but we are fully confident of our abilities. We believe to our work and our designs so strongly that we warranty them against defects in materials.  If there ever is a problem with one of our products just send it back and we will repair or replace it for free!

    As with any project, the main risk is a delay in the supply of materials. The likelihood of this is low, but we feel ourselves duty bound to flag it up. In any event, the quality of your order will be high!

    We will pleasantly surprise you!

    Please support our project!

The market is asking us to move forward with two important milestones: to be present at MICAM  www.themicam.com and to produce a new collection for the Milano Fashion Week  www.milanomodadonna.it
In order to achieve our goals we need
Milano's labyrinthine leather makes this shoe a sophisticated beauty. The 20mm platform will help you walk in this 120mm heel peep-toe shoe, and definitely give you a sexy boost.

Pamela and Pamelina are amazing décolleté with a unique curvy profile. That super sexy line will not leave you invisible between hundreds of other shoes. The Pamela's heel is 95mm, Pamelina's heel is 55mm high, and the strap can be used with or without the ECO-fur detail (we thought this could be used much more during the winter season).

Alice is a sweet shoe in pink patented leather. Lace yourself up into these luxurious pumps with 95mm heels and become the envy of every lady in the room. Please don't be surprised if people stare at your dazzling footwear!

If you are in Milan , visit our showroom ""Business in Fashion"" , viale Umbria 54
www.businessinfashion.com

If you are in Moscow , visit our boutique ""TenDresses"" , Taganskaya ul, 24
website

Since every foot is different, we will send to all our backers a simple chart and ask for measurements (in addition to the request of the usual shoe size): this little check will provide the best fit.

Good things come to those who wait. We have good reasons to think that the delivery will be done during May2017 or even earlier. In the lucky situation of a great campaign, we will set the delivery timeline according to the production capacity. We always put a strong effort in order to satisfy all our customers, but please consider that every piece is handmade.

First time to Indiegogo?

It is super easy!
• Decide how many Louis Monti Watches you would like then click the pink button that says, ""GET THIS PERK.""
• Fill out your shipping information and continue with your payment.
• Receive and fill out the survey for color choices via email
• We receive your color choices and prepare your watch.
• You receive your order and eternal convenience is in your hands

Our Story:

Louis Monti is started by two young entrepreneurs and watch enthusiasts Amjad (UAE) and Elia Sadat (Afghanistan).  With their passion and desire for watches, we created Louis Monti to deliver a trustful name to watch enthusiast through our quality and beautiful timepieces. We have always been obsessed with the price tag of branded and luxury watches while tired of paying for replica and low quality watches. Hence, we stood up to make high end watches that are made of high quality materials, stylish and yet affordable. We are bent and intended to mix far-east and middle-east craftsmanship and materials to make Louis Monti timepieces

While designing our first collection, we made sure of three major details:
• Highest quality materials and high end finishing
• Reasonable price that could be afforded by each watch enthusiast

The LM (Lous Monti) Collection:

For our first collection, we are offering five models.

 

Specification:
• Dial Window Material: Sapphire Coated Harden Crystal

Now we're here, on IndieGogo, with a fully functional prototype that looks amazing. We just need one more thing... your support!

 

Movement:

Watch movements are arguably the most important part of a watch as the heart and brain of a timepiece. To have a good timepiece that gives you good indication of the time and last long, you need to look for a watch movement when you are going to purchase one.  We at Louis Monti have chosen one of the best movements made by Japanese Miyota/Citizen Ltd.  The model we have used for our first collection is Miyota 6P00.

 

Movement Guide:

Moonphase:

Moon has been the first way of keeping the track of calendar throughout the history and it has been used by travelers to find their ways. A calendar that is based on the moon is called a lunar calendar which has 12 months and each month is 29 ½ days. Despite Gregorian calendar being common and legal in most countries , traditional lunar  calendar continues to be used in many countries to determine special occasions such as Ramadan, Eids (Islamic calendar) The moonphase on Louis Monti timepieces indicates the position of the moon.

 

 

Case Material:

The material that we have used to make Louis Monti cases are 316L stainless steel which is the highest grade of stainless steel

 

 

 

Water Resistance of Louis Monti:

Our watches are 5ATM water resistant. It means it will resist water getting inside until the pressure of the water is 5 Atm.

Waterproof Guide:

 

Warranty:

We are confident with the quality and durability of our watches and therefore, we offer 24 months warranty from date of purchase. We would accept to repair, fix or even replace if something were to happen to your Louis Monti watch during this period.

Please note that, the warranty does not cover:
• Any damage on any part of the watch resulting from abnormal/abusive use, lack of care, negligence, accidents (knocks dents, crushing, broken crystal, etc.)
• Water damage unless marked “5 ATM” up water resistance

Louis Monti vs Retail:

 

 

Where is Louis Monti headed to?

As watch enthusiasts, we want to have full range of different types and styles for different choices of timepiece lovers and with affordable price. We have intended to combine middle-east and far-east craftsmanship and materials to use our watches. Therefore, please join us on this journey, be part of it every step of the way and support us to make this happen successfully. We are there to update you throughout the entire process and we will make sure that our bakers are up to date on any new and important information. We want to create a bond and trust with our backers, because it is you who are turning this dream into a reality.

We Need Your Support!

In order to turn this dream of ours into a reality, we need your support. It does not only mean pledging for one of our awesome watches, but sharing the story with family and friends. The important thing to remember with IndieGogo is, if we do not reach our full funding goal, we get nothing. 

https://www.facebook.com/LouisMontiTimepiece/

We are going to do everything we can to spread the word in a variety of ways.  We hope that, through the use of social media and blogs we can drive enough outside traffic to our page which will result in us reaching our funding goal.  If you could do something as simple as tweeting about our page, or just liking our Facebook page, it can really go a long way. Simply click the Facebook and Twitter tabs

 

If funded, how will we fulfill the orders?

We have already finalized the design and we have made the prototypes. Once the fund is released by Indiegogo and we received it, we will start making ours dream timepieces. It will roughly take 45 to 60 days for producing, testing and quality assurance checking. Then, our team will ship the orders to our amazing bakers.

 

Return and Refund Policy:

You may return our product for a full refund for any reason within 15 days of receiving it. It must be returned in the original packaging. If the product is defective or damaged, we will pay for return shipping.

Hence, we stood up to make high end watches that are made of high quality materials, stylish and yet affordable. We are bent and intended to mix far-east and middle-east craftsmanship and materials to make Louis Monti timepiecesWhile designing our first collection, we made sure of three major details:
Highest quality materials and high end finishing
Reasonable price that could be afforded by each watch enthusiast
The LM (Lous Monti) Collection:For our first collection, we are offering five models. Specification:
Strap Material: Genuine leather Alligator Texture
Dial Window Material: Sapphire Coated Harden Crystal

Now we're here, on IndieGogo, with a fully functional prototype that looks amazing. We just need one more thing... your support! Movement:Watch movements are arguably the most important part of a watch as the heart and brain of a timepiece. To have a good timepiece that gives you good indication of the time and last long, you need to look for a watch movement when you are going to purchase one.  We at Louis Monti have chosen one of the best movements made by Japanese Miyota/Citizen Ltd.  The model we have used for our first collection is Miyota 6P00. Movement Guide:Moonphase:Moon has been the first way of keeping the track of calendar throughout the history and it has been used by travelers to find their ways. A calendar that is based on the moon is called a lunar calendar which has 12 months and each month is 29 ½ days. Despite Gregorian calendar being common and legal in most countries , traditional lunar  calendar continues to be used in many countries to determine special occasions such as Ramadan, Eids (Islamic calendar) The moonphase on Louis Monti timepieces indicates the position of the moon.  Case Material:The material that we have used to make Louis Monti cases are 316L stainless steel which is the highest grade of stainless steel   Water Resistance of Louis Monti:Our watches are 5ATM water resistant. It means it will resist water getting inside until the pressure of the water is 5 Atm.Waterproof Guide: Warranty:We are confident with the quality and durability of our watches and therefore, we offer 24 months warranty from date of purchase. We would accept to repair, fix or even replace if something were to happen to your Louis Monti watch during this period.Please note that, the warranty does not cover:
Any damage on any part of the watch resulting from abnormal/abusive use, lack of care, negligence, accidents (knocks dents, crushing, broken crystal, etc.)
Water damage unless marked “5 ATM” up water resistance

Louis Monti vs Retail:  Where is Louis Monti headed to?As watch enthusiasts, we want to have full range of different types and styles for different choices of timepiece lovers and with affordable price. We have intended to combine middle-east and far-east craftsmanship and materials to use our watches. Therefore, please join us on this journey, be part of it every step of the way and support us to make this happen successfully. We are there to update you throughout the entire process and we will make sure that our bakers are up to date on any new and important information. We want to create a bond and trust with our backers, because it is you who are turning this dream into a reality.We Need Your Support!In order to turn this dream of ours into a reality, we need your support. It does not only mean pledging for one of our awesome watches, but sharing the story with family and friends. The important thing to remember with IndieGogo is, if we do not reach our full funding goal, we get nothing. https://www.facebook.com/LouisMontiTimepiece/We are going to do everything we can to spread the word in a variety of ways.  We hope that, through the use of social media and blogs we can drive enough outside traffic to our page which will result in us reaching our funding goal.  If you could do something as simple as tweeting about our page, or just liking our Facebook page, it can really go a long way. Simply click the Facebook and Twitter tabs If funded, how will we fulfill the orders?We have already finalized the design and we have made the prototypes. Once the fund is released by Indiegogo and we received it, we will start making ours dream timepieces. It will roughly take 45 to 60 days for producing, testing and quality assurance checking. Then, our team will ship the orders to our amazing bakers. Return and Refund Policy:You may return our product for a full refund for any reason within 15 days of receiving it. It must be returned in the original packaging. If the product is defective or damaged, we will pay for return shipping.",19.0,0,"1 Campaign

column3: >CRØSS THE.LINE from fast fashion to sustainability.
column5: >We love minimal design. In the past, we have expressed this passion in different forms, from interior design and DIY projects to graphic design and our own lifestyle. The abstract and minimal tattoos we have on our bodies are proof of how much we identify with the vision of ""less is more"" and how a simple message can transmit a powerful meaning.
column9: >After designing tattoos for some time, I actually began tattooing with a technique called stick'n'poke (meaning no machine, using just a needle and a steady hand). This style influenced our designs and our perspective considerably when creating our clothing line. Many people hesitate to buy eco-friendly, organic clothing. They tend to think of the price, the neutral colors and heavy fabrics. We want to show everyone that crossing the line from traditional consumerism to a more sustainable approach towards the fashion industry doesn't have to be boring. And by educating our customers on sustainable production processes, fair wages/fair trade, and other factors that contribute to the economics of sustainable clothing, we hope to create a world that no longers invests in fast fashion.
column11: >Why are we crowdfunding?
column13: >The pandemic has been difficult on all of us, and we truly understand the struggles of unemployment as well as trying to find purpose in a year that almost seems wasted. When the lockdown started earlier this year, the freelance industry took a big hit, with companies drastically cutting back on their freelance resources. As a graphic designer, I fell into this category, and after taking some time to myself to reflect on my next steps and how I could contribute to the world in a positive way, the idea behind CRØSS THE.LINE studio was born. What started as a small passion project financed by what little savings we had, has now become something much bigger and much more meaningful than we could have ever imagined. Our project is not making any profit yet, and our goal is not to get rich. On the contrary, our goal is to continue to shine a light on what climate change and global pollution are doing to our planet and provide our customers with a clear path to a sustainable lifestyle one step at a time.
column15: >This is why we launched this crowdfunding and why your help is so important to us. We want our small business to stay alive and continue to raise awareness for environmental and social issues and be able to donate more to non-profit organizations that support conservation and sustainability.
column17: >Inclusive, minimal looks with no surplus production makes us highly sustainable!
column19: >We care deeply about our planet and all the creatures on it. Every piece is made especially for you, which makes our processes highly sustainable. We only work with organic or recycled materials with Fair Trade, OEKO-TEX® ECO PASSPORT, and GOTS 5.0 labels. Our print ink is water-based, 100% eco-certified, and gentle on your skin and to Mother Earth. Products are shipped in top quality eco-friendly recyclable cardboard pouches or, depending on the size of the product, in flexible pouches made of recycled materials. Even the paper used to print our slips is 100% recycled. Additionally, all our products are vegan.
column23: >With our brand, we protect and support the planet. Each one of our collections is dedicated to a specific ecosystem on earth. 10% of our profits go to non-profit organizations, like <a href=""http://www.seashepherd.pt/en/home/"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" style=""font-family: Arapey, serif
column25: >Sea Shepherd Portugal. This way we help battle climate change and make it easy for you to have an impact.
column27: >You mean the world to us, literally.
column29: >Wearing a <a href=""https://crosstheline.studio/"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" style=""font-family: Arapey, serif
column31: >CRØSS THE.LINE piece of clothing not only shows your sense of style but also expresses your devotion to this planet. Help us keep this mission going and support us on Indiegogo. Please spread the word and follow us on Instagram
column33: >@crossthelinestudio. Thank you so much!
column35:
>

Help us keep this mission going and support us on Indiegogo. Please spread the word and follow us on Instagram @crossthelinestudio. Thank you so much!",3.0,0,"1 Campaign

column1: We are Chesia and Raysha the creators of LURVE.
LURVE is a play on the word love because we absolutely LOVE our product and sure that you will too.
Our mission is to bring the very best premium quality loungewear and sleepwear that is super comfortable for everyone.
Our Lurve sleepwear is not only good for sleeping but also good for the ""mix &
We chose and use natural fiber fabric that has the highest comfort and quality.
Our sleepwear consists of 95% bamboo and 5% elastane.
Touch and feel it and you’ll never go back to your old loungewear and sleepwear.
Our collections are designed to be breathable and anti-microbial, to keep you comfortable and wearing them longer.
We decided to launch our capsule collection in our classic cut with a monochromatic theme. We hope that you are ready to be lurved!
• Thermo Regulating - warm in winter, and cool in summer

We would like to achieve a goal of CAD $10,000 to get this project going and be sustainable for now. We will put 100% of the money to get the production going, build a user-friendly website, marketing tools, and launch more collections in the future.
We are optimistic that we can reach this goal. However, we will prepare in case our goal is not met, and we will try to fulfill the orders from all the people that believe in us.

We both grew up in Indonesia and met each other in Canada. We connected in the love of fashion and the realization that all women have the same right to achieve their dreams. We believe all girls, from all backgrounds, deserve the best in their life, including PJs! We want to create a better life for everyone. By helping us with this project, you give us voice! You are helping girls like us to believe that this world can be a better and safe place for EVERYONE to create and express themselves.
Although in life nothing comes easy, we enjoy the hard work behind our product and everything we achieved so far.

This is our first time doing crowdfunding so, we will be transparent and also admit that there will be so many challenges during the process. We will learn more and we promise that we work hard to deliver satisfaction. The productions take 30-45 days and the shipping takes up to 6 weeks.
We appreciate any help. Please share this with friends and family!

For me, the passion to put an end to gun violence started after the Sandy Hook school shooting. I was watching news story after news story, listening to tributes after tribute watching little innocent faces crowd my TV screen and I was overcome with emotion, numb and scared.
What can we do, what could have bee done to prevent this? These questions and thoughts kept reeling through my head for days on end.
More and more countless acts of gun violence just kept coming through my television screen and news feed for months and years to come. It was becoming too much of a regular occurrence.

Then the Orlando Nightclub shooting that happened in 2016 —  My best friend was visiting her sister in Orlando at the time. She was completely unreachable until the morning hours. Could she have been in the club and one of the 102 victims hurt, killed or traumatized during that horrific incident?
I wasn't sure. So much so, that her family almost boarded a plane to reunify with them to provide them safety and comfort after this horrific event.
More so, the Orlando Nightclub massacre was an attack on my community of the LGBTQ people.
As a Lesbian woman, I felt deeply saddened that a person could target a group of people for loving who they want to love.
Las Vegas, Nevada in 2017 — Stephen Craig Paddock, 64, fired a barrage of rapid gunfire from his 32nd floor of the Mandalay Bay Resort and Casino leaving 546 injured and causing 58 fatalities.
I was supposed to go there one week later for a trade show.
In response to this incident, I reached out to people we were working with who operated out of Las Vegas. I needed to make sure that they were okay.
It was one call that really hit home for me.
A phone call with a young mother who shared with me that a few of her friends were being treated for gunshot wounds who were at the concert. She wasn't sure if they were going to be okay.

She was planning on bringing her daughter to the concert and backed out last minute because she couldn't find a babysitter to watch her younger children. I was stunned. Was an angel watching over her?
Countless shootings have happened time and time again, leaving me feeling hopeless and even more powerless than before.
When will a horrific event like this happen again?

Well it was most recently when a man and his wife open fired into a Kosher market in my own community of Jersey City, New Jersey. An attack meant to target and kill the Jewish people. This incident left 4 killed and 3 injured.
I am Jewish and I live 1 mile away from where this shooting occurred.
This was an attack on religious freedom. Aren't we allowed to practice the religion without persecution?
The truth: There's too much that needs to be done and we must all work our hardest to join in the movement to put an end to gun violence.
THIS IS WHY I STARTED MILLENNIAL GANG.
It's not supposed to be the next hot fashion line, I am no fashionista, trust in me when I say that.
It's supposed to be a brand that is joining a movement, a greater cause — creating an awareness around and putting an end to gun violence.
For every purchase made, we will donate a portion of the proceeds to Everytown for Gun Safety.
Together we can help protect the next generation.
With your contribution, I will put it towards:
• Production - Purchasing clothing inventory for initial customer base.
• Influencer Program - Work closely with influential people to help promote and spread awareness around Millennial Gang and our initiative.
• Initial Donation - I will take a portion of the funds raised and donate the money to Everytown.
After my campaign ends, I will send Millennial Gang swag to each contributor along with the amount of money that was donated to Everytown.
The Impact of Gun Violence:
I've worked for startups for a long time and understand what is involved to take an idea from concept to realization.
I have the ability to take a brand off the ground and now I need your help to turn this idea into a reality — together we will affect great change and create a better tomorrow for humanity.
Use the Indiegogo share tools to tell your friends, family and colleagues about Millennial Gang.

And that's all there is to it. 

I thank you for making a difference.

-SL

Welcome to my idea for an animal friendly, virtually indestructible belt. It's called the Belt of Orion. It will do a great job of keeping your pants while at the same time.... not hurting any animals. The best part about this belt is the durability. It won't crack at the holes like a lot of belts out there seem to do. This belt will LAST! And, to reassure you, I'm backing it with a four-year guarantee. This belt will also plant trees on earth... eventually... with your help! Read on to find out how.
As an accessory to the belt I am offering a unisex masculine -looking bracelet. It has a magnetic closure and the metal is nickel free. Available in different sizes and in black semi-gloss only.

Over the past decade it has come to light that animals are not being treated with respect or dignity. We’ve seen millions of acres of trees being cut down to make room for animal agriculture. And this year we are really learning the truth about what is going on in wet markets. It doesn’t make sense. Do we REALLY need to keep abusing animals in this day and age? HECK NO! Animal agriculture is one of the top polluters on our planet. There is another way. You know what's cool? Compassion... and belts that last!

Years ago we discovered a revolutionary new material being used by the Mennonites in St. Jacobs, Canada. They use it for their horses’ reins and harnesses. It's stronger than leather and does not stretch and crack at the holes over time. And, it's 100% animal friendly. Cool! It's called coated webbing.

Coated webbing is made from a core material of seat belt webbing, which is incredibly strong. Then that webbing is coated with the highest-grade vinyl made in the United States and complies with North American standards (PROP 65, REACH, CPSIA 2008). This same material is also used in the medical, sporting goods, safety and military industries.

You're probably asking, why use vinyl? In my opinion, it's far more humane to use man-made materials instead of a skin of an animal, which was treated poorly, abused and killed. By supporting man-made materials, more innovation will go into the longevity and recyclability aspects of these materials.

Did you to know that, after all the chemical treatments required to make a ""genuine leather belt,"" the original animal skin becomes non-recyclable and non-biodegradable? The belt of Orion is ""genuine non-leather"".

The BELT OF ORION comes in 3 different colours and in the below sizes. Custom sizes are available. There are 6 holes for adjustment. The available sizes are 28, 30, 32, 34, 36, 38, 40, 42, 44 (in inches).

Orion’s Belt is the name of a collection of stars that are a part of Orion, one of the most popular and recognisable constellations in our night sky. Orion’s Belt is made of three stars arranged in a seemingly perfect line. The full constellation looks like a stick figure and these three stars make up Orion’s belt.
Over the centuries, many stories have made Orion to be a hunter or a warrior. And now the year is 2020 and I made up my own story.  I see this stick figure as an archer ....

This archer is a magical being who has super powers. She shoots a magical light arrow to Earth. The magic of this arrow wakes us humans up to the fact that we are all interconnected and that what happens in one part of the planet affects us all. The arrow has three words engraved on it. LOVE, LIGHT and TRUTH.
But seriously... who is this 'Being' in the sky, who is going to help create change on planet earth?

YOU are the one who will make changes on earth. With the choices you make, the way you treat yourself, others and animals, and the companies and products you support, YOU make a HUGE difference. Each choice you make affects all living things in ways you can't even conceive of. By funding just one Orion belt, you will help decrease the unnecessary pain and suffering of animals.
Where I am in the development of this belt?

I have everything in place to manufacture and ship the Belt of Orion ot you. The buckle mold has been custom designed and paid for, and everything else is in place to start manufacturing the Belt of Orion… after that, it can ship to you!
The last hurdle is to order a minimum quantity of 1000 units for the buckle and the minimum order quantity for the coated webbing strap material. That is why I need your help, Kickstarter!

Once the Belt of Orion is funded and on the market it will be available on my website (around November/December of 2020) at www.truthbelts.com where one tree will be planted with every purchase of this belt.
FYI: The Belt of Orion was influenced by a previous belt I made called The Slug. It’s made from the same strap material and has been around (with great reviews!) for about 9 years.
Some customers requested a different buckle that was  nickel-free and more chunky looking. That's where the idea for the belt of Orion came from.
Please click the green ""Back this project"" button right now. Every little bit helps. If all you can do is forward the Indiegogo link to a few people you know, you will have my eternal gratitude.

THANK YOU. From the very bottom of my heart, THANK YOU so much for your support! I really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really want to make difference in this world with this super cool belt!
Which aspects have I considered when choosing a factory?
I am using a sewing factory here in Ontario Canada. Because we are based in Ontario, we know this factory well and have been there many times. It is top notch!
The buckle comes from a small metal maker in Germany who specializes in high end buckle and metal chains.

The coated webbing strap material come from USA. They comply with North American standards (Prop 65, REACH, CPSIA 2008). There are many other places in the world that make vinyls that do not comply to ANY regulations. We have chosen not use purchase our materials there just to save money.
What kind of low-impact materials will you use?

When having to choose between man-made materials and the skin of an animal that was treated poorly, abused and killed, we chose man-made. By supporting man-made materials, more innovation will go into the evolution of these materials in terms of sustainability and recyclability.

The strap is a coated webbing. I discovered this material from the Mennonites in a town called St Jacobs. They use it for their horses reins and harnesses because it is stronger than leather and will not crack at the holes. The core of the strap is seat belt webbing, which is incredibly strong. Then, it’s coated with the highest-grade vinyl that is made in the United States and complies with North American standards (PROP 65, REACH, CPSIA 2008). This same material is also used in the medical, sporting goods, safety and military industries.

If it weren't for the COVID situation I would have the belts shipped to you by the end of October. We have therefore extended our delivery dates until December of 2020... just to be safe. All shipments will have a tracking number. Even then, there is usually 1-2%  human error that occurs. But don't worry, you will be taken care of.
Mistakes happen during the production process from time to time, but it's very rare. If a wrong size sent to you in error, you will be taken care of:)
If you are not in a situation to contribute you can still help by:
• Get the word out and make some noise about this cool vegan belt with Indiegogo's share tools.

Animal agriculture is one of the top polluters on our planet. There is another way. You know what's cool? Compassion... and belts that last!

Years ago we discovered a revolutionary new material being used by the Mennonites in St. Jacobs, Canada. They use it for their horses’ reins and harnesses. It's stronger than leather and does not stretch and crack at the holes over time. And, it's 100% animal friendly. Cool! It's called coated webbing.

Coated webbing is made from a core material of seat belt webbing, which is incredibly strong. Then that webbing is coated with the highest-grade vinyl made in the United States and complies with North American standards (PROP 65, REACH, CPSIA 2008). This same material is also used in the medical, sporting goods, safety and military industries.

You're probably asking, why use vinyl? In my opinion, it's far more humane to use man-made materials instead of a skin of an animal, which was treated poorly, abused and killed. By supporting man-made materials, more innovation will go into the longevity and recyclability aspects of these materials.

Did you to know that, after all the chemical treatments required to make a ""genuine leather belt,"" the original animal skin becomes non-recyclable and non-biodegradable? The belt of Orion is ""genuine non-leather"".

The BELT OF ORION comes in 3 different colours and in the below sizes. Custom sizes are available. There are 6 holes for adjustment. The available sizes are 28, 30, 32, 34, 36, 38, 40, 42, 44 (in inches).

Orion’s Belt is the name of a collection of stars that are a part of Orion, one of the most popular and recognisable constellations in our night sky. Orion’s Belt is made of three stars arranged in a seemingly perfect line. The full constellation looks like a stick figure and these three stars make up Orion’s belt.
Over the centuries, many stories have made Orion to be a hunter or a warrior. And now the year is 2020 and I made up my own story.  I see this stick figure as an archer ....

This archer is a magical being who has super powers. She shoots a magical light arrow to Earth. The magic of this arrow wakes us humans up to the fact that we are all interconnected and that what happens in one part of the planet affects us all. The arrow has three words engraved on it. LOVE, LIGHT and TRUTH.
But seriously... who is this 'Being' in the sky, who is going to help create change on planet earth?

YOU are the one who will make changes on earth. With the choices you make, the way you treat yourself, others and animals, and the companies and products you support, YOU make a HUGE difference. Each choice you make affects all living things in ways you can't even conceive of. By funding just one Orion belt, you will help decrease the unnecessary pain and suffering of animals.
Where I am in the development of this belt?

I have everything in place to manufacture and ship the Belt of Orion ot you. The buckle mold has been custom designed and paid for, and everything else is in place to start manufacturing the Belt of Orion… after that, it can ship to you!
The last hurdle is to order a minimum quantity of 1000 units for the buckle and the minimum order quantity for the coated webbing strap material. That is why I need your help, Kickstarter!

Once the Belt of Orion is funded and on the market it will be available on my website (around November/December of 2020) at www.truthbelts.com where one tree will be planted with every purchase of this belt.
FYI: The Belt of Orion was influenced by a previous belt I made called The Slug. It’s made from the same strap material and has been around (with great reviews!) for about 9 years.
Some customers requested a different buckle that was  nickel-free and more chunky looking. That's where the idea for the belt of Orion came from.
Please click the green ""Back this project"" button right now. Every little bit helps. If all you can do is forward the Indiegogo link to a few people you know, you will have my eternal gratitude.

THANK YOU. From the very bottom of my heart, THANK YOU so much for your support! I really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really want to make difference in this world with this super cool belt!
Which aspects have I considered when choosing a factory?
I am using a sewing factory here in Ontario Canada. Because we are based in Ontario, we know this factory well and have been there many times. It is top notch!
The buckle comes from a small metal maker in Germany who specializes in high end buckle and metal chains.

The coated webbing strap material come from USA. They comply with North American standards (Prop 65, REACH, CPSIA 2008). There are many other places in the world that make vinyls that do not comply to ANY regulations. We have chosen not use purchase our materials there just to save money.
What kind of low-impact materials will you use?

When having to choose between man-made materials and the skin of an animal that was treated poorly, abused and killed, we chose man-made. By supporting man-made materials, more innovation will go into the evolution of these materials in terms of sustainability and recyclability.

The strap is a coated webbing. I discovered this material from the Mennonites in a town called St Jacobs. They use it for their horses reins and harnesses because it is stronger than leather and will not crack at the holes. The core of the strap is seat belt webbing, which is incredibly strong. Then, it’s coated with the highest-grade vinyl that is made in the United States and complies with North American standards (PROP 65, REACH, CPSIA 2008). This same material is also used in the medical, sporting goods, safety and military industries.

If it weren't for the COVID situation I would have the belts shipped to you by the end of October. We have therefore extended our delivery dates until December of 2020... just to be safe. All shipments will have a tracking number. Even then, there is usually 1-2%  human error that occurs. But don't worry, you will be taken care of.
Mistakes happen during the production process from time to time, but it's very rare. If a wrong size sent to you in error, you will be taken care of:)
If you are not in a situation to contribute you can still help by:
Get the word out and make some noise about this cool vegan belt with Indiegogo's share tools.",6.0,0,"1 Campaign

The watch dial has a 7-layer structure plan, which is by all accounts taken from a sci-fi film.

The sapphire precious stone has been covered with an enemy of intelligent material, which implies you are failing to get a glare out of it. It is scratch-verification, and even hard metals can't make a dent in it.

The hour part is intended to be perused on a level plane. The moment is a 120-degree fan, like the Retrograde strategy. The second is a sliding number in a little window. The numbers and tracks are Swiss superluminova to make it simple to peruse the time plainly around evening time.

Caesar cypher is a straightforward type of encryption. Each letter of the number is supplanted by your letter a few situations down. The technique for encryption is named after Julius Caesar, who utilized this enigmatic encoding to speak with his authorities.

ATOWAK welcomes an account of Caesar's code on a watch, which is moderate and appears as though something out of a science fiction film. However, we guarantee you, it is genuine, and we are battling to rejuvenate it.

The word ATOWAK is Caesar cypher itself for the word UNIQUE when moved 6 letters. The word ATOWAK moved 20 letters to get UNIQUE.

ATOWAK is UNIQUE!

In spite of the fact that this is a troublesome street, we trust somebody will stroll with us. We are searching for the individual who makes us state ""A debt of gratitude is in order for your help"", that is the reason we came to Indiegogo.

ATOWAK was helped to establish by watchshopin.com and Bribeat. Watchshopin.com is principally occupied with the discount and retail of watches and gems, is liable for ATOWAK's venture, and is likewise one of the spots where ATOWAK will retail later on. The primary work of the Bribeat group is the production and advancement of watches.

Bribeat is made out of Johnny and specialists who have been in the watch business for over 20 years. We have worked with some celebrated watch brands on the planet for over 10 years, so we have enough insight and the capacity to make a brilliant watch. Subsequently, we have an experienced flexibly chain of watch developments, movements, cases, straps, dials, hands, and different adornments. ATOWAK watches are planned, created, and fabricated without anyone else. There is no broker, so we can give the most minimal costs and the best items.

column3:
Luxury to Your Wrist

Bruno Watches is here to revolutionize the way you buy a luxury timepiece. We deliver sophisticated, high-end watches at a fraction of the original retail price. Buyers of our limited-edition watches get to lay hands on 4.9 mm ultra-slim luxury timepieces, with class-apart straps that speak of a premium built and expert craft.
column4:
>

 

Bruno is not just a watch
column5:
it’s an idea, developed into perfection over years of expert artistry and dedicated efforts. After working together with world-class jewelry connoisseurs and Italian craftsmen, we brought to life this ultra-slim masterpiece that speaks for itself. Among others in the similar price range, Bruno Watches are the slimmest of its kind. Measuring only 4.9 mm, it’s the slenderest that you can own in that budget.

Each design is minimalistic and truly luxurious, just as the wearer’s persona. We seek inspiration from Japanese Quartz Movement 5R21 and integrate it with a touch of modernity and sheer perfection. Different strap styles vary in texture and impression – From classic stainless steel to statement Crocodile skin, Python crust and Italian leather, we're sure you’ll find your favourite!
column6:
>

All Bruno Watches come with changeable Stainless-Steel Straps that embrace solidity and resilience, a metal that has been ruling the watch industry since ages. To compliment the timelessness of Steel, we have three other strap options, Crocodile skin, Python crust and Italian leather. We have four variants in the Stainless-Steel Collection:  

∙ Yellow Gold: The perfect gold, crafted to sheer opulence.  

∙ Rose Gold: Imperial, thriving Gold, with a touch of rose.  

∙ Silver: Subtle shine, and finishes to die for. 

∙ Metallic Grey: For the bold, brave you.

And endless other dial and strap combinations...
column8:
>

All Bruno Watches come with changeable high-quality Italian leather . Backers can also upgrade to Crocodile skin, Python crust or the classic Stainless-Steel straps ! 

The material used in our straps is 100% genuine to the name and meets international standards of quality to ensure an imperial wearing experience.  

Carefully manufactured in Europe, the authenticity of leather has been our top priority, which makes for soft, comfortable and durable straps. The thickness of each strap is 0.8mm. However, the strap-size 20mm comes with the 40mm case size of our watch.

These strap sizes have been rationally created to fit comfortably on wrists of all sizes, both men’s and women’s. We offer a variety of colours, from vibrant to basic, to suit all your moods. The quick-release straps let you switch to a different coloured strap in a breeze. 

More than 286 combinations
column9: choose from 4 timeless shades of Stainless Steel, 8 different colours of Italian leather, 7 hues of Python crust and 19 tints of Crocodile skin. You’re sure to find your personal favourites!
column10:
>

 You can change the look of your watch in a breeze, without any tools, as all Bruno Watches come with quick release straps. Easily switch from one strap to another, with a gentle push. From classic Italian leather to the regal Crocodile skin, within seconds…
column11:
>

 Besides so many features and superlative quality, Bruno Watches are also backed up with a 5-year warranty against manufacturing defects. So, you can buy with 100% confidence!
column12:
>

Bruno is not just a watch
column13: it’s an idea, developed into perfection over years of expert artistry and dedicated efforts. After working together with world-class jewellery connoisseurs and Italian craftsmen, we brought to life this masterpiece that speaks for itself.
column14:
>

Each design is minimalist and truly luxurious, just as the wearer’s persona. We seek inspiration from Japanese Quartz Movement 5R21 and integrate it with a touch of modernity and sheer perfection.  

Different strap styles vary in texture and impression – From classic stainless steel to statement Crocodile skin, Python crust and Italian leather, we're sure you’ll find your favourite!
column15:
>

After years of meticulous planning and expert European craft, we brought Bruno to life. Our collection of luxury timepieces is an amalgamation of scrupulous manufacturing, fine artistry and tremendous strength. 

Coordinating with leading timepiece creators from across the globe, we put the specks of some of the world’s best technologies together into, what we call – A Bruno!  

Each Bruno Watch is made from the finest stainless steel 316L, which boasts high standards of comfort and strength. With relatively low weight, the watch feels like it’s barely there on the wrist but makes an inescapable statement, every time you flaunt it.
column16:
>

The Sapphire Crystal Glass, with anti-reflective coating , is exemplary of the world-class design and technology that we have worked upon for years. Seeking inspiration from the Japanese finesse, we induced the renowned Japanese Miyota 5R21 into Bruno, offering the best of experience to every backer.
column17:
>

Water Resistant: 3 ATM, 30 meters  

Unfailing water resistance to 30 meters, makes Bruno suitable for heavy-duty performance
column19: but we don't mind comparisons. Here's how we are different and better than others.
column20:
>

Eliminating the middlemen blocking your way to a priceless timepiece, we make sure that nothing stands in between a Bruno and its admirer.  

Doing things differently, we follow a direct-to-consumer model.  

This cuts out the need for wholesalers, distributors and retails stores. This way, a priceless Bruno timepiece reaches its admirer for only $100 (limited quantity, offer price for super early birds).

We offer FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE with a 30 days return policy. Full return or exchange guaranteed on unused watches.
column24: >
column25:
>

 

We will unlock all, Python and crocodile exotic leather strap after £100K. A world of endless possibilities is just a 'share' away.
column26:
>

All Bruno Watches, are wrapped in high-end, signature packages. Made, placed and delivered with utmost care. 

The wooden material and shiny finish, make the chief case robust yet stylish.

Keeps all your Bruno Watches and favorite straps in place…

Leather-made, perfect for storing single watches.

So you can store those majestic leather straps separately, untouched and discrete.

For watch lovers and their infinite collection, keep them all safe and well-arranged.

Be the First to Own a Bruno Watch  

We have worked day in, day out to bring a masterpiece to life, and we will keep striving hard until you are have received your Bruno Watch and are fully contented!  

Be the first to lay hands on this exquisite timepiece, exemplary of its magnificence and high performance. And, make Bruno a success with your generous contributions!  

We promise that you’ll take immense pride in our creation, every time you wear it!

  For any assistance , contact us at :- support@davidbrunowatches.com

Risks and challenges

Our production strategy is unfailing and delivery plan is rock-solid. We are aware that despite the thought and effort, our project may face unforeseen issues, but we have anticipated and planned for potential risks. Our project is backed with a 30-day return policy, which makes it a risk-free investment.

We invested over 2 years in designing, developing, and finalizing the product. Our production is quite planned and advanced and we are very confident about our capacity to deliver high-quality products on time. Moreover, we do not anticipate delays to our timeline owing to our professional and skillful suppliers. Also, we promise to keep you informed at all times, during the campaign and afterwards.

We would also like to thank you for all the support and we are excited to begin our new journey with you, the Indiegogo community!
