column1: From Chile to the world. Made with natural elements, our watches are sustainable elements, both stylish and affordable. The collection of wooden watches Castor reinvent the rules of fashion. Inspired by the native forest, using innovative designs with a touch of elegance.

column5: >Desde Chile para el mundo. Fabricados con elementos naturales, nuestros relojes son prendas de vestir sustentables, con estilo y su vez al alcance del bolsillo. La colección de relojes de madera Castor reinventan las reglas de la moda. Inspirándose en el bosque nativo, aplicando diseños innovadores con un toque de elegancia.

column1: Within a price range between $45 - 60$ USD our product is offering quality &
column4: design don't need to be expensive. In a market dominated by luxury, there's a space for design watches at affordable prices. That's why these wooden watches, besides the material innovation, can have commercial success. Our watches are made with Miyota Japan Movement and all includes natural leather strap and bamboo materials. Dual Bamboo case is stainless steel.

column5: >Con un rango de precio entre $45 - $60 USD, nuestro producto ofrece calidad y diseño innovador. Calidad + Innovación + Diseño no tienen por qué ser sinónimo de caro. En un mercado dominado por el lujo, hay espacio para relojes con diseño a precios accesibles. Es por esto que estos relojes de madera, aparte de la innovación en el uso de materiales, pueden tener éxito comercial. Nuestros relojes están fabricados con motor Miyota de Japón. Todos incluyen correas de cuero natural y materiales de madera de bamboo. La carcaza del Dual Bamboo es de acero inoxidable.

column1: The combination of natural materials with minimal markings on the watch, these designs make fusion something truly one of a kind.
We started this adventure by launching three models: DUAL bamboo and aluminum, ORIGIN and TOTEM.
La combinación de materiales de la naturaleza con marcas mínimas en el reloj, hacen estos diseños fusión algo verdaderamente único en su clase.

column1: The initiative is led by Gonzalo Grebe, Commercial Engineer + MSc. Marketing Universidad Adolfo Ibáñez, Chile and Master's Degree in Economics from the University of Grenoble, France. With eight years of experience in commercial companies, stops working as an employee to work on independent projects that contribute to the country with jobs for young and creative people. Collaborate with the initiative: Gonzalo Brusco, journalist, producer and photographer of the University of Playa Ancha, and Paulina Robledo, Graphic Designer of the Catholic University of Valparaiso.

column5: >La iniciativa es liderada por Gonzalo Grebe, Ingeniero Comercial - MSc. Marketing Universidad Adolfo Ibáñez - Chile y, Master en Economía de la Universidad de Grenoble, Francia. Con 8 años de experiencia en empresas de retail y consumo masivo, deja de trabajar como empleado para trabajar en emprendimientos independientes que aporten al país con empleos para gente joven y creativa. La colección de relojes de madera Castor reinventan las reglas de la moda. Inspirándose en el bosque nativo, aplicando diseños innovadores con un toque de elegancia.

Within a price range between $45 - 60$ USD our product is offering quality & innovative design. Quality & Innovation & design don't need to be expensive. In a market dominated by luxury, there's a space for design watches at affordable prices. That's why these wooden watches, besides the material innovation, can have commercial success. Our watches are made with Miyota Japan Movement and all includes natural leather strap and bamboo materials. Dual Bamboo case is stainless steel.

Con un rango de precio entre $45 - $60 USD, nuestro producto ofrece calidad y diseño innovador. Calidad + Innovación + Diseño no tienen por qué ser sinónimo de caro. En un mercado dominado por el lujo, hay espacio para relojes con diseño a precios accesibles. Es por esto que estos relojes de madera, aparte de la innovación en el uso de materiales, pueden tener éxito comercial. Nuestros relojes están fabricados con motor Miyota de Japón. Todos incluyen correas de cuero natural y materiales de madera de bamboo. La carcaza del Dual Bamboo es de acero inoxidable.
The combination of natural materials with minimal markings on the watch, these designs make fusion something truly one of a kind.
We started this adventure by launching three models: DUAL bamboo and aluminum, ORIGIN and TOTEM.
La combinación de materiales de la naturaleza con marcas mínimas en el reloj, hacen estos diseños fusión algo verdaderamente único en su clase.
Comenzamos esta aventura lanzando tres modelos: DUAL bamboo y aluminio, ORIGEN y TÓTEM.
We need financial resources to produce the watches and the marketing campaign to get more attention from public.

column2: >WE KNOW how hard it can be to keep the

column1: passion alive when you can't see your man as much as you'd like. Many
people believe that long distance relationships are never going to work
out. Your family may discourage it, and some of your best friends may
advise you not to take it too seriously, in case you get your heart
broken. With an unprecedented number of dual-career couples in the
modern world, being near the one you love is no longer always a
guarantee. Long-distance relationships (LDR) are proliferating, with an
estimated 14 million couples defining their relationships as such and a
staggering 75 percent of engaged couples reporting having been in a
long distance relationship at some point.
They are hard … really hard. Living every day without the person you
love most is like living on one meal a day instead of three. Nobody
says it is going to be easy — the extra distance makes many things
unachievable. Things could get complicated, and you could get sad and
lonely at times. Staying sexually satisfied in a monogamous
relationship presents unique challenges when the physical touch of your
lover is beyond your fingertips. And we are here to fix this
Youthful Smart Lover is an innovated beauty from our team, combines
functionality, versatility and sensational vibrations. Youthful Smart
Lover is all about smartness, and that’s what it aims
Youthful Smart Lover could be connected to cellphone via Bluetooth. Lots of funny functions are built in the APP, which allows you control the vibrator on your cellphone.

Featuring 14 different vibration modes for greater variety and pleasure options. The variable interface dial allows for control of the 14 pre-programmed pleasure modes that direct the virtually silent vibrator engine to deliver deep and vibrant sensations with spot-on precision.
What’s more, we profoundly integrated a camera onto the vibrator, allowing you to share the passionate moments in real time! It's a new way to explore your body with your partner.
Youthful Smart Lover allows your partner make a remotely controlling from anywhere in the world. It doesn’t matter if your partner
is in the office or in another country, you can still have your
""Shake-Shake"" function gives you and you intimate a different funny experience. Don't wait to try it.
Follows the beats of the videos and audios you like. Fully release your hands and passion.
Youthful Smart Lover equipped with two motors (up to 15000 rpm),
which will ultimately provide you with an exceptionally intense

Q: How do I pay for shipping?

column1: Shipping is free within US. However, if you live outside the United States, you will need to add extra shipping costs. If you still have a question about international shipping, please feel free to send us a message and we will help you figure it out.
Q: Will Youthful Smart Lover be shipped discreetly?

Sure! The packaging will be completely discreet for this product. 

","WE KNOW how hard it can be to keep the
passion alive when you can't see your man as much as you'd like. Many
people believe that long distance relationships are never going to work
out. Your family may discourage it, and some of your best friends may
advise you not to take it too seriously, in case you get your heart
broken. With an unprecedented number of dual-career couples in the
modern world, being near the one you love is no longer always a
guarantee. Long-distance relationships (LDR) are proliferating, with an
estimated 14 million couples defining their relationships as such and a
staggering 75 percent of engaged couples reporting having been in a
long distance relationship at some point.
They are hard … really hard. Living every day without the person you
love most is like living on one meal a day instead of three. Nobody
says it is going to be easy — the extra distance makes many things
unachievable. Things could get complicated, and you could get sad and
lonely at times. Staying sexually satisfied in a monogamous
relationship presents unique challenges when the physical touch of your
lover is beyond your fingertips. And we are here to fix this

Your safety is important. Putting our Identify Sensors inside of smartphones will allow people to detect various everyday threats like drugs in a drink. Help fund our indieGoGo so that we can develop more powerful sensors and license our technology to smartphone manufacturers. 


Pledge $350 to receive the first generation Identify Smartphone. You will be able to detect...

column1: We are currently working with manufacturers and plan to make our technology available on both the Apple and Android platforms. At the time of release, our contributors will receive this technology on the most current premium smartphone.
In addition to the Smartphone App, Identify can help strengthen national security. Watch our Channel 3 WKYC news story with the Port Authority:

column3: >CONGRESS PASSED A LAW FOR 100% INSPECTION OF ALL SHIPPING CONTAINERS ENTERING THE U.S.
>20 MILLION CONTAINERS GO UNINSPECTED EACH YEAR!
column7: >e want to ensure that dangerous material such as explosives, chemicals and other weapons never reach our shores

column3: > NEW TECHNOLOGY CAN SOLVE THE PROBLEM.
column4: > Identify sensors can detect the presence of explosives and other serious chemical threats. Together, we can help our government put a sensor inside of every shipping container (both air and sea) entering the U.S., accomplishing their goal of 100% inspection. Every container will be linked with a GPS tracking system to inform airlines, Coast Guard and other National Security personnel before a potentially dangerous container ever reaches our shores. The sensors were created at the Electronics Design Center at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, OH.
>We have been in contact with the DHS (Department of Homeland Security) and they are aware of our intentions.

OUR NEW TECHNOLOGY CAN SOLVE THE PROBLEM. Identify sensors can detect the presence of explosives and other serious chemical threats. Together, we can help our government put a sensor inside of every shipping container (both air and sea) entering the U.S., accomplishing their goal of 100% inspection. Every container will be linked with a GPS tracking system to inform airlines, Coast Guard and other National Security personnel before a potentially dangerous container ever reaches our shores. The sensors were created at the Electronics Design Center at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, OH.
We have been in contact with the DHS (Department of Homeland Security) and they are aware of our intentions.",9.0,1,"1 Campaign

And a very special thank you to our family and friends who have supported us throughout our journey.

Hebe Rose New York is poised for success, and with the support of our backers we will move forward to production with our manufacturers. We have already produced samples of each style and tested all features and fabrics. In regards to delivery time, in manufacturing, there's always a risk that suppliers do not fulfill on time. We've added a bit of a cushion into our lead time to account for this possibility. No matter what, Barbara, April and our team, will be working along side with our suppliers to ensure that everything does move forward in a smooth matter.

Please note that with Duty/VAT charges, if you live outside of the US, Singapore, Hong Kong and Australia, you will be responsible for any applicable duty/VAT charges. Also, customs is another topic to bring up. As you may know, some countries are known for being slow with customs, so please be patient with those packages, as there is nothing that we can do to help speed it along.
We'll update you frequently about our progress, and if there are any unforeseen issues along the way, we'll let you know and offer a contingency plan.

Hello, I am Larissa and I'm the owner, and creator at Rowan Bay, as well as an ecologist and wildlife gardener, and a mother to two. Rowan Bay was a natural fusion of all my passions and hobbies - combining my creative interests with my love of nature whilst sharing something which enabled a closer bond with both my children. 

I have set up Rowan Bay alongside my day job as an ecologist, creating all the designs myself and working closely with a British textile mill to have the first batch of tester wraps woven. These are currently carrying babies, toddlers and even bigger kids around the UK and Europe. 

The first creation which is currently being tested is a 350gsm double-weave Egyptian combed cotton wrap. With a high gsm it is relatively thick, yet  the combed cotton means it is soft to touch, even straight off the loom, and will only get softer - think marshmallows and fluffy pillows. This double-weave blend is a good all rounder wrap, which has proven it's strength and has cush for days. Whilst perhaps not the ideal wrap for a newborn, if your child is a larger baby to a pre-schooler, this blend is for you. This blend has been woven in two tester designs
column2: Chrysler, a geometric pattern of chevrons, and Sorbus
column3:
a more natural design comprising of a repeated pattern of three rowan leaves. This blend is being woven in the Chrysler pattern as we speak, and there are exciting things happening for the Sorbus design.


Acknowledgements  
I would like to say thank you to the following people who have helped me get this far (in no particular order)
column5: Dad, Maureen, Kate and Dave, Nicola, Natalie, Rachel, Katy, Ellie, Jill, Jo, Nikki, Caroline, Rosanna and of course, Fox &amp

ZIB Chamois panties are professionally designed women’s underwear for cycling.
These panties will make your bike rides
more comfortable whether those are short distances in the city, long
rides in country side or body bike classes at the gym. Designed to be worn under your everyday clothes - skirts, jeans and
Cycling panties are made from lightweight DRY-CLIM polyester fabric
with custom ZIB print and Italian chamois. The small form factor and
the slim profile make this chamois well suited for cycling underwear and

perfect to wear underneath normal clothes without feeling too bulky.

TECHNICAL FEATURES:
• Italian chamois – Perfect for short distance. Perineal area designed to support female anatomy.
• Moisture wicking, strechy, durable and lightweight DRY-CLIM fabric.
• ZIB print – Custom made on every cut and sewn piece.
COMPOSITION 84% Polyester, 16% Elastane and Italian Microfiber Chamois
The panties are made for many different cycling activities, for all four

seasons all around the world. They are made for your comfort.

We have spent the last summer searching for the best fabric and the most
suitable chamois testing it in many environments. We have
tried it out on daily commuting, leisure rides, sports activities and
even horse rides. All these active and joyful women were our advisers.
Every feedback helped to develop this product further and reach our goal
to create comfy and light panties.
We took our research even further and cooperated with professional
athletes. We got the best evaluation from a professional cyclist who
took our panties for a test in MTB race. Therefore we are confident of
the result and we believe you will appreciate the ZIB chamois panties!
We have created special design artwork for the panties. ZIB bright
prints shines in a joyful and colorful energy. Because it's all about
mood and smile are the extra value that comes with these
There is a special spirit in ""Fire fox” and ""Canny bunny” panties.
Original ZIB designed fox print will help to boost your speed, but bunny
print will help you stay nimble!
ZIB features the work of young and talented Latvian textile artists who
put a little art into everyday clothing. ZIB means “to flash” in
Latvian, and that describes us quite well. We are expressive, impulsive
and unpredictable. All our prints are based on our drawings and
paintings. ZIB offers comfortable, original jersey clothing and bright
accessories. ZIB designer team do their creative work in the
heart of Riga, capital city of Latvia.

We have 3 years experience in creating casual women's clothes - we know all the production process precisely starting from sketches on the paper until the finished product. We have used all our knowledge and experience while working on this project.

It
took us several month of research and preparing to create these super
panties. As a part of the research we visited all the biggest European
fabric and sports expos. Such as <span>ISPO,
Eurobike, Fabric Start and Performance Days. By contracting Northern
Europe’s top notch lingerie sewing facility we feel very confident about
launch worldwide top quality product that blends the latest technology
of the professional cycling and fashion. We believe that practical can
also be beautiful, feminine and modern. Our mission is to promote active
lifestyle among active women and encourage to move and care about your

health while doing what you love.

Your support will take us through trial production and into mass production on schedule. We have went further than other project's campaigns and we
already have ready-to-ship ZIB Panties for Christmas special
packs. We expect  all of orders to be shipped in first two months of the year 2016.
ZIB Chamois Panties comes in two designs - ""Fire fox” and  ""Canny bunny” and sizes from XS to XL.

column5:
/>

We have created a matching ZIB SPORT oversized workout top.  Its made from soft touch, fast drying

column1: fabric. Due to its high breath-ability, skin-friendly qualities and
flexibility, it ensures freedom of movement and outstanding comfort for
After the campaign closes we'll contact you to collect your size preferences and shipping address.

Questions, inquiries and media
Please contact us directly via cycling@zib.lv

The 'Constantine' is the first collection of timepieces from Vorque Watches.
column2:
>
The collection is also featured on the following sites: 

http://wornandwound.com/2015/12/02/vorque-constantine-review/
column5: >http://wristreview.com/?p=19189
column13:
>


""When it comes to to automatic movements, usually, microbrands prefer Japanese movements — Miyota or Seiko. For the Constantine, Vorque preferred to go with a Swiss ETA 2824-2, which I find surprising considering the pre-order price of the watch."" - Watchpaper
""To sum it all up, the Constantine is a handsome watch and a value for money that is more than capable of exceeding your expectations when it comes to design and build quality."" - WristReview
""This vintage styled dial is simple, elegant and features a gorgeous texture that covers it entirely. Coming out of the slightly pearlescent surface are tiny pyramids, each catching the light, and casting little shadows (it’s called Clous de Paris). The result is nothing short of beautiful. It brings to mind waffles dials of watches from the 50’s, ..."" - Worn&

column1: At Vorque, we believe in functionality, quality and value in our watches and that everyone should own a living, beating timepiece that is both beautiful and dependable. All our movements are sourced directly from Switzerland and
encased in modern day designs that blends a little bit of tradition. The subtle
modifications ensures that our watches evolves while preserving an old,
We believe that a watch is never
just a timekeeper, but also a companion steeped in beautiful memories as it accompanies
design stage, Vorque made the choice of using the Swiss-Made ETA 2824-2  instead of the Japanese-Made Miyota 9015 as it is a quality proven workhorse
for decades. We want our backers to receive a watch that is durable and works
reliably as we believe that a timepiece is like a long lasting companion.  Vorque Watches would be available at a very
competitive value for it’s specs ( – one of the brand’s vision ) when compared
to other micro brands as well as similar ETA 2824 powered watches.
column3:
/>

Over the past one year, we’ve been working on

column1: the design and prototyping of our first watch, the Constantine. But we’ve reached
a stage that we cannot continue our journey without your backings: mass
production. The production minimum order quantity of 300 watches resulted to a

The campaign would run from November 28th till December 18th. You can have the opportunity to own the Constantine for the value of $429 to $479. There would not be stretch goals as we believe that our backers should receive the best possible version of the Constantine irregardless of the amount funded.
your backing for a final push towards production for the Constantine and plans are also in place for our 2<sup>nd</sup> collection but it would not be possible without your backing.  We are
in for the long run and would with no doubt come back with another exciting
watch. but first, we would need your full support for our first model.
Swiss Made ETA 2824-2 automatic movement housed in a 40mm case along with a beautiful guilloche dial and it is designed with the idea for the watch to look both elegant and well proportioned.
is a very classic and practical design and it expresses itself subtlely and

offer different shades when positioned at different angles. It gives the watch a  mid century vibe and very much like the classic dress watches from the 50s.   The details of the dial grows on you over time and you would slowly appreciate it. Along with the applied hour indices, it creates depth when you look at the watch in different lighting conditions.

column4: >A 2 mm thick sapphire crystal with underside AR (Anti-Reflective) coating protects the Constantine's dial. Sapphire is the obvious choice for the watch crystal instead of Mineral as it offers superior scratch resistance and clarity. The sapphire crystal reduces optical distortion and maintains legibility even at extreme angles. The AR coating enhances the Constantine's legibility in intense lighting environments that might produce reflections.

column1: A quality automatic watch can work for decades
with regular servicing and unlike quartz movements, it does not need any
battery change.  All it requires is a good wind and it is set to go. That

is why our movement of choice would be the highly revered ETA 2824-2. The no nonsense movement is known for its reliability and consistency have been used by many major Swiss watch houses such as Omega, IWC and Brietling. With regular servicing, it should last a lifetime due to its robust construction and manufacturing quality.
<div>Many Microbrand watches uses Miyotas and Seiko movements. They are pretty solid movements in their own right but the 2824-2 is a proven
workhorse since its first variant was introduced in the sixties. We want ensured quality for our timepieces and for them last for a long to come without any major problems. The
2824-2 is also more easily serviced as most watch technicians are familiar with

the movement itself and parts are more readily available as well. With that in mind, the pricing of our watches are not much higher than those with Miyotas and are also considerably lower than most 2824-2 powered watches because we strive to provide solid and yet at the same time, affordable watches.
with 38 hours of power reserve, hacking feature, 4 Hz operating
frequency, 25 Jewels and ETACHRON regulator system.

column3: >The elegant butterfly clasp allows the watch to be worn on more conveniently
column4: > and also ensures that it fits seamlessly and comfortably on

column1: a beautiful story that shows how the same watch bonds father and son.
son reminiscing the journey that he went through together with the watch that
was given by his father. The watch has always been there with him throughout
and when he achieved what he had set out for, he went back to where it all
started.  What this shows is that the father
would always be a constant part of the watch that the son would always have

column4: >- Diameter of Watch Case: 40mm (excluding crown)
column10: >- Lug to Lug: 48mm

column4: >- Guilloche Patterned Dial with Applied Indices
column10: >- 30M Water Resistance (Splash Resistant)
column13: >- Flat Exhibition Caseback with Mineral Crystal
column16: >- 2.0mm thick Sapphire Crystal with Anti-Reflective Coating on the underside
column19: >- 316L Stainless Steel Fully Polished Case excluding brushed region on the side of the case

column6: >Modified Swiss-Made ETA 2824-2

column5: >- Design: Singapore, Hong Kong
column9: >- Manufacturing: Hong Kong, China
column13: >- Movement: Switzerland
column17: >- Watch Assembly: Hong Kong

column1: From the time we place a production order in December, the movement would arrive roughly in 90 days. All the production of the other parts will be completed during that interval. Then, after movements arrive, they will be customised and assembled.

All the funds raised from Indiegogo will be used to pay for full production of the watch and should we exceed our funding goal, all the excess funds would be for the planning and production of our 2nd collection. We hope that with a successful campaign, we can establish ourselves and unlock the potential value for the Constantine that you would receive.
Production would begin as soon as our funding goal is reached and hopefully it would be sooner than the project deadline. This would shave off some time from the estimated production schedule.

Contact Us

For any enquiries, you can c
column4: >ontact us at
column10:
>Follow us on Instagram @Vorquewatches for more photos of the Constantine
http://vorquewatches.weebly.com/

column4: >One huge problem for new products are quality issues but after successfully building three fully functional and quality prototypes, Vorque is very confident in our partners to deliver products that are up to our standards.  No product is 100% defect free but we would minimise whatever defects we have before making the final delivery. If there are any defects, we would not hesitate to rectify it in the shortest possible time within our capabilities.

column1: As for the movements, our partners have assured us that they will secure the movements within 90 days upon order. There might be unexpected issues which could cause delays and we absolutely have no control over it but the chances of that happening is very slim.
*What if we do not meet our funding goal*

We went for a flexible funding model as as we would like to have credit card payment as an option. With that in mind, if we don't meet our funding goal, it depends on the amount raised. If it is nearing our goal, we would push on and go for another round of fund raising. But if it is too much of a difference between the amount raised and our goal, we would guarantee full refund to every backer. We believe that a brand is built on trust and we would stand by our values and do what we promised.

The 'Constantine' is the first collection of timepieces from Vorque Watches. The collection is also featured on the following sites: http://wornandwound.com/2015/12/02/vorque-constantine-review/http://wristreview.com/?p=19189http://www.watchpaper.com/2015/11/07/vorque-constantine-hands-on-preview/""When it comes to to automatic movements, usually, microbrands prefer Japanese movements — Miyota or Seiko. For the Constantine, Vorque preferred to go with a Swiss ETA 2824-2, which I find surprising considering the pre-order price of the watch."" - Watchpaper""To sum it all up, the Constantine is a handsome watch and a value for money that is more than capable of exceeding your expectations when it comes to design and build quality."" - WristReview""This vintage styled dial is simple, elegant and features a gorgeous texture that covers it entirely. Coming out of the slightly pearlescent surface are tiny pyramids, each catching the light, and casting little shadows (it’s called Clous de Paris). The result is nothing short of beautiful. It brings to mind waffles dials of watches from the 50’s, ..."" - Worn&WoundPart 1 – About Us

At Vorque, we believe in functionality, quality and value in our watches and that everyone should own a living, beating timepiece that is both beautiful and dependable. All our movements are sourced directly from Switzerland and
encased in modern day designs that blends a little bit of tradition. The subtle
modifications ensures that our watches evolves while preserving an old,
We believe that a watch is never
just a timekeeper, but also a companion steeped in beautiful memories as it accompanies
design stage, Vorque made the choice of using the Swiss-Made ETA 2824-2  instead of the Japanese-Made Miyota 9015 as it is a quality proven workhorse
for decades. We want our backers to receive a watch that is durable and works
reliably as we believe that a timepiece is like a long lasting companion.  Vorque Watches would be available at a very
competitive value for it’s specs ( – one of the brand’s vision ) when compared
to other micro brands as well as similar ETA 2824 powered watches. Over the past one year, we’ve been working on
the design and prototyping of our first watch, the Constantine. But we’ve reached
a stage that we cannot continue our journey without your backings: mass
production. The production minimum order quantity of 300 watches resulted to a

The campaign would run from November 28th till December 18th. You can have the opportunity to own the Constantine for the value of $429 to $479. There would not be stretch goals as we believe that our backers should receive the best possible version of the Constantine irregardless of the amount funded.
Lastly, we do hope to receive
your backing for a final push towards production for the Constantine and plans are also in place for our 2nd collection but it would not be possible without your backing.  We are
in for the long run and would with no doubt come back with another exciting
watch. but first, we would need your full support for our first model.
The Constantine features a a robust
Swiss Made ETA 2824-2 automatic movement housed in a 40mm case along with a beautiful guilloche dial and it is designed with the idea for the watch to look both elegant and well proportioned.
is a very classic and practical design and it expresses itself subtlely and

offer different shades when positioned at different angles. It gives the watch a  mid century vibe and very much like the classic dress watches from the 50s.   The details of the dial grows on you over time and you would slowly appreciate it. Along with the applied hour indices, it creates depth when you look at the watch in different lighting conditions.

A 2 mm thick sapphire crystal with underside AR (Anti-Reflective) coating protects the Constantine's dial. Sapphire is the obvious choice for the watch crystal instead of Mineral as it offers superior scratch resistance and clarity. The sapphire crystal reduces optical distortion and maintains legibility even at extreme angles. The AR coating enhances the Constantine's legibility in intense lighting environments that might produce reflections.
A quality automatic watch can work for decades
with regular servicing and unlike quartz movements, it does not need any
battery change.  All it requires is a good wind and it is set to go. That

is why our movement of choice would be the highly revered ETA 2824-2. The no nonsense movement is known for its reliability and consistency have been used by many major Swiss watch houses such as Omega, IWC and Brietling. With regular servicing, it should last a lifetime due to its robust construction and manufacturing quality.
Many Microbrand watches uses Miyotas and Seiko movements. They are pretty solid movements in their own right but the 2824-2 is a proven
workhorse since its first variant was introduced in the sixties. We want ensured quality for our timepieces and for them last for a long to come without any major problems. The
2824-2 is also more easily serviced as most watch technicians are familiar with

the movement itself and parts are more readily available as well. With that in mind, the pricing of our watches are not much higher than those with Miyotas and are also considerably lower than most 2824-2 powered watches because we strive to provide solid and yet at the same time, affordable watches.
The 2824-2 is a self winding movement
with 38 hours of power reserve, hacking feature, 4 Hz operating
frequency, 25 Jewels and ETACHRON regulator system.
The elegant butterfly clasp allows the watch to be worn on more conveniently and also ensures that it fits seamlessly and comfortably on
The short film by Vorque depicts
a beautiful story that shows how the same watch bonds father and son.
The film starts off with the
son reminiscing the journey that he went through together with the watch that
was given by his father. The watch has always been there with him throughout
and when he achieved what he had set out for, he went back to where it all
started.  What this shows is that the father
would always be a constant part of the watch that the son would always have
CASE DIMENSIONS: - Diameter of Watch Case: 40mm (excluding crown)- Thickness: 10.5mm- Lug to Lug: 48mm- Crown: 7mm Diameter 3mm height

FEATURES:- Guilloche Patterned Dial with Applied Indices- 30M Water Resistance (Splash Resistant)- Flat Exhibition Caseback with Mineral Crystal- 2.0mm thick Sapphire Crystal with Anti-Reflective Coating on the underside- 316L Stainless Steel Fully Polished Case excluding brushed region on the side of the case- Butterfly Clasp with Vorque Logo
MOVEMENT SPECS:- Modified Swiss-Made ETA 2824-2- Custom Rotor
- Design: Singapore, Hong Kong - Manufacturing: Hong Kong, China- Movement: Switzerland- Watch Assembly: Hong Kong- Quality Inspection: Singapore, Hong Kong
Delivery would be scheduled in April 2016.

From the time we place a production order in December, the movement would arrive roughly in 90 days. All the production of the other parts will be completed during that interval. Then, after movements arrive, they will be customised and assembled.

All the funds raised from Indiegogo will be used to pay for full production of the watch and should we exceed our funding goal, all the excess funds would be for the planning and production of our 2nd collection. We hope that with a successful campaign, we can establish ourselves and unlock the potential value for the Constantine that you would receive.
Production would begin as soon as our funding goal is reached and hopefully it would be sooner than the project deadline. This would shave off some time from the estimated production schedule.
Contact UsFor any enquiries, you can contact us at Vorquewatches@gmail.comFollow us on Instagram @Vorquewatches for more photos of the Constantinehttp://vorquewatches.weebly.com/

One huge problem for new products are quality issues but after successfully building three fully functional and quality prototypes, Vorque is very confident in our partners to deliver products that are up to our standards.  No product is 100% defect free but we would minimise whatever defects we have before making the final delivery. If there are any defects, we would not hesitate to rectify it in the shortest possible time within our capabilities.

As for the movements, our partners have assured us that they will secure the movements within 90 days upon order. There might be unexpected issues which could cause delays and we absolutely have no control over it but the chances of that happening is very slim.
*What if we do not meet our funding goal*

We went for a flexible funding model as as we would like to have credit card payment as an option. With that in mind, if we don't meet our funding goal, it depends on the amount raised. If it is nearing our goal, we would push on and go for another round of fund raising. But if it is too much of a difference between the amount raised and our goal, we would guarantee full refund to every backer. We believe that a brand is built on trust and we would stand by our values and do what we promised.",13.0,0,"1 Campaign

","We all love music and just like any other thing that we love,  we always want to have it around, no matter where we are. For this reason, we created Rhyme - an ultra-portable Bluetooth speaker with a unique style.    Rhyme features a premium design which is inspired by the Hip-Hop and sneaker cultures. Yes, Rhyme has music and style in its DNA!  Available in two colourways - Triple Black and Turtle Dove

column1: Big sound in a small package

We are not going to bother you with all the nerdy stuff. However, it will interest you to know that Rhyme features a full range neodymium driver.What this means is that it is capable of a rich bass response that similar speakers of its size are not capable of.

We have designed Rhyme to fit perfectly into your daily lifestyle. The compact size, long-lasting battery life and premium design makes it a great companion for media consumption while on the go.    Rhyme is water resistantEnjoying a beautiful sunny day at the beach?or relaxing around a swimming pool?Let Rhyme deliver your favourite tunes, it’s water resistant!    Rhyme stays fresh! As designer Jacqueline Nassy searched for the perfect clutch to wear out one night. It occurred to her that there wasn't a clutch on the market that fits just the necessities, so she decided to design her own.
Currently, the Perfect Clutch is available in two colors
column2: soft black leather and red-orange leather grain. The clutch is made from genuine leather and features a removable cross body chain strap. Inside, the wallet stores up to five cards, an elastic band secures a standard sized lipstick and the leather magnetic cell phone case makes answering calls on the go a breeze.

column1: We will take the chic design of The Perfect Clutch to the next level.
Our goal is to raise capital to:
• Manufacture The Perfect Clutch for a number of smart phones models on the market.
• Include an array of colors for our customers.

column2: from mix-and-match straps to monogram initials.
>Donate $250 or more towards our goal and be the first to own The Perfect Clutch in black, blood orange or blush!

column1: In the future we foresee items beyond The Perfect Clutch. As White Flag grows, we want to become a lifestyle brand that empowers. Slogan tees, baseball caps and journals are just a few items that we visualize.
Our accessories will be a reminder of what one can accomplish if you ""Surrender to your Passions"".
With your support we can continue the journey.

We currently have a magnetic cell phone case available for iPhone 6, iPhone 6S, Samsung Galaxy 6S and Samsung Galaxy 6S Edge. The mobile industry is producing new smart phone models at a rapid rate and they are introduced to the public at an unwavering speed.
The biggest challenge is keeping up with the changes. With your help, we will not only keep up but stay ahead.
If you can't contribute, please spread the word. Your enthusiasm has already helped so much! We appreciate you telling people how much you love The Perfect Clutch.

Founder and CEO | Pink Lotus Technologies, LLC

Maryann is an accomplished entrepreneur who owns several successful businesses. She has more than 20 years of business start-up and growth management experience, including restaurants, retail, consulting, franchising, contracts, inventions, project management, US Patents &

Dr. Shanbhag specializes in key areas of product and services that have produced billions of dollars in earnings for new product development, including the authoring of 13 patents. He also brings an extensive background in branding, cash flow management, technical operations, and prioritization with a multi-decade history of success.

Stacie Ruth joined the Pink Lotus Technologies team as a Strategic Advisor, bringing two decades of leadership experience in the health technology and telecommunications industries and as an industry pioneer in Health Wearables. She served as a Senior Executive in innovation, operational and commercial roles for Philips Healthcare.

Andres Goyanes is a senior-level marketing professional with two decades of experience developing marketing, advertising, branding, and public relations strategies for both industrial companies (B2B) and consumer (B2C) markets. His experience covers digital marketing, corporate communications, business development, and lead generation.

With years of experience in developing and designing advertising copy, report program statistics  and client revenue maximization, email marketing, social media websites, Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn to maintain database integrity, creating reports to analyze effectiveness and trends of marketing efforts,

Began his career at the U.S. Department of Justice expanding a 40- year career as an attorney/civil rights litigator, lobbyist, international business strategist, corporate legal and business advisor, mediator, international procurements, business transactions, law professor and public service volunteer.

Hello, My name is Maryann Kilgallon and I need YOUR help today. I have created & designed the POMM™ device after hearing the tragic story of a little boy who died in my town after being forgotten in a daycare van. After hearing the terrible details of his death, I became very upset and went to bed in tears. I was moved beyond upset and decided right their and then that I had to do something & take action to get involved to help stop this from continuing.

That very night I created the POMM™ device and the next day I started doing research and was stunned at the 600 thousand annual cases of child abuse & neglect by daycare centers & babysitters in the US alone. Also, the statistics are shocking that a child dies every 9 days from vehicle heatstroke death from being left in a vehicle. I have chosen to leave my current position in order to work full time on this life saving device and have joined a University business incubator program for mentorship, guidance and real world training to commercialize the POMM™ and make it a reality. We have an amazing talented team working very hard to bring the POMM™ device to market.

ANY DONATION AMOUNT IS ACCEPTED, I cannot do this alone and need the help of caring people who want to also make a difference. We have started the sourcing all the prototype components and have started on the mobile app. designs & layout. We need additional capital to complete the prototype & mobile  app. We have been accepted to exhibit at CES2019 in Eureka Park to launch POMM™ to the world and plan to secure strategic partnerships to take this device Global.

With your purchase or donation, you can be a part of something Big and know that you contributed to a great cause. There is no price tag on a precious life of  a child. Your gift is so very much appreciated and needed. Imagine having your name on our corporate headquarters where everyone can see the true backers who believed early on. Thank you for believing with us that 1 person can make a difference and we are united in the care of our future generation.

We realized early on that we were undertaking a big challenge in order to make the POMM™ small and comfortable for little wrist. It has been very challenging finding the best, available & smallest parts & sensors. Our engineers have sourced the world for the best technology components and we feel confidant that we are ready to finalize the POMM™ device for production.

If you cannot make a donation, we totally understand, but you could still be a HUGE contributor by talking about us to your co-workers, family and friends. Share us on your social media to help get the word out. find us on all social media as pommconnect
POMM™ is worn on a child's wrist or ankle depending on the age of the child
Bio-metric sensors send data to app on guardians mobile phone (up to 5 phones)
GPS tracks location at all times
* Requires a low cellular monthly subscription (to communicate wirelessly)
Sends out wellness checks & instant alerts for change in vitals

Hi I’m Elyse, and I’m starting my own clothing line called BLINK. Blink clothing has a streetwear style with a variety of long and short t-shirts, hoodies, and embroidered hats. You can check out the different clothing designs at, www.blinkstreetwear.com. As I start to get more funding for my business I want to feature more accessories in the Blink brand.

I started this business based off my passion for fashion. Check my twitter bio: “ain’t trashing cause fashion is my passion”.  Anyways… I thought starting my own clothing line would be a lot of fun. I love all things artistic. I paint, draw, do photography, videography and I have experience with graphic design. I’m always wanting to express my artistic ideas through new mediums and clothing would make for a fresh new start.

I’ve made several designs for Blink clothing but I need some help financially so I can successfully launch this business. This business is truly my passion and it would mean a lot to me if I could get a little help. Others who can’t contribute financially can help to support me by sharing word about Blink and sharing the link to my Indiegogo Campaign.

The name Blink was chosen for more than just being a cool name for a clothing line.
I wanted the name of this business to have deeper meaning. I wanted it to relate directly to my life which is synonymous with my faith. I am a Christian and the name Blink reminds me of how those I trust can drop me IN THE BLINK OF AN EYE. It also reminds me of how I can be restored by Jesus IN THE BLINK OF AN EYE. With Blink clothing you can relate the phrase, IN THE  BLINK OF AN EYE with anything you may feel (IN THE BLINK OF AN EYE… lost, found, forgotten, loved). This is why IN THE BLINK OF EYE is gonna be featured throughout different items of clothing in the collection.
I want to say thank you to all who choose to support me. I will definitely make this worthwhile.

PALA is an ethical sunglasses brand with a difference.  We’re on a mission to make a change. To be the most sustainable eyewear brand that you can get behind, by standing up for what’s important and putting people and the planet first.

We take a unique approach to fashion by creating a range of classic sunglasses that support life-changing vision projects in Africa. By giving back to these communities whilst developing eyewear that minimises environmental impact, we walk the talk of a sustainable fashion future. Our products are designed for those who acknowledge the need for a better future, appreciate the world we live in and embrace the adventure of exploring it. We are proud to be endorsed by platforms around the world:

Shockingly, 10% of the world’s population can’t access eye care and may never know a life without the disabling effects of poor vision. Providing spectacles enables a person to read, to write, to learn
column2:
to do something as basic as threading a needle. It creates opportunities for education, employment, and dignity. It’s an incredibly powerful tool in the fight against poverty, and it’s something we perhaps all take for granted.

This is why, for every pair of sunglasses sold, we give back to eye-care programmes. 

We’ve been working to help provide vision aid in low-income countries in Africa for nearly 3 years. Through the support of our grants, we have helped to establish a critical Vision Centre and dispensary in Zambia, have funded technical optical equipment, and supported a spread of outreach programmes - all sustainable, long term solutions that facilitate eye care, eye tests and the provision of prescription glasses.

Things don’t stop there. We also work alongside a Ghanaian-based NGO to support weaving communities in the Upper East region to make our recycled sunglasses cases. Woven using traditional methods utilising otherwise wasted plastic, we provide these communities with a trade and an income to help empower themselves.

But we want to do more. And that’s where you come in.

We intend to raise $40,000 to help fund two major moves that progress our journey towards a sustainable fashion future. This goal amount will be split across the following:

Furthering Sustainable Design: Bio &
column3:
Recycled Acetate Sunglasses

Securing our target amount will ensure we can design, develop and release three new sunglasses styles made from more sustainable materials from 2020 - we’re talking modern designs in biodegradable and recycled acetate.

Why is this important? We want to protect our planet, and to do this we need to make our designs and the materials we use to make them as sustainable as possible. At the moment, most of our sunglasses are made from acetate, which is the material found in the majority of high-end frames, known for its great finish and wide choice of colours. Whilst acetate is an organic compound predominantly formed from cotton fibres, it does contain plasticisers that are ultimately harmful for the earth when they biodegrade.

The good news is that bio-acetate is an option - this is where the plasticisers are left out, meaning the entire material is biodegradable. It's not yet in mainstream usage but companies such as ours are pushing suppliers for more choice so we can make the change. The more choice the suppliers offer, the more chance we have to provide you with sunglasses in colours that you’ll love.

We will also be looking to create more styles in recycled acetate, a material made from offcuts from the manufacturing process of other acetate frames, melted back into sheets and used again. By using these more sustainable alternatives, we want to decrease our environmental impact, whilst still creating classic styles you’ll reach for every season.

Restoring Vision: Ethiopia Outreach Project

We want this Indiegogo campaign to have a social impact to match our big ambitions. So, we’re getting involved in an equally big way by funding a  brand new outreach project in Ethiopia through our partnership with charity Vision Aid Overseas.

This incredible charity will send six expert opticians from the UK to centres in Butajira and Batu to work alongside local NGO Grarbet Tehadiso Mahber to strengthen our impact. During this two week programme, they will provide critical eye care training and work with as many patients as possible to help improve their sight. They’ll be looking to

column1: • Assist with optometry services at the vision centres in Butajira and Batu, and conduct outreach visits.
• Provide support and training to optical workshop staff.
• Work with the Low Vision Unit manager to understand low vision in the area, make recommendations and plan how the unit could be more effective.

This trip is vitally important to the people of Butajira, Batu and the surrounding areas. These ‘top dog’ opticians intend to perform as many as 1,000 eye tests during this two week programme, making a significant impact on the region’s eye health - so as you can tell, your support of this campaign goes way beyond a pair of sunglasses.

By contributing to our campaign, you will make a significant difference
column2:
enabling us to grow our range of sustainable sunglasses and, crucially, help impact the lives of a significant number of people through the eye care project this campaign will facilitate in Ethiopia.

The donation amount for our perks range from $5 to $2500 - so there’s something for everyone and every budget. Our campaign uses the flexible funding option and therefore ALL perk purchases will be fulfilled. We’re offering limited edition cases, one of a kind sunglasses and our personal favourite - any pair of sunglasses from our collection with your name or initials embossed on the side of the frame.

If you're backing one of the perks where you need to choose a pair of PALAs, you can view all our sunglasses via these downloadable PDF brochures:

For the EARLY BIRD Personalised PALAs perk or the Personalised PALAs perk:

 https://palaeyewear.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/Personalised-PALAs-Perk-PDF.pd

For the 2 x PALA Sunglasses perk:

https://palaeyewear.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/Pick-2-x-PALA-Sunglasses-Perk-PDF.pdf

For the 3 x PALA Sunglasses perk: 

https://palaeyewear.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/Pick-3-x-PALA-Sunglasses-Perk-PDF.pdf

And don’t worry if you feel you can’t donate at the moment - you can still help support our mission by sharing our campaign and our story with your friends via social media. The easiest way to do this is by using Indiegogo’s easy social sharing tools, which are tucked underneath the funding tracker at the top of our campaign page.

We’re in our third year of trading, so we’re pretty familiar with our product and our market. During our time running PALA, we’ve ironed out design, production and shipping issues. We’ve dealt with growing pains, made healthy mistakes and, in turn, have experienced the valuable learning curve of running an independent brand. We’ve got this!

And if we don’t reach the goal? Well, the good news is that you will still get your perk as this project uses the ‘flexible funding’ model. At the end of the campaign, we will announce where the funds we’ve raised funds are going, but rest easy we will be working hard to hit our target!

And that's it! We couldn't be prouder to share why we do what we do with you all. If you made it this far, thanks for taking the time to visit our page. We couldn't do it without you.

","PALA is an ethical sunglasses brand with a difference.  We’re on a mission to make a change. To be the most sustainable eyewear brand that you can get behind, by standing up for what’s important and putting people and the planet first.We take a unique approach to fashion by creating a range of classic sunglasses that support life-changing vision projects in Africa. By giving back to these communities whilst developing eyewear that minimises environmental impact, we walk the talk of a sustainable fashion future. Our products are designed for those who acknowledge the need for a better future, appreciate the world we live in and embrace the adventure of exploring it. We are proud to be endorsed by platforms around the world:Shockingly, 10% of the world’s population can’t access eye care and may never know a life without the disabling effects of poor vision. Providing spectacles enables a person to read, to write, to learn
column3: to do something as basic as threading a needle. It creates opportunities for education, employment, and dignity. It’s an incredibly powerful tool in the fight against poverty, and it’s something we perhaps all take for granted.This is why, for every pair of sunglasses sold, we give back to eye-care programmes. We’ve been working to help provide vision aid in low-income countries in Africa for nearly 3 years. Through the support of our grants, we have helped to establish a critical Vision Centre and dispensary in Zambia, have funded technical optical equipment, and supported a spread of outreach programmes - all sustainable, long term solutions that facilitate eye care, eye tests and the provision of prescription glasses.Things don’t stop there. We also work alongside a Ghanaian-based NGO to support weaving communities in the Upper East region to make our recycled sunglasses cases. Woven using traditional methods utilising otherwise wasted plastic, we provide these communities with a trade and an income to help empower themselves.But we want to do more. And that’s where you come in.We intend to raise $40,000 to help fund two major moves that progress our journey towards a sustainable fashion future. This goal amount will be split across the following:Furthering Sustainable Design: Bio & Recycled Acetate SunglassesSecuring our target amount will ensure we can design, develop and release three new sunglasses styles made from more sustainable materials from 2020 - we’re talking modern designs in biodegradable and recycled acetate.Why is this important? It's not yet in mainstream usage but companies such as ours are pushing suppliers for more choice so we can make the change. The more choice the suppliers offer, the more chance we have to provide you with sunglasses in colours that you’ll love.We will also be looking to create more styles in recycled acetate, a material made from offcuts from the manufacturing process of other acetate frames, melted back into sheets and used again. By using these more sustainable alternatives, we want to decrease our environmental impact, whilst still creating classic styles you’ll reach for every season.Restoring Vision: Ethiopia Outreach Project We want this Indiegogo campaign to have a social impact to match our big ambitions. column1:
0,"


          Hello! It's Vu Nguyen,  I was born and raised in Vietnam, then my family moved to the U.S. when I was 18.  I know my parents had given up their good business back in our home country to come here
column2:
they have believed that the U.S. would give me and my sibling a better education.  They always support us with any career paths that we choose for our futures.   However, they never expected me to pick fashion design.  

           Back in Washington, couple years ago, when I was in high school, I attended in my school Talent Show, where people can show their potentials in singing, dancing, standing up comedy, etc I decided to make a paper fashion show (at that moment, I have no idea about sewing, draping or pattern making at all.  I fold, glued and taped poster paper together to create 6 dresses), my model strutted down the stage in cheering of the audiences.  I ended up wining first place in that show as one of the biggest shocking surprise in my life.  The next morning, when I woke up, I told myself, why not fashion.

Paper dresses for KR talent show 2011

Paper dresses for KR talent show 2011

           I always feel very alive whenever I design my garments on paper and turn them into real three dimensional works because I know I put my heart, my passion in every stroke of paint or every single stitch.  My parents once never believe that I could make it to NYC.  I have showed them what I am capable of, and I can show them more when I get out to the real world.  I would like to make parents proud, to make all of you, who have been supporting me during my education proud of whom I will become.  I rarely asking for help since I always try to manage everything by myself,  this would be the first and last time I need such a big assist from all of you.  I would like to build the best portfolio that I have ever put together in my entire life, to show the world of fashion what I can do and to find a good career to help my family.  I promise that your helps will only serve my education purpose.

With the deepest gratitude,

Vu Nguyen

column1: We Are Indigo's New Kingdom but more importantly, we are you.

column2: worldwide get exposure while do what they love.

column1: the money that we raise from selling *INK* is to help the artist's get the exposure and make a living.
While using the rest of the money made to build self sustaining green houses,schools, jobs and health facility all around the world and more. We are a Clothing line/Non-Profit.
The saying ""starving artist"" is a phase we are putting a end to, with your help.
Through out history, we have seen artist go unnoticed or not given the full credit due.
You have all met an artist or one yourself that is struggling to follow their dreams, even with an degree.
Just like you, we have always wanted to find a way to help, make a difference in the world.

<div>Then one day, while looking at my mothers paintings, it hit me. I will not only help my mother make her dream become reality, but I will help everyone do the same. I will make this happen with this a revolutionary clothing line, a Movement where we are all helping do this together. Everyone
I thought, why haven't anyone done this before or why not? But I decided to use my entire savings to start this Movement to help everyone, just like you.
Now only a short month later, We have helped artist around the world from many places in the U.S to England, Australia with many more to come.
Now we have expanded our goal/dream on what we aim to achieve with your help.
""One person can change the world, but everyone should try too ""JFK.
You can help us see this become reality.

I'm sure like everyone you are pressed for time, or want more of it, right? Who doesn't? I can't remember the last person to say ""I wish I had less time or have done less in my life"" while on their deathbed. So will this be one of the things/times you look back on regretting not being evolved in? or are you going to be creating history!

Seeing your artwork, your creations, being the messages we share with our clothing. Instead of being a 'walking billboard', we can inspire those in the community with art and creations from the community. By being apart of this movement, you are not only gaining a sense of unity locally, but also globally. This movement is really something bigger than ourselves, this is the beginning of the Golden Age, connecting the Global creations to share with our universal family, that is what we all want anyways. Together, we are helping the ones we love and our future, for us and our kids, and their kids to come.

Now you are able to make a passive income from anywhere in the world. You are continuing or starting to follow your dreams, while helping someone else do theirs. You now have extra money for bills, living a more free lifestyle the way you want it. Knowing that you have helped make a difference in the world, you feel better about who you are. You are in an interactive global group that shows support help raise fundraisers and other charities for other world changing ideas.

With all of the progress we have done together, we cam now start creating hospitals, large self sustaining green houses, schools, jobs, housing and other resources for countries and places that need it. While helping one person, it helps everyone. We are in this together. You and anyone can do anything you put your mind to, never let someone tell you different. With this movement, people just like you will be able to find support, funding/work opportunity, internship and a way to help make a difference in our world.

At last, our end goal is to help make a fair wage for every countries with a a fair trade. There are many under paid factory workers not making what they should be. We want to fund for schools,scholarships, programs, mentorship, healthcare, factories, renewable energy, innovative technology that will help change the world. Overall being able to help everyone, find the good in the bad and make it great. While we are investing in our present and future generation is how we will truly make a impact on our lives and planet. This a movement that everyone is involved with to help the global community. Because under the oceans and sea we are still ""Pangaea"" very much connected.. We believe it's not what you have but what you do with what you have. This is more than a revolutionary brand, this a movement but lastly this is you. Indigo's New Kingdom, made by everyone for everyone!

• When I offer my first months sales I want to also use some of the funding to give out promotion codes to those that help and others through newsletter. I want to also get people active with my business by being able to offer ideas themselves for designs.
Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make.

column1: • I would link up with other business veterans for ideas, or read about how other got past their hardships. Also i I like to plan for more than a couple of option for everything that could happen.

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • I understand times are rough, Which is another reason why I am doing this dream of mine. Even if you can't donate or buy mechandise from me now, let people know about me and tell people who are creative and like to create as well. Let help others together.
  • Don't forget there are many tools that Indiegogo provide as well.

Helping artist everywhere, locally & worldwide get exposure while do what they love.
the money that we raise from selling *INK* is to help the artist's get the exposure and make a living.
While using the rest of the money made to build self sustaining green houses,schools, jobs and health facility all around the world and more. We are a Clothing line/Non-Profit.
The saying ""starving artist"" is a phase we are putting a end to, with your help.

You have all met an artist or one yourself that is struggling to follow their dreams, even with an degree.

Connecting the Dots...

Combining my almost 40 years of experience in Cartooning, Website Design, Product &
column3: Gift Design, even my work as a Travel Writer all come into play (See what I just did there?) in a fun &amp
column4:
unique line of handmade souvenirs!
The system I have devised allows the creation of CUSTOM SOUVENIRS FOR ANY CITY IN THE COUNTRY!
Visit the interactive project homepage here: www.funnypaperz.com/inacan.htm

column1:
Unlike many other creative projects seeking crowd-funding, I AM NOT seeking money to create a product.
It is already done!
The prototypes are done!
Now the website is done!
Can I get a ""YEE-HAW""?
Sweet. Now can I get your support?

I am seeking $999 allowing me to go into immediate production beginning with Prescott, AZ: www.inacan.org/prescott.html  and then following up with all the other cities across the Southwest listed on the website: www.inacan.org

• Those funds will cover the initial minimum orders required for:
    - fiber canisters
    - lids/end caps
    - labels
    - shipping containers.

• This effort is designed to be a viable cottage industry providing ongoing income to an otherwise retired senior.
  • If the total amount is not reached in the first 60 days I will continue to seek funding for each component - one at a time until the production minimums are complete.
    I believe in it so much it has become my full-time effort and commitment.
    This one is for all the marbles.
    Read more here: https://www.facebook.com/notes/joe-king/connect...

Why Am I Here?

Coming to the decision to pursue crowd-funding has been long and difficult for me,
I have never accepted a dime to develop ANY of my projects in my Life.
But with age comes humility (hopefully) and I am just not able to move forward with this on my own at the moment.
I mortgaged my home to pay for the printing of my first graphic novel.
Eventually it was optioned for a big budget live-action motion picture.
But the experience was so harrowing for my family I swore I would never do that again.
Likewise, I am not some wannabe living in his parents basement and asking you to make my dreams come true before I have ever paid my dues.
I am a seasoned professional working on my next big idea.

• I have listed a few fun perks that reflect the uniqueness of this project.
  • Pls review my full Press Kit here: www.funnypaperz.com/press1.htm 
  • I welcome you at my fine art gallery here: www.pirategallery.com

This project comes with boots made for walkin'...
And legs to carry it throughout all the seasons of the year!

""Joe has more truth in his pen, than Bill O'Reilly could muster with a thousand ""falaffels"", and more integrity than Limbaugh could ever envision, in the most intense of oxycontin orgies.""
- Eric Blumrich/BUSHFLASH.COM

""The cartoons reveal the ambiance of the area, adding credibility to his other local cartoons. They prove he is an insider... having street cred adds import addressing local concerns... and quality of life.""
- Stuart Rapeport/AAEC

""Future generations will finally recognize his moustachioed genius..."" 
- JP Trostle/AAEC
Other Ways You Can Help

column4: >You can order an INACAN 1.0 here!

column1:
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • ZPULL-EEE folks, help me get the word out and make some noise about this campaign?
  • USE the Indiegogo share tools!

• BOOKMARK the new website and check back regularly as each new city souvenir comes online! www.inacan.org
    I estimate at least one new city per week!

And that's all there is to it.
Before you go ~ pls consider my creative track record: www.funnypaperz.com/bio.htm

Why Am I Here? Coming to the decision to pursue crowd-funding has been long and difficult for me,I have never accepted a dime to develop ANY of my projects in my Life.But with age comes humility (hopefully) and I am just not able to move forward with this on my own at the moment.I mortgaged my home to pay for the printing of my first graphic novel.Eventually it was optioned for a big budget live-action motion picture.But the experience was so harrowing for my family I swore I would never do that again.Likewise, I am not some wannabe living in his parents basement and asking you to make my dreams come true before I have ever paid my dues.I am a seasoned professional working on my next big idea.

I have listed a few fun perks that reflect the uniqueness of this project. Pls review my full Press Kit here: www.funnypaperz.com/press1.htm  I welcome you at my fine art gallery here: www.pirategallery.com
This project comes with boots made for walkin'...And legs to carry it throughout all the seasons of the year!

Joe has more truth in his pen, than Bill O'Reilly could muster with a thousand ""falaffels"", and more integrity than Limbaugh could ever envision, in the most intense of oxycontin orgies.""- Eric Blumrich/BUSHFLASH.COM

The cartoons reveal the ambiance of the area, adding credibility to his other local cartoons. They prove he is an insider... having street cred adds import addressing local concerns... and quality of life.""- Stuart Rapeport/AAEC
Future generations will finally recognize his moustachioed genius..."" - JP Trostle/AAECOther Ways You Can Help
You can order an INACAN 1.0 here!
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:  ZPULL-EEE folks, help me get the word out and make some noise about this campaign? USE the Indiegogo share tools!
BOOKMARK the new website and check back regularly as each new city souvenir comes online! www.inacan.orgI estimate at least one new city per week!
And that's all there is to it.Before you go ~ pls consider my creative track record: www.funnypaperz.com/bio.htm",6.0,0,"1 Campaign

The UrbanFit design is inspired by Anish
Kapoor’s artwork Cloud Gate in Chicago. It is a highly-polished metal sculpture.
We specially focused on how visitors engage with this artwork. Its surface
reflects and distorts the city's skyline. And visitors are able to walk around
and navigate under Cloud Gate's arch. It is a fantastic artwork that connects
city and people. We wanted to conceptually embed Cloud Gate’s connectivity into UrbanFit and connect urban people with UrbanFit.
UrbanFit is an everyday product. You carry
it. You touch it. You feel it every time. UrbanFit is made out of titanium. Titanium is strong, durable, and perfect for human skin. It is known as the best allergy-free
material. It has been used for artificial body parts and joints. We believe
titanium will open a new era of wearable devices.
We aim at helping people improve their
lifestyle. We want to create a healthful working culture. Many urban people
spend a lot of time in the office and have less time for taking care of
themselves. They often struggle with sleepiness, drowsiness, and fatigue in
working and leisure hours. Some people also suffer from insomnia and other
stress-related symptoms. Even worse, some workaholics scarcely leave the
office. With UrbanFit, let’s go outside, take a walk and get some
fresh air. It’s time to truly take care of you and your friends.

Our goal? ""Simply, to create beautiful, practical, and affordable wearables.""

UrbanFit is a project powered by Tissue Technologies. Founded in 2014, Tissue Technologies (""TISSUE"") is a design&research institute that specializes in IoT platforms and solutions. The institute concentrates on the interaction between human and IoT solutions and intertwines everyday products with IoT technologies. Our team of handpicked experts builds innovative products of IoT products and platform services. The institute’s primary goal is the realization of an everyday life of IoT.

We are a group of designers, engineers and scientists. We met at Rhode Island School of Design in Providence, United States. We are experienced in developing innovative products for market and we understand the demands of manufacture. We have established connections with experts in production, certification and fulfillment to ensure that every UrbanFit is produced at high quality and on time.

engineering process, and everything is well prepared and ready to

Due to popular demand and based on your suggestions, we are proudly presenting Urban Slim Wallet 2.0 with RFID Protection ! Completely redesigned with RFID protection.

A lot of us have been frustrated by the traditional wallet, yet a perfect replacement is difficult to find. Urban Slim Wallet 2.0 with RFID Protection is designed for people who love minimalism without having to make a sacrifice. This slim wallet can handle your cards, cash, receipts and more. It has a special flexible pocket design for easy access and handle lots of cards in a single pocket.
column5: >Y Urban Slim Wallet 2.0 with RFID protection is BETTER:

column1: A WALLET DESIGNED TO FIT YOUR LIFE STYLE
• RFID protection helps keep your credit card and I.D. info shielded from thieves
• fast and easy to access cards and cash
• Unlike other “slim” or “minimalist” wallets, which leave some or all of your wallet’s content exposed, we keep it all tucked away.

Urban Slim Wallet 2.0 has 5 different colors.

Black, Brown, Midnight Blue, Dark Brown and Orange.


What's this Urban Slim Wallet 2.0 made of ? 

The Urban Slim wallet 2.0 is made of high quality elastic and Premium synthetic saffiano leather.

Urban Slim Wallet 2.0 PLUS

The Urban Slim Wallet 2.0 PLUS is 10% larger then the Urban Slim wallet 2.0. The advantage of larger size is, it can cover most of the currencies with a single fold inside the cash pocket. (EUR, JPY, AUD and more...) The Urban Slim Wallet 2.0 PLUS has all the same function as Urban Slim Wallet 2.0, just a bit lager. Urban Slim Wallet 2.0 PLUS has 5 different colors, Black, Brown, Midnight Blue, Dark Brown and Orange.
• fast and easy to access boarding pass and passport
• RFID protection helps keep your credit card and Passport info shielded from thieves
• 5 different colors to match with the Urban Slim wallet. Black, Brown, Midnight Blue, Dark Brown and Orange.
Why do you need an RFID Passport case ?

RFID technology ( Radio Frequency Identification ) is already being used in numerous consumer products and is constantly expanding. With well over 200 million credit and debit cards, millions of hotel room keys, all US Passports issued since October 2006, a growing number of state driver’s licenses, work IDs and even transit cards all using RFID chips, more personal information is at risk than ever before. These chips contain first page passport information including your photo. The special driver’s licenses from New York, Michigan, Washington, Vermont are “enhanced” with long-range RFID chips. Overall, enough data that identity theft is an ongoing threat for owners of RFID enabled products.

This is where you come in. We need your help to get this product into your pocket. We are looking for people who are searching for ways to slim down and simplify their lives and defend yourself from theft . Your support will help us cover the costs of our first production run. Thank you for taking the time to check out the project.

We have spent significant time refining and testing the design. We've already selected the manufacturer and completed tooling. The samples you see in the photos and videos work great, feel great, and look fantastic. We've already ordered the components so we are ready to start production. 
However, every project carries with it certain risks. The risks specific to this project would include shipping or production delays. While we feel like we have reduced these variables as much as possible, they can never be completely eliminated. We feel our experience and familiarity with our manufacturer and the product development process gives us a unique skill set in handling unexpected problems and we don't anticipate any significant roadblocks.
