column2: >My life motto is simple, be original.

column1: My best work comes from creating something out of nothing, even if that means starting with the raw material. From cutting and staining the leather myself to grinding and polishing the metal, I do it all.

I'm experimental. My art uses different mediums, from canvas to liquid metal. I brought my art to fashion and accessories because I wanted people to be able to define themselves with what I create. There's more to you than the cookie cutter products out on the market.

column2: >Fashion today is full of mass produced, empty works.

column1: There’s no meaning and love behind mainstream brands, nothing that makes them special. A Ryan Martin original cannot be duplicated – not even by me. No two pieces are identical. My art embodies my aggressive style which comes from my struggles and turns it into something creative - unlike anything you'll ever see in stores.
Your support means you stand with me. You believe what I believe in. You believe an original piece of artwork should be special and unique in its own way. You are part of the family.

Every product from the collection has a hand-crafted touch to it. Whether its hand cut, hand tooled, hand made - no pieces will ever be the same. I don’t believe in mass production, real art is all about the blood, sweat and tears that go into making it and I want to capture that in my work.

All of my products are works of art, they’re unique and when they’re gone, they’re gone. You’re getting in on the ground floor of my brand, products that have never been seen before and may never be seen again.
Hats have the option to include a leather patch to fit your style - something I created that allows you to truly express yourself through my art without restrictions.

column2: >Each patch means something different, it’s your signature piece and it's whats makes you original.

column1: My wallets are made out of hand-cut genuine leather, hand stained and are truly one-of-a-kind. They’re rugged and tight, ready for a lifetime of tough conditions and storing all your important gear. You won’t find another wallet like it.
The hats and beanies are my heart and soul, it's where my creativity really comes out and it's where your style comes from.
Represent my brand and my vision behind taking fashion back to its roots. It’s the perfect gear for someone who wants to stand for something and be part of the family.

The Early Bird T-Shirt is what makes you stand above the rest. I’ve only made 25 and they prove that you’re one of the founding reps for my brand. You get one of these and you’re demanding the respect you deserve.
The Money Maker T-Shirt proves that you’re top-tier. You were here for the beginning and you’re part of the original family. You wear this shirt and you’re the alpha.

We are a product design studio devoted to design for every day life.

3 years ago, we came together aiming to change daily life somewhat with small idea or simple design. One day, when talking about plants, we realized that's the opportunity we were pursuing. We enjoy the ""untouchable outdoors"". However,  our plants keep dying due to over watering or under watering. And the traditional &
column2: monotonous pots are also frustrating. Will a simple design, as we expected, make the difference?

column1: In past 3 years, we kept fine tuning design, hunting for quality &
column3: pursuing excellence in production process. Today, we have developed 5 types of planters. Overflow is our favorite and ready for production.

","WHO WE ARE
We are a product design studio devoted to design for every day life.

3 years ago, we came together aiming to change daily life somewhat with small idea or simple design. One day, when talking about plants, we realized that's the opportunity we were pursuing. We enjoy the ""untouchable outdoors"". However,  our plants keep dying due to over watering or under watering. And the traditional & monotonous pots are also frustrating. Will a simple design, as we expected, make the difference?

In past 3 years, we kept fine tuning design, hunting for quality & eco friendly materials, & pursuing excellence in production process. Today, we have developed 5 types of planters. Overflow is our favorite and ready for production.
A piece of art with no compromise
Enclosed reservoir to extend watering interval, keep clean & prevent water breeding insects
Easy to know when & how much to water
Plants absorb water at will instead of being soaked in water
If you like our design & idea, please:
And if you have any questions, ideas or suggestions , please let us know. We need your input to improve our future products.Many thanks!",17.0,0,"1 Campaign

OUR STORY:  Over the years, we have had many sizes and different breeds of dogs in our lives.  Back in 2003, Jim and I became involved in rescuing Great Danes.  We have had 9 rescue Danes of our own and have helped our local rescue groups over the years with transporting, fund raising, and placing numerous Danes with their forever families.  It became our passion.

One thing became very clear.  Danes come in all different sizes as well as colors.  Our largest weighing in at 225lbs and standing 35 inches at his shoulder.  Our smallest at 95lbs and only 25 inches at her shoulder.  That is a huge difference.  We found ourselves improvising with household items, including boxes, plastic buckets, tables, etc. to make an elevated feeder that was the right height for their individual needs.

Most of the “over the counter” feeders at the local pet stores just didn’t cut it.  Too short, bowls too small, too flimsy, too unstable.  You get the idea.  Jim’s mission became designing a feeder that could be easily adjusted to fit the needs of each dog.  After almost 2 years of prototypes and improvised devices, The Perfect Fit Feeder is born. 

Our campaign is important to us for many reasons.  Most of all, to allow us to continue our rescue efforts and “Paw It Forward” in the rescue community.  We have set up a program, on our website, that allows the customer to select a rescue group of their choice, when purchasing a Perfect Fit Feeder, and we will donate 5% to that rescue group.  Your donation to our campaign will allow us to expand this program to several rescue groups and animal advocate programs across the country.  In our first month, we have been able to donate proceeds from our sales to 4 different groups.  We want to include many more non-profit 501(c)(3) groups to our Paw It Forward Program.  You can help us make that happen.

Secondly, we want to fulfill our dream at our Raising Danes Sanctuary.  We purchased 13 acres of land a few years back and we have cleared it, built our home on it, built a warehouse, and we want to take it to the next level.  Our dream is to build a high end facility that will allow us to help our local rescue groups with fostering, meet and greets, play dates, and family friendly events.  Eventually, we hope to offer day care and boarding, catering to medium and large breeds.  We have the time, the space and now we need your help with the funding.  Help us make The Raising Danes Sanctuary a reality.  You can visit our Raising Danes Sanctuary Page on Facebook and our website for more details.  Your contributions to this campaign can help us make this happen.

We have spent the last year designing and manufacturing The Perfect Fit Feeder and we are proud to announce that it now ready to ship.  That is what makes this campaign risk free.  We have invested in the injection molds, patent process, test markets, marketing tools and all the products components.  It is ready to ship to your doorstep so please share this campaign and The Perfect Fit Feeder with all your fellow pet loving friends.

We are a woman-owned family business, headquartered in Atlanta, GA,

Out of frustration trying to find stylish clothes to fit our autistic daughter, we started DuziScan because the fashion industry's ready-to-wear, mass-produced sizing no longer works!  As technology advances, DuziScan sees the fashion marketplace trending to individualized, affordably-made bespoke and made-to-measure clothing, merging Fashion with Tech.
Using our custom Mobile 3D infrared body scanner and avatar technology, we include the consumer in creating a fashion experience that lets them direct style and gives them a perfect fit.
Why we are using a full size scanner instead of mobile device apps:
• Mobile device apps aren't accurate enough to eliminate alterations and returns.
• AND, they can't be used for large groups quickly or with accuracy, because it depends on   each user's skill holding the device.

Because we are more service oriented, we are offering DuziScan swag options for anyone who is not in the U.S. Southeast where our current truck and office are located.  Otherwise we will offer Body Scan discounts as well as In-House design discounts for made-to-measure options.  Shipping is Never charged on the 3D Body Scan discounts.
How are we poised to accomplish this?
DuziScan has a 3-phase roll out plan, that we hope you will want to partner with us to create a major shift in the fashion industry!
In our first phase, which we have spent all of our savings to start, we:
• Purchased the industry's most accurate 3D Infrared Body Scanner and avatar technology, which completes a full scan in 3 seconds!
• Customized the scanner in a truck to create a fantastic mobile experience!
• Acquired large Plotter, to work with our CAD system to create and print patterns based on individual scan data

column2: women) who want bespoke clothing.  Choose from our In-house designs for women or your own tailor/designer.

column1: Groups who require uniforms or costumes.  DuziScan™ can send scans to your manufacturer/designer or we can complete the process of pattern creation, cutting, sewing and delivery.
Designers who want to integrate body scans for their clients’ perfect fit. Partner with DuziScan™ to use our pattern creation, cutting and sewing equipment.
Manufacturers who want little to no alterations or returns based on fit.  DuziScan™ can travel to and scan your clients’ groups and interface with your CAD system.

column2: equipment for in-house scanning and custom pattern creation and sewing

column1: • Build 5 more mobile scanning vehicles for the top US markets
• Build a world-class team of business, fashion and engineering professionals and advisors
• Expand relationships with designers, retailers, uniform and costume manufacturers
• Develop special closures and integrate SMART technology fabrics to help physically and neurologically disabled people have affordable, in-style clothing - so they can dress with independence!
• Digital fabric printing to reduce environmental stresses and keep manufacturing in the U.S.
• Develop mobile device app by partnering with mobile device mfgs for first ever real accurate scan
By Partnering with DuziScan as a contributor, you will make it possible for us to

Begin working on Phases II and III immediately.  $500,000 is a great start and will allow us to also begin on each area.  One of the most important areas is hiring amazing engineers, consultants and tech savvy individuals!

As with any change in industry trends, we certainly face push back from the mass producers of general size clothing.  The big conversation in the fashion industry is Fit but so far their solutions have been to rely on customers to measure themselves or hope that current mobile apps are good enough
column2: they're even exploring bringing Bespoke to the masses.  We think, let's start small and assume the customer is smart enough to be part of their wardrobe creation.  Plus it allows us access to new, local designers with great ideas.

column1: Further, being a small innovator allows us the flexibility of moving in new directions and tackling problems like closures for disabled people to dress independently.  It also allows us the opportunity to create in-house designs in areas where we see serious flaws, i.e. swimwear and foundation garments.
We will have to be careful to stick with our stated objectives

To help us, we listen to industry experts and seek to have business mentors.  We find these amazing people give us ideas and boundaries to stay on track and be as successful as possible.  It's amazing to have so many people who see the vision and are willing to give their time and ideas and we are very grateful!

We understand well that some of you are not able to contribute financially but your time and influence is just as valuable.  You can help us tremendously by SHARING our IndieGoGo Campaign link and helping us shake up an industry!
You can also SHARE our FACEBOOK  TWITTER and LINKEDIN !
THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR ANY CONTRIBUTION OF FUNDS OR TIME
column2: we are so Grateful to all of you!

Introducing: Live Nymphii

Live Nymphii is a start-up artisan boutique created by Zoë Oleksak and Kenedi Grierson. Our Brand Mission is to share what we love to create with the people we love (you!) in an environment that fosters self-love, inclusivity and positivity.  

We are two young girls with a goal to make size and gender inclusive handmade lingerie, as well as other skincare and lifestyle products. We currently are hosted on Etsy and make appearances at local festivals (check us out at pride this July!) and Flea Markets, but have a goal to open an online shop on our own domain, and eventually a small store :)

As two students months away from graduation, funds are tight. We have put every spare dollar (and not so spare dollar) into making and perfecting our products, and supplies are not cheap! By helping us reach our goal for our startup, we'll be able to invest in things like:

Please help us make our dreams a reality. If you cannot donate, please please please spread the word, or follow our social media accounts to help us gain visibility. We promise that you won't just be doing us a favour: you'll also (hopefully) really enjoy our content and seeing what we're getting up to xx

The bubble3 is the creation of a group innovative people who passionate in making a better world for everyone!
We aim to develop high quality Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) with maximum protection, easy to breath, and speak comfortably without making a nuisance in the normal daily activities.

The new flagship product of bubble3, named SmileTogether Mask  is an ergonomically designed PPE with additional benefits to present facial expressions for face ID verifications, and also provides benefits for the deaf and hard of hearing community for better communications.
The bubble3 SmileTogether Mask are made from safe food grade material, it is also highly resistant to damage and degradation from extreme temperatures. It contains no BPA, latex, lead, or phthalates.

The bubble3 SmileTogether Mask is built to provide you and your love ones with clean fresh and most importantly, safe breathing air. Every bubble3 SmileTogether masks are equipped with 2 pieces of advanced HEPA filters (~99.99%) to prevent the spread of bacteria and viruses through the air. Both filters materials are fully tested by Nelson Labs in accordance with the USFDA (21 CFR Part 58) regulations.

Since September 2020, we have been working closely in accordance with the schedule in order to achieve our plan to move into actual production in May 2021. Today, our final product revisions and supply chain logistics are completed, we are committed to offer every backer the new bubble3 SmileTogether Mask and expected to be shipped by June 2021 globally. We are proud to launch our new products in the Little Red Dot which are Made in Singapore.
Tooling Status : Production tooling fabrication are on track
Production Status: All-set and ready to scale up production

Like all new campaign/projects, there are always risks and challenges. However, bubble3 team is positive and have been working endlessly on the Designing, Prototyping, Testing and Tooling Trial to ensure our products are meeting the highest quality standard.

At this current advanced stage with production readiness, bubble3  team is confident and have taken all the right actions to maximize the product quality and minimize the risk of product delay to our valued backers and customers.
We truly appreciate and honor your support in order to kick off all the components procurement and bring everyone's smile to the new normal with bubble3 SmileTogether Mask!

The biggest secret of the watch industry is that luxury mechanical automatic watches must have a high price tag.


But, in truth, you can hand-make a high-performing mechanical watch for a fraction of the price. Top watch brands keep their master watchmakers and designers from consulting with new brands that dare to break the mold.


But that didn’t stop us.


With the help of a master watchmaker and a team of designers, we created Salut Monde Mechanical Skeleton Watch, the most Affordable Handmade Mechanical Watch on the market.
column3:
showinfo=0"">

 

 

To ensure you get the product before Christmas, we have pre-assembled 300 Salut Monde Mechanical Skeleton Watch and have them ready for you. Some people have received their Salut Monde! Are you still waiting?
column5:
showinfo=0"">
 

 

  

 

 

The design and development cycle of each Salut Monde Mechanical Skeleton Watch takes more than 200 days. Each watch has been into more than 4000 production processes before it is ready to be shipped to you. We make sure our products have the less than 0.1% error rate, so your Salut Monde Mechanical Skeleton Watch can be dependable for decades.

 

 

  

 

 

 

With the idea of Globe in mind, Salut Monde Mechanical Skeleton Watch displays all the time zone in the world, The 2 crowns represents the axis of the Earth rotation, The Earth rotates once in 24 hours, the watch can show you the time of 24 hours.  The skeleton design allows you easily see the process of self-winding

Salut Monde Mechanical Skeleton Watch was one of Winners of the Hongkong Watch &
column6:
Clock Design Competition, and also was one of the Invitees to the 2017 Swiss Basel World Show.

 

 

Watch owners expect their watches to work flawlessly without servicing or interfering with them for many years. This is why we hand assemble each of Salut Monde Mechanical Skeleton Watch. 

 

 

 

 

 

We have created a revolutionary production system that has allowed the techniques of our top Swiss watchmaker to be passed to multiple skilled workers. This allows more workers to help creating top-quality watches at a faster rate, in turn, lowers the price.

 

 

 

 

            

 

 

 

 

 

 Solid watch deserves solid case. Each watch comes with a solid wood watch case, which makes it the great gift in this special holiday season.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  

 

 

 

  


 

   

 

If you know someone who needs a well-designed affordable mechanical watch, it is time to have them check Salut Monde right now! For every contribution you referred, you get 5% OFF CASH BACK! 

The participation is easy! Click Here to see how to participate
